elseif options.alignment == "right" then --we'll right-align the text leftPadLen = options.width - strLen - 1 rightPadLen = 0 rightCap = "" str = string.format(" %s", str)
else --Ok, so if it's not center or right, we assume it's left. We don't do justified. Sorry. leftPadLen = 0 rightPadLen = options.width - strLen -1 leftCap = "" str = string.format("%s ", str) end--that's it, took care of both left, right, and center formattings, now to output the durn thing.
if options.inside then --if we're placing the repated spacer inside --"=====endcap some text endcap=====" --"=====endcap some text pacdne=====" --"=================endcap some text" --"some text endcap=================" return options.capColor .. leftCap .. options.spacerColor.. string.rep(options.spacer, (leftPadLen - capLen)) .. options.textColor .. str .. options.spacerColor ..string.rep(options.spacer, (rightPadLen - capLen)) .. options.capColor .. rightCap else --otherwise, it''s be the spaces on the 'inside' -- "endcap===== some text =====endcap" -- "endcap===== some text =====pacdne" -- "endcap================= some text" -- "some text =================endcap" return options.spacerColor .. string.rep(options.spacer, (leftPadLen - capLen)) .. options.capColor .. leftCap .. options.textColor .. str .. options.capColor .. rightCap .. options.spacerColor .. string.rep(options.spacer, (rightPadLen - capLen)) end end
function halign(str,options) --str is a string, options is a table --[[ If they sent anything but a table as the second argument, return useful info. But if they didn't send a second argument then that's ok, the defaults will be enough to get by and just center the txt ]]-- if (not type(options) == "table") and (not options == nil) then return "You call this with align(\"some text to format\", <table of options>. Pls check comments for what options and usage information" end options = options or {} --if they sent options, don't overwrite them options.width = options.width or 80 --default line length of 80 options.alignment = options.alignment or "center" --if we don't specify, it's centered options.cap = options.cap or "" --default endcap of nothing (an empty string, technically) options.spacer = options.spacer or " " --default spacer is.. well.. space options.inside = options.inside or false --by default, when centering, formation as spacers|cap|text|cap|spacers options.capColor = options.capColor or "|cFFFFFF"--by default, don't change the color of the caps options.spacerColor = options.spacerColor or "|cFFFFFF" options.textColor = options.textColor or "|cFFFFFF"--or the text if not options.mirror == false then options.mirror = options.mirror or true end--by default, we do want to use mirroring for the caps local strLen = string.len(str) local leftCap = options.cap local rightCap = options.cap local leftPadLen = math.floor((options.width - strLen)/2,1) - 1 local rightPadLen = leftPadLen + ((options.width - strLen)%2) local maxPad = 0 local capLen = string.len(options.cap) if capLen > leftPadLen then --if the cap is bigger than the left total padding options.cap = options.cap:sub(1, leftPadLen) -- trim it up right! capLen = string.len(options.cap) end --otherwise, don't mess with it
if options.alignment == "center" then --we're going to center something leftPadLen = math.floor((options.width - strLen)/2,1) - 1 --get the padding needed on the left rightPadLen = leftPadLen + ((options.width - strLen)%2) --and on the right if options.mirror then --if we're reversing the left cap and the right cap (IE {{[[ turns into ]]}} ) rightCap = string.gsub(rightCap, "<", ">") rightCap = string.gsub(rightCap, "%[", "%]") rightCap = string.gsub(rightCap, "{", "}") rightCap = string.gsub(rightCap, "%(", "%)") rightCap = string.reverse(rightCap) end --otherwise, they'll be the same, so don't do anything str = string.format(" %s ", str)
elseif options.alignment == "right" then --we'll right-align the text leftPadLen = options.width - strLen - 1 rightPadLen = 0 rightCap = "" str = string.format(" %s", str)
else --Ok, so if it's not center or right, we assume it's left. We don't do justified. Sorry. leftPadLen = 0 rightPadLen = options.width - strLen -1 leftCap = "" str = string.format("%s ", str) end--that's it, took care of both left, right, and center formattings, now to output the durn thing.

Script.name: vw function
Script.script:
--[[ If the label callbacks ever decide to start taking a function which is part of a table, 0then this will change. Or if it's modified to take actual functions. Anonymouse function clickcallback would be awfully nice. ]]
function vwViewerSwitch(chat) local r = vw.config.inactiveColors.r local g = vw.config.inactiveColors.g local b = vw.config.inactiveColors.b local newr = vw.config.activeColors.r local newg = vw.config.activeColors.g local newb = vw.config.activeColors.b local oldchat = vw.currentTab if vw.currentTab ~= chat then vw.windows[oldchat]:hide() vw.tabs[oldchat]:setColor(r,g,b) vw.tabs[oldchat]:echo(oldchat, vw.config.inactiveTabText, "c") if vw.config.blink and vw.tabsToBlink[chat] then vw.tabsToBlink[chat] = nil end if vw.config.blink and chat == vw.config.Alltab then vw.tabsToBlink = {} end end vw.tabs[chat]:setColor(newr,newg,newb) vw.tabs[chat]:echo(chat, vw.config.activeTabText, "c") vw.windows[chat]:show() vw.currentTab = chat end
function vw:resetUI() vw.container = Geyser.Container:new(vw[vw.config.location]()) vw.tabBox = Geyser.HBox:new({ x=0, y=0, width = "100%", height = "25px", name = "vwViewerTabs", },vw.container)
end
function vw:create() if vw.use then --reset the UI vw:resetUI() --Set some variables locally to increase readability local r = vw.config.inactiveColors.r local g = vw.config.inactiveColors.g local b = vw.config.inactiveColors.b local winr = vw.config.windowColors.r local wing = vw.config.windowColors.g local winb = vw.config.windowColors.b
--iterate the table of channels and create some windows and tabs for i,tab in ipairs(vw.config.channels) do vw.tabs[tab] = Geyser.Label:new({ name=string.format("tab%s", tab), }, vw.tabBox) vw.tabs[tab]:echo(tab, vw.config.inactiveTabText, "c") vw.tabs[tab]:setColor(r,g,b) vw.tabs[tab]:setClickCallback("vwViewerSwitch", tab) vw.windows[tab] = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ -- fontSize = demonnic.chat.config.fontSize, x = 0, y = 25, height = "100%", width = "100%", name = string.format("win%s", tab), }, vw.container) vw.windows[tab]:setFontSize(vw.config.fontSize) vw.windows[tab]:setColor(winr,wing,winb) vw.windows[tab]:setWrap(vw.config.width) vw.windows[tab]:hide() end local showme = vw.config.Alltab or vw.config.channels[1] vwViewerSwitch(showme) --start the blink timers, if enabled if vw.config.blink and not vw.blinkTimerOn then vw:blink() end else if vw.container then vw.container:move(0,0) vw.container:resize(0,0) end end end
function vw:append(chat)
local r = vw.config.windowColors.r local g = vw.config.windowColors.g local b = vw.config.windowColors.b selectCurrentLine() local ofr,ofg,ofb = getFgColor() local obr,obg,obb = getBgColor() if vw.config.preserveBackground then setBgColor(r,g,b) end
copy()
if vw.config.timestamp then local timestamp = getTime(true, vw.config.timestamp) local tsfg = {} local tsbg = {} local colorLeader = "" if vw.config.timestampCustomColor then if type(vw.config.timestampFG) == "string" then tsfg = color_table[vw.config.timestampFG] else tsfg = vw.config.timestampFG end if type(vw.config.timestampBG) == "string" then tsbg = color_table[vw.config.timestampBG] else tsbg = vw.config.timestampBG end colorLeader = string.format("<%s,%s,%s:%s,%s,%s>",tsfg[1],tsfg[2],tsfg[3],tsbg[1],tsbg[2],tsbg[3]) else colorLeader = string.format("<%s,%s,%s:%s,%s,%s>",ofr,ofg,ofb,obr,obg,obb) end local fullstamp = string.format("%s%s",colorLeader,timestamp) vw.windows[chat]:decho(fullstamp) vw.windows[chat]:echo(" ") if vw.config.Alltab then vw.windows[vw.config.Alltab]:decho(fullstamp) vw.windows[vw.config.Alltab]:echo(" ") end end vw.windows[chat]:append() if vw.config.gag then deleteLine() tempLineTrigger(1,1, [[if isPrompt() then deleteLine() end]]) end if vw.config.Alltab then appendBuffer(string.format("win%s", vw.config.Alltab)) end if vw.config.blink and chat ~= vw.currentTab then if (vw.config.Alltab == vw.currentTab) and not vw.config.blinkOnAll then return else vw.tabsToBlink[chat] = true end end end
function vw:blink() if vw.blinkID then killTimer(vw.blinkID) end if not vw.config.blink then vw.blinkTimerOn = false return end for tab,_ in pairs(vw.tabsToBlink) do vw.tabs[tab]:flash() end vw.blinkID = tempTimer(vw.config.blinkTime, function () vw:blink() end) end
function vw:topright() return { fontSize = vw.config.fontSize, x=string.format("-%sc", vw.config.width + 8), y=0, width="-20px", height=string.format("%ic", vw.config.lines + 2), } end
function vw:topleft() return { fontSize = vw.config.fontSize, x=0, y=0, width=string.format("%sc", vw.config.width), height=string.format("%ic", vw.config.lines + 2), } end
function vw:bottomright() return { fontSize = vw.config.fontSize, x=string.format("-%sc", vw.config.width + 2), y=string.format("-%sc", vw.config.lines + 2), width="-15px", height=string.format("%ic", vw.config.lines + 2), } end
function vw:bottomleft() return { fontSize = vw.config.fontSize, x=0, y=string.format("-%sc", vw.config.lines + 2), width=string.format("%sc", vw.config.width), height=string.format("%ic", vw.config.lines + 2), } end
function vw:toggle() if vw.use then vw.container:move(0,0) vw.container:resize(0,0) vw.use = false else vw:create() vw.use = true end end

Script.name: vwViewerOnStart
Script.script: function vwViewerOnStart() if vw.use then vw:create() end end

Script.name: vw echo
Script.script:
function vw:cecho(chat, message) local alltab = vw.config.Alltab local blink = vw.config.blink cecho(string.format("win%s",chat), message) if alltab and chat ~= alltab then cecho(string.format("win%s", alltab), message) end if blink and chat ~= vw.currentTab then if (alltab == vw.currentTab) and not vw.config.blinkOnAll then return else vw.tabsToBlink[chat] = true end end end
function vw:decho(chat, message) local alltab = vw.config.Alltab local blink = vw.config.blink decho(string.format("win%s",chat), message) if alltab and chat ~= alltab then decho(string.format("win%s", alltab), message) end if blink and chat ~= vw.currentTab then if (alltab == vw.currentTab) and not vw.config.blinkOnAll then return else vw.tabsToBlink[chat] = true end end end
function vw:hecho(chat, message) local alltab = vw.config.Alltab local blink = vw.config.blink hecho(string.format("win%s",chat), message) if alltab and chat ~= alltab then hecho(string.format("win%s", alltab), message) end if blink and chat ~= vw.currentTab then if (alltab == vw.currentTab) and not vw.config.blinkOnAll then return else vw.tabsToBlink[chat] = true end end end
function vw:echo(chat, message) local alltab = vw.config.Alltab local blink = vw.config.blink echo(string.format("win%s",chat), message) if alltab and chat ~= alltab then echo(string.format("win%s", alltab), message) end if blink and chat ~= vw.currentTab then if (alltab == vw.currentTab) and not vw.config.blinkOnAll then return else vw.tabsToBlink[chat] = true end end end

Script.name: vw report
Script.script:
function vw:report( chat, message, suppress ) local tstamp = "hh:mm:ss.zzz" -- vw.config.timestamp
local r = vw.config.windowColors.r local g = vw.config.windowColors.g local b = vw.config.windowColors.b local ofr,ofg,ofb = getFgColor() local obr,obg,obb = getBgColor() if vw.config.preserveBackground then setBgColor(r,g,b) end
if tstamp then local timestamp = getTime(true,tstamp) local tsfg = {} local tsbg = {} local colorLeader = "" if vw.config.timestampCustomColor then if type(vw.config.timestampFG) == "string" then tsfg = color_table[vw.config.timestampFG] else tsfg = vw.config.timestampFG end if type(vw.config.timestampBG) == "string" then tsbg = color_table[vw.config.timestampBG] else tsbg = vw.config.timestampBG end colorLeader = string.format("<%s,%s,%s:%s,%s,%s>",tsfg[1],tsfg[2],tsfg[3],tsbg[1],tsbg[2],tsbg[3]) else colorLeader = string.format("<%s,%s,%s:%s,%s,%s>",ofr,ofg,ofb,obr,obg,obb) end local fullstamp = string.format("%s%s",colorLeader,timestamp) vw.windows[chat]:decho(fullstamp) vw.windows[chat]:echo(" ") if vw.config.Alltab and not suppress then vw.windows[vw.config.Alltab]:decho(fullstamp) vw.windows[vw.config.Alltab]:echo(" ") end end
message = message.."\n" cecho(string.format("win%s",chat), message) if vw.config.Alltab and not suppress then cecho(string.format("win%s", vw.config.Alltab), message) end if vw.config.blink and chat ~= vw.currentTab then if (vw.config.Alltab == vw.currentTab) and not vw.config.blinkOnAll then return else vw.tabsToBlink[chat] = true end end end

Script.name: vw private
Script.script:
function vw.private(message) local tstamp = "hh:mm:ss.zzz" -- vw.config.timestamp local chat = "Misc"
local r = vw.config.windowColors.r local g = vw.config.windowColors.g local b = vw.config.windowColors.b local ofr,ofg,ofb = getFgColor() local obr,obg,obb = getBgColor() if vw.config.preserveBackground then setBgColor(r,g,b) end
if tstamp then local timestamp = getTime(true,tstamp) local tsfg = {} local tsbg = {} local colorLeader = "" if vw.config.timestampCustomColor then if type(vw.config.timestampFG) == "string" then tsfg = color_table[vw.config.timestampFG] else tsfg = vw.config.timestampFG end if type(vw.config.timestampBG) == "string" then tsbg = color_table[vw.config.timestampBG] else tsbg = vw.config.timestampBG end colorLeader = string.format("<%s,%s,%s:%s,%s,%s>",tsfg[1],tsfg[2],tsfg[3],tsbg[1],tsbg[2],tsbg[3]) else colorLeader = string.format("<%s,%s,%s:%s,%s,%s>",ofr,ofg,ofb,obr,obg,obb) end local fullstamp = string.format("%s%s",colorLeader,timestamp) vw.windows[chat]:decho(fullstamp) vw.windows[chat]:echo(" ") end
message = message.."\n" cecho(string.format("win%s",chat), message) if vw.config.blink and chat ~= vw.currentTab then if (vw.config.Alltab == vw.currentTab) and not vw.config.blinkOnAll then return else vw.tabsToBlink[chat] = true end end end

Script.name: aeon

Script.name: dbax.me_give
Script.script: dbax.me_give = function() for aff, val in pairs(dba) do if val.me_give ~= "" then if not dban[aff] then dban[aff] = {} end if dban[aff].me_give_trig then killTrigger(dban[aff].me_give_trig) end dban[aff].me_give_trig = tempRegexTrigger( "^"..val.me_give, [[ trax.give(me, ']]..aff..[[') ]]) end end end

Script.name: dbax.me_take
Script.script: dbax.me_take = function() for aff, val in pairs(dba) do if val.me_take ~= "" then if not dban[aff] then dban[aff] = {} end if dban[aff].me_take_trig then killTrigger(dban[aff].me_take_trig) end dban[aff].me_take_trig = tempRegexTrigger( "^"..val.me_take, [[ trax.take(me, ']]..aff..[[') -- some code to delete the last pending cure -- some prettification, ensure you CONFIG AFFMESSAGES on deleteLine() ]]) end end end

Script.name: dbax.me_diag
Script.script: dbax.me_diag = function() for aff, val in pairs(dba) do if val.me_diag ~= "" then if not dban[aff] then dbax[aff] = {} end if dban[aff].me_diag_trig then killTrigger(dban[aff].me_diag_trig) end dban[aff].me_diag_trig = tempRegexTrigger( "^"..val.me_diag, [[ trax.give(diagnose, ']]..aff..[[') ]]) end end end

Script.name: dbax.m_give
Script.script: dbax.m_give = function() for aff, val in pairs(dba) do if val.m_give ~= "" then if not dban[aff] then dban[aff] = {} end if dban[aff].m_give_trig then killTrigger(dban[aff].m_give_trig) end dban[aff].m_give_trig = tempRegexTrigger( "^"..val.m_give, [[ trax.give(matches[2], ']]..aff..[[') sub(matches[2]..' <green>]]..aff..[[<grey>.') ]]) end end end

Script.name: dbax.m_take
Script.script: dbax.m_take = function() for aff, val in pairs(dba) do if val.m_take ~= "" then if not dban[aff] then dban[aff] = {} end if dban[aff].m_take_trig then killTrigger(dban[aff].m_take_trig) end dban[aff].m_take_trig = tempRegexTrigger( "^"..val.m_take, [[ trax.take(matches[2], ']]..aff..[[') trax.pending_name = '' trax.pending = '' sub(matches[2]..' <orange_red>]]..aff..[[<grey>.') ]]) end end end

Script.name: dbax.herbs
Script.script: dbax.herbs = function() local tablen = { "maidenhair", "kelp", "wormwood", "mandrake", "orphine", "nightshade", "galingale", "ginger", "juniper", "hyssop", } for i=1, #tablen do local short = tablen[i] local check = "p_"..tablen[i] if not dban[short] then dban[short] = {} end for k, v in pairs(dba) do if v[check] and not table.contains(dban[short],v.name) then table.insert(dban[short], v[check], v.name) end end dban[short] = concise(dban[short]) end end

Script.name: dbax.focus
Script.script: dbax.focus = function() if not dban.focus then dban.focus = {} end for k, v in pairs(dba) do if v.p_focus and not table.contains(dban.focus,v.name) then table.insert(dban.focus, v.p_focus, v.name) end end dban.focus = concise(dban.focus) end

Script.name: dbax.salve
Script.script: dbax.salve = function() local tablen = { "head", "arms", "skin", "legs", } for i=1, #tablen do local short = tablen[i] local check = "p_"..tablen[i] if not dban[short] then dban[short] = {} end for k, v in pairs(dba) do if v[check] and not table.contains(dban[short],v.name) then table.insert(dban[short], v[check], v.name) end end dban[short] = concise(dban[short]) end end

Script.name: dbax.smoke
Script.script: dbax.smoke = function() local tablen = { "laurel", "linseed", "lovage", } for i=1, #tablen do local short = tablen[i] local check = "p_"..tablen[i] if not dban[short] then dban[short] = {} end for k, v in pairs(dba) do if v[check] and not table.contains(dban[short],v.name) then table.insert(dban[short], v[check], v.name) end end dban[short] = concise(dban[short]) end end

Script.name: dbax.purge
Script.script: dbax.purge = function() if not dban.purge then dban.purge = {} end for k, v in pairs(dba) do if v.p_purge and not table.contains(dban.purge,v.name) then table.insert(dban.purge, v.p_purge, v.name) end end dban.purge = concise(dban.purge) end

Script.name: dbax.tree
Script.script: dbax.tree = function() if not dban.tree then dban.tree = {} end for k, v in pairs(dba) do if v.p_tree and not table.contains(dban.tree,v.name) then table.insert(dban.tree, v.p_tree, v.name) end end dban.tree = concise(dban.tree) end

Script.name: dbax.all
Script.script: dbax.all = function() if not dban.all then dban.all = {} end for k, v in pairs(dba) do if v.p and not table.contains(dban.all,v.name) then table.insert(dban.all, v.p, v.name) end end dban.all = concise(dban.all) end

Script.name: dbax.count
Script.script: dbax.count = function(name) local count = 0 for k,v in pairs(dbp.players_[name].affs) do if v then count = count + 1 end end return count end

Script.name: dbax.reset
Script.script:
dbax.reset = function() for aff, val in pairs(dba) do if dban[aff] and dban[aff].me_take_trig then killTrigger(dban[aff].me_take_trig) end if dban[aff] and dban[aff].me_give_trig then killTrigger(dban[aff].me_give_trig) end if dban[aff] and dban[aff].me_diag_trig then killTrigger(dban[aff].me_diag_trig) end if dban[aff] and dban[aff].m_give_trig then killTrigger(dban[aff].m_give_trig) end if dban[aff] and dban[aff].m_take_trig then killTrigger(dban[aff].m_take_trig) end end
local tablen = { "maidenhair", "kelp", "wormwood", "mandrake", "orphine", "nightshade", "galingale", "ginger",
"laurel", "linseed", "lovage", } for i=1, #tablen do dban[tablen[i]] = {} end dban.focus = {} dban.purge = {} dban.tree = {} dban.all = {}
end

ScriptGroup.name: dbp
ScriptGroup.script:
dbp = dbp or {} dbp.allow = dbp.allow or true dbp.allow_ = dbp.allow_ or true dbp.left = dbp.left or true
-- check using website data dbp.download_ = true

Script.name: [d]

Script.name: dbp.load
Script.script: dbp.load = function() local path = getMudletHomeDir().."/dbp.lua" if io.exists(path) then table.load( path, dbp.players ) cecho( "\n"..path.." loaded. Generating variables now." ) dbp.players_ = {} for k in pairs( dbp.players ) do dbp.players_[k] = {} dbp.gen(k) _hl(k) end else table.save( path, dbp.players ) cecho( "\n"..path.." created." ) end end

Script.name: dbp.save
Script.script: dbp.save = function(suppress) local path = getMudletHomeDir().."/dbp.lua" table.save( path, dbp.players ) if suppress then else cecho( "\n"..path.." saved." ) end end

Script.name: dbp.make
Script.script: dbp.make = function(name,suppress) name = string.title(name) dbp.players[name]= {} dbp.players[name].circle = "" dbp.players[name].gender = "" dbp.players[name].profession = "" if dbp.save then dbp.save(suppress) end if dbp.gen then dbp.gen(name) end end

Script.name: dbp.gen
Script.script:
dbp.gen = function(name) name = string.title(name) dbp.players_[name] = {} dbp.players_[name].affs = {} for i=1, #dbp.variables do local var = dbp.variables[i][1] local val = dbp.variables[i][2] if type(val) == "table" then dbp.players_[name][var] = ecopy(val) else dbp.players_[name][var] = val end end for aff, info in pairs(dba) do dbp.players_[name].affs[aff] = false end
-- dbp.players_[name].affs_ = {} for aff, info in pairs(dba) do dbp.players_[name].affs_[aff] = 0 end end

Script.name: dbp.reset
Script.script: dbp.reset = function() for k in pairs( dbp.players ) do dbp.players_[k] = {} dbp.gen(k) end end

Script.name: player
Script.script: player = function(name) if dbp.players[name] and dbp.players_[name] then return true else return false end end

Script.name: has
Script.script: has = function(name,value) local str = "" if not player(name) then value = name name = me end if dba[value] then if config and config.trax == 1 then str = dbp.players_[name].affs[value] elseif config and config.trax == 2 then str = dbp.players_[name].affs_[value] else str = dbp.players_[name].affs[value] end elseif value:match("%.") then local tablen = value:split("%.") local path = dbp.players_[name] for i=1, #tablen do path = path[tablen[i]] end str = path else str = dbp.players_[name][value] end return str end

Script.name: set
Script.script: -- used to set variables other than afflictions set = function(name,value,state,state_value) local str = "" if not player(name) then if state then state_value = state end if value then state = value end value = name name = me end if type(dbp.players_[name][value]) == "table" then if state_value then dbp.players_[name][value][state] = state_value else table.insert(dbp.players_[name][value],state) end else if value:match("%.") then local tablen = value:split("%.") local path = dbp.players_[name] for i=1, #tablen do if i == #tablen then path[tablen[i]] = state else path = path[tablen[i]] end end else dbp.players_[name][value] = state end end end

Script.name: clear, clear_
Script.script:
dbp.clear = function(name) for aff, info in pairs(dba) do dbp.players_[name].affs[aff] = false dbp.players_[name].affs_[aff] = 0 end if dbp then dbp.ui_refresh() dbp.ui_refresh_() end end
dbp.clear_ = function(name) name = string.title(name) for i=1, #dbp.variables do local var = dbp.variables[i][1] local val = dbp.variables[i][2] if type(val) == "table" then dbp.players_[name][var] = ecopy(val) else dbp.players_[name][var] = val end end if dbp then dbp.ui_refresh() dbp.ui_refresh_() end cecho("\n<gold>Cleared all variables on "..name..".") end

Script.name: count
Script.script:
dbp.count = function(name,type)
local count,mcount = 0,0 local path = dbp.players_[name].affs
if config and config.trax == 2 then path = dbp.players_[name].affs_ end
for aff, info in pairs(dba) do if dbp.players_[name].affs[aff] then if type and type == "madness" and dba[aff].madness then mcount = mcount + 1 elseif type and type == "hypno" and dba[aff].hypno then local ex = {"clumsiness","stupidity","recklessness","anorexia"} if not table.contains(ex,tostring(aff)) then mcount = mcount + 1 end elseif type and type == "focus" and dba[aff].p_focus then mcount = mcount + 1 else count = count + 1 end end end
if config and config.trax == 2 then mcount = 0 count = 0 for aff, info in pairs(dba) do if dbp.players_[name].affs_[aff] >= 1 then if type and type == "madness" and dba[aff].madness then mcount = mcount + 1 else count = count + 1 end end end end
if type == "madness" then count = mcount end
return count end

Script.name: circ, gcirc, prof, gprof
Script.script:
dbp.circ = function(name,enc) if player(name) then dbp.players[name].circle = enc cecho("\n<white>Assigned "..name.." to circle <cyan>"..enc.."<white>!") dbp.save() end end
dbp.gcirc = function(name) local circ = "" if player(name) then circ = dbp.players[name].circle end return circ end
dbp.prof = function(name,profe) if player(name) then dbp.players[name].profession = profe cecho("\n<white>Assigned "..name.." to profession <cyan>"..profe.."<white>!") dbp.save() end end
dbp.gprof = function(name) local prof = "" if player(name) then prof = dbp.players[name].profession end return prof end

Script.name: dbp.ui_make
Script.script:
dbp.ui_make = function() local width, height = getMainWindowSize() local fwidth,fheight = calcFontSize(11)
local left = ui.left*width if not dbp.left then left = 0 end setBorderLeft(left)
dbp.ui = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="dbp_ui", x= 0, y= 0, width= left, height= "40c", }) dbp.ui:move(0,height-(33*fheight)) dbp.ui:resize(left-20,33*fheight) dbp.ui:setFontSize(10) dbp.ui:setColor(0,0,0,50)
local w = 3 if not dbp.left then w = 0 end dbp.border = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="dbp_border", x=0, y=0, width= w, height=height, }) dbp.border:move(left-7,0) dbp.border:setColor(38,38,38,0)
if not dbp.left then dbp.ui:resize(0,0) dbp.border:resize(0,0) end end

Script.name: dbp.ui_refresh
Script.script:
dbp.ui_refresh = function() clearWindow("dbp_ui")
local str = "" local time = os.time()
if dbp.allow then
-- TRAX 2 if player(target) and config and config.trax == 2 then str = str.."Target: <gold>"..target.."<grey>" str = str.."\n"
local level = 0.30 local count = 0 local tablen = ecopy(dbp.players_[target].affs_)
local lcr = { ["0.35"] = "<sea_green>", ["0.55"] = "<forest_green>", ["0.75"] = "<lime_green>", } local lfc = function(num) if num < 0.35 then num = 0.35 elseif num < 0.55 then num = 0.55 elseif num < 0.75 then num = 0.75 end num = tostring(num) if lcr[num] then return lcr[num] else return "<green>" end end
local lock_affs = { "anorexia", "asthma", "hemotoxin", "impatience", "numbness", "slickness", }
local c_affs = {}
if class == "Summoner" then for k,v in orderedPairs(dba) do if v.madness and not table.contains(lock_affs,k) then table.insert(c_affs,k) end end end
if class == "Assassin" then local ex = {"clumsiness","stupidity","recklessness","anorexia"} for k,v in orderedPairs(dba) do if v.hypno and not table.contains(lock_affs,k) and not table.contains(ex,k) then table.insert(c_affs,k) end end end
for i=1,#lock_affs do str = str.."\n" local dis,turb = "", "" local aff = lock_affs[i] local score = has(target,lock_affs[i])
dis = string.format("%3.2f",score) if score >= level then local k = lfc(score) dis = k..dis.."<grey>" else dis = "<saddle_brown>"..dis.."<grey>" end
turb = string.rpad(aff,23," ") if score >= level then local k = lfc(score) turb = k..turb.."<grey>" else turb = "<dim_grey>"..turb.."<grey>" end str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end
str = str.."\n" local hypno_queue = has(target,"hypno_queue") for i=1,#c_affs do str = str.."\n" local dis,turb = "", "" local aff = c_affs[i] local score = has(target,c_affs[i])
dis = string.format("%3.2f",score) if score >= level then local shine = lfc(score) dis = shine..dis.."<grey>" elseif table.contains(hypno_queue,c_affs[i]) then dis = "<deep_sky_blue>"..dis.."<grey>" else dis = "<saddle_brown>"..dis.."<grey>" end turb = string.rpad(aff,23," ") if score >= level then local shine = lfc(score) turb = shine..turb.."<grey>" elseif table.contains(hypno_queue,c_affs[i]) then turb = "<deep_sky_blue>"..turb.."<grey>" else turb = "<dim_grey>"..turb.."<grey>" end str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end
-- split by clusters local diabolist_h = {} if class == "Diabolist" then str = str.."\n" local cluster = { kelp = "<chocolate>", orphine = "<olive_drab>", wormwood = "<pale_violet_red>", } for k,v in orderedPairs(cluster) do local pn = "p_"..tostring(k) local shine = v for i,j in orderedPairs(tablen) do if dba[i][pn] and not table.contains(lock_affs,i) and not table.contains(c_affs,i) and j >= level then local dis,turb = "", "" dis = shine..string.format("%3.2f",j).."<grey>" turb = string.rpad(i,23," ") turb = shine..turb.."<grey>" str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb.."\n" table.insert(diabolist_h,i) end end end end
str = str.."\n" if class ~= "Diabolist" then str = str.."\n" end for k,v in pairs(tablen) do if not table.contains(lock_affs,k) and not table.contains(c_affs,k) and v >= level then local shine = lfc(v) local dis,turb = "", "" dis = shine..string.format("%3.2f",v).."<grey>" turb = string.rpad(k,23," ") turb = shine..turb.."<grey>" if class == "Diabolist" and table.contains(diabolist_h,k) then else str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb.."\n" end end end
-- TRAX 1 elseif player(target) then str = str.."Target: <gold>"..target.."<grey>" str = str.."\n"
local count = 0 local tablen = ecopy(dbp.players_[target].affs)
local lock_affs = { "anorexia", "asthma", "hemotoxin", "impatience", "numbness", "slickness", }
local c_affs = {}
if class == "Summoner" then for k,v in orderedPairs(dba) do if v.madness and not table.contains(lock_affs,k) then table.insert(c_affs,k) end end end
if class == "Assassin" then local ex = {"clumsiness","stupidity","recklessness","anorexia"} for k,v in orderedPairs(dba) do if v.hypno and not table.contains(lock_affs,k) and not table.contains(ex,k) then table.insert(c_affs,k) end end end
for i=1,#lock_affs do str = str.."\n" local dis,turb = "", "" if has(target,lock_affs[i]) then dis = "<green>x<grey>" else dis = "<saddle_brown>o<grey>" end turb = string.rpad(lock_affs[i],23," ") if has(target,lock_affs[i]) then turb = "<green>"..turb.."<grey>" else turb = "<dim_grey>"..turb.."<grey>" end str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end
str = str.."\n" local hypno_queue = has(target,"hypno_queue") for i=1,#c_affs do str = str.."\n" local dis,turb = "", "" if has(target,c_affs[i]) then dis = "<green>x<grey>" elseif table.contains(hypno_queue,c_affs[i]) then dis = "<deep_sky_blue>x<grey>" else dis = "<saddle_brown>o<grey>" end turb = string.rpad(c_affs[i],23," ") if has(target,c_affs[i]) then turb = "<green>"..turb.."<grey>" elseif table.contains(hypno_queue,c_affs[i]) then turb = "<deep_sky_blue>"..turb.."<grey>" else turb = "<dim_grey>"..turb.."<grey>" end str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end
-- split by clusters local diabolist_h = {} if class == "Diabolist" then str = str.."\n" local cluster = { kelp = "<chocolate>", orphine = "<olive_drab>", wormwood = "<pale_violet_red>", } for k,v in orderedPairs(cluster) do local pn = "p_"..tostring(k) local shine = v for i,j in orderedPairs(tablen) do if dba[i][pn] and not table.contains(lock_affs,i) and not table.contains(c_affs,i) and j then local dis,turb = "", "" dis = shine.."x<grey>" turb = string.rpad(i,23," ") turb = shine..turb.."<grey>" str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb.."\n" table.insert(diabolist_h,i) end end end end
str = str.."\n" if class ~= "Diabolist" then str = str.."\n" end for k,v in pairs(tablen) do if not table.contains(lock_affs,k) and not table.contains(c_affs,k) and v then local shine = "<green>" local dis,turb = "", "" dis = shine.."x<grey>" turb = string.rpad(k,23," ") turb = shine..turb.."<grey>" if class == "Diabolist" and table.contains(diabolist_h,k) then else str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb.."\n" end end end
-- NON PLAYER else str = str.."<sienna> Mobiles (#"..gmcp.Room.Info.num..")" str = str.."\n<slate_grey>-----------------------" for k,v in pairs(gm.contents) do if v.attrib == "m" then str = str.."\n "..v.id.." - "..v.name end local st = {"a hazeward stone","a monolith sigil"} if table.contains(st,v.name) then str = str.."\n "..v.id.." - "..v.name end end
end
if player(target) and class == "Defiler" then str = defiler.dbp() end
cecho("dbp_ui",str) end -- end dbp.allow end

Script.name: dbp.ui_make_, dbp.ui_refresh_
Script.script:
dbp.ui_make_ = function() local width, height = getMainWindowSize() local fwidth,fheight = calcFontSize(11)
local left = ui.left*width if not dbp.left then left = 0 end setBorderLeft(left)
dbp.ui_ = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="dbp_ui_", x= 0, y= 0, width= 0, -- ui.left*width, height= "10c", }) dbp.ui_:move(0,1*fheight) dbp.ui_:resize(left-20,14*fheight) dbp.ui_:setFontSize(10) dbp.ui_:setColor(0,0,0,0)
if not dbp.left then dbp.ui_:resize(0,0) end end
dbp.ui_refresh_ = function() clearWindow("dbp_ui_") local str = ""
if dbp.allow_ and player(me) then
local count, mcount, buffer = 0, 0, 5 local level = 0.35 -- for trax 2 local tablen = {}
if config and config.trax == 2 then tablen = ecopy(dbp.players_[me].affs_) else tablen = ecopy(dbp.players_[me].affs) end
local lock_affs = { "anorexia", "asthma", "hemotoxin", "impatience", "numbness", "slickness", }
local c_affs = {}
if config and config.trax == 2 then
for i=1,#lock_affs do str = str.."\n" local dis,turb = "", "" local score = has(me,lock_affs[i]) local aff = lock_affs[i]
dis = string.format("%3.2f", score) turb = string.rpad(aff ,23," ")
if score >= level then dis = "<green>"..dis.."<grey>" turb = "<green>"..turb.."<grey>" else dis = "<saddle_brown>"..dis.."<grey>" turb = "<dim_grey>"..turb.."<grey>" end str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end
str = str.."\n" for i=1,#c_affs do str = str.."\n" local dis,turb = "", "" local score = has(me,c_affs[i]) local aff = c_affs[i]
dis = string.format("%3.2f", score) turb = string.rpad(aff,23," ") if score >= level then mcount = mcount + 1 if mcount > buffer then else dis = "<green>"..dis.."<grey>" turb = "<green>"..turb.."<grey>" str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end else dis = "<saddle_brown>"..dis.."<grey>" turb = "<dim_grey>"..turb.."<grey>" str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end end
str = str.."\n" for k,v in pairs(tablen) do if not table.contains(lock_affs,k) and not table.contains(c_affs,k) and v >= level then local dis,turb = "", "" dis = "<green>"..string.format("%3.2f",v).."<grey>" turb = string.rpad(k,23," ") turb = "<green>"..turb.."<grey>" mcount = mcount + 1 if mcount > buffer then else str = str.."\n["..dis.."] "..turb end end end
else
for i=1,#lock_affs do str = str.."\n" local dis,turb = "", "" turb = string.rpad(lock_affs[i],23," ") if has(me,lock_affs[i]) then dis = "<green>x<grey>" turb = "<green>"..turb.."<grey>" else dis = "<saddle_brown>o<grey>" turb = "<dim_grey>"..turb.."<grey>" end str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end
str = str.."\n" for i=1,#c_affs do str = str.."\n" local dis,turb = "", "" turb = string.rpad(c_affs[i],23," ") if has(target,c_affs[i]) then mcount = mcount + 1 if mcount > buffer then else dis = "<green>x<grey>" turb = "<green>"..turb.."<grey>" str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end else dis = "<saddle_brown>o<grey>" turb = "<dim_grey>"..turb.."<grey>" str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end end
str = str.."\n" for k,v in pairs(tablen) do if not table.contains(lock_affs,k) and not table.contains(c_affs,k) and v then local dis,turb = "", "" dis = "<green>x<grey>" turb = string.rpad(k,23," ") turb = "<green>"..turb.."<grey>" mcount = mcount + 1 if mcount > buffer then else str = str.."\n["..dis.."] "..turb end end end end
local pre = "Visual: <gold>"..me.."<grey>" if mcount > buffer then mcount = mcount - buffer pre = pre.." <red>+("..mcount..")<grey>" str = str.."\n<red>" for i=1,mcount do str = str.."+" end end pre = pre.."\n" str = pre..str.."<grey>"
cecho("dbp_ui_",str) end end

Script.name: dbp.timer
Script.script:
dbp.timer = function() local time = os.time() if player(target) then
_hload(target)
-- tree local tree = has(target,"tree") local tree_time = has(target,"tree_time")
if tree_time ~= 0 then if (time - tree_time) > 18 then set(target,"tree",true) set(target,"tree_time",0) if not numbness and not paralysis then trax.cure_type(target,"tree") end end end
-- purge local purge = has(target,"purge") local purge_time = has(target,"purge_time")
if purge_time ~= 0 then if (time - purge_time) > 18 then set(target,"purge",true) set(target,"purge_time",0) if not hemotoxin then trax.cure_type(target,"purge") end end end
-- focus local focus = has(target,"focus") local focus_time = has(target,"focus_time")
if focus_time ~= 0 then if (time - focus_time) > 18 then set(target,"focus",true) set(target,"focus_time",0) if not impatience then trax.cure_type(target,"focus") end end end
-- herb local herb = has(target,"herb") local herb_time = has(target,"herb_time")
if herb_time ~= 0 then if (time - herb_time) > 2 then set(target,"herb",true) set(target,"herb_time",0) end end
-- smoke local smoke = has(target,"smoke") local smoke_time = has(target,"smoke_time") local smoke_delay = tonumber(has(target,"smoke_delay"))
if smoke_time ~= 0 then if (time - smoke_time) > smoke_delay then set(target,"smoke",true) set(target,"smoke_time",0) set(target,"smoke_delay",0) if not asthma then trax.cure_type(target,"laurel") end if not asthma then trax.cure_type(target,"lovage") end end end
-- peace cooldown local peace_time = has(target,"peace_time")
if peace_time ~= 0 then if (time - peace_time) > 5 then set(target,"peace_time",0) cecho(sysfix.." <white>Peace down for "..target..".") end end
-- tick watchers: masochism, sunallergy local sunallergy_tick = has(target,"sunallergy_tick") local masochism_tick = has(target,"masochism_tick") if sunallergy_tick ~= 0 then if (time - sunallergy_tick) > 5 then trax.take(target,"sunallergy") set(target,"sunallergy_tick",0) cecho(sysfix.." <white>Resetting SUNALLERGY for "..target..". Tick missed.") end end if masochism_tick ~= 0 then if (time - masochism_tick) > 5 then trax.take(target,"masochism") set(target,"masochism_tick",0) cecho(sysfix.." <white>Resetting MASOCHISM for "..target..". Tick missed.") end end
if eqbal_time ~= 0 then if (time - eqbal_time) > 10 then eqbal = "" eqbal_time = 0 end end
-- last parry local last_parry_time = has(target,"last_parry_time")
if last_parry_time ~= 0 then if (time - last_parry_time) > 30 then set(target,"last_parry", "") set(target,"last_parry_time",0) end end
end end

ScriptGroup.name: website scraping
ScriptGroup.script:
dbp.screen_current = dbp.screen_current or ""
dbp.time = dbp.time or 0 dbp.tablen = dbp.tablen or {} dbp.changes = dbp.changes or 0 dbp.changes_p = dbp.changes_p or 0 dbp.data = dbp.data or 0

Script.name: dbp.screen
Script.script:
dbp.screen = function() dbp.tablen = {} dbp.changes = 0 dbp.changes_p = 0 dbp.data = 0 dbp.time = os.time()
for k,v in pairs(dbp.players) do if v.circle == "" or v.circle == "A" or v.circle == "D" or v.circle == "M" then table.insert(dbp.tablen, tostring(k)) end end
table.sort(dbp.tablen)
local arg = dbp.tablen[1] table.remove(dbp.tablen,1) dbp.download(arg) end

Script.name: dbp.download
Script.script: dbp.download = function(name) dbp.screen_current = getMudletHomeDir().."/player" if dbp.download_ then if not downloadFile then cecho("<white>\n[EDEN]: - Your version of Mudlet doesn't support downloading files. Please upgrade to 2.0+") else downloadFile( dbp.screen_current, "http://www.imperian.com/game/honors/Imperian/"..name ) end end end

Script.name: dbp.done
Script.script:
dbp.done = function(_, filename) if not io.exists(filename) then return end
if filename == tostring( dbp.screen_current ) then local f,s = io.open(filename) -- if f:seek("end") then dbp.data = dbp.data + tonumber(f:seek("end")) end if f then s = f:read("*a"); io.close(f) end
local c = string.match( s, "City: (%w+)" ) local name = string.match( s, "Name: (%w+)" ) local t = { Stavenn = "D", Khandava = "D", Kinsarmar = "M", Celidon = "M", Antioch = "A", Ithaqua = "A", }
if t[c] then local circ = dbp.gcirc(name) if t[c] ~= circ then dbp.circ(name,t[c]) dbp.changes = dbp.changes + 1 end end
local prof = string.match( s, "Profession: (%w+)" ) if prof and dbp.gprof(name) ~= prof then dbp.prof(name,prof) dbp.changes_p = dbp.changes_p + 1 end
if next(dbp.tablen) == nil then local str = "" local time = os.time()
dbp.time = time - dbp.time
str = str.."\n<white>[Completed Screening Protocol]" str = str.."\n<white> - Total circle changes made: "..dbp.changes str = str.."\n<white> - Total profession changes made: "..dbp.changes_p -- str = str.."\n<white> - Total size downloaded: "..( tonumber(dbp.data) / 1000 ).." kB" str = str.."\n<white> - Time taken: "..dbp.time.." seconds"
cecho(str) dbp.tablen = {} dbp.changes = 0 dbp.changes_p = 0 dbp.data = 0 dbp.time = 0 else cecho("\n<red>STARTING REVIEW FOR "..dbp.tablen[1]) local arg = dbp.tablen[1] table.remove(dbp.tablen,1) dbp.download(arg) end
os.remove(filename) end end

ScriptGroup.name: trax
ScriptGroup.script:
trax = trax or {}
-- cures trax.pending_name = trax.pending_name or "" trax.pending = trax.pending or ""
-- toxins trax.pending_toxin_name = trax.pending_toxin_name or "" trax.pending_toxin = trax.pending_toxin or ""
-- limbs trax.pending_limb_name = trax.pending_limb_name or "" trax.pending_limb = trax.pending_limb or ""

Script.name: trax.give
Script.script:
trax.give = function(name,aff,suppress) if player(name) then if aff == "sensitivity" then if not has(name,"undeaf") then aff = "undeaf" end end if name == me and config.trax == 1 and has(me,"paralysis") and aff == "numbness" then elseif name == me and config.trax == 2 and dbp.players_[name].affs_.paralysis == 1 and aff == "numbness" then else dbp.players_[name].affs[aff] = true dbp.players_[name].affs_[aff] = 1 end if dbp then dbp.ui_refresh() dbp.ui_refresh_() end
-- Handle peace internal cooldown if aff == "peace" and has(name,"peace_time") == 0 then set(name,"peace_time",os.time()) end
-- Handle tick watchers local ticks = { "masochism","sunallergy" } if table.contains(ticks,aff) then set(name,aff.."_tick",os.time()) end
local t = {"impatience","asthma","slickness"} if me == "Iniar" then if config.share_full and name ~= me and not suppress then local str = "" -- str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..aff..sp -- send(str) elseif config.share and name ~= me and table.contains(t,aff) and not suppress then local str = "" -- str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..aff..sp -- send(str) end end end end

Script.name: trax.take
Script.script:
trax.take = function(name,aff,hide) if not aff then aff = name name = me end if player(name) then -- if it was false to begin with, then take count from random_affs if dbp.players_[name].affs[aff] == false then local random_affs = has(name,"random_affs") if random_affs > 0 then set(name,"random_affs",random_affs - 1) cecho("\n<white>Assuming Random Aff...") end end
-- set to false dbp.players_[name].affs[aff] = false dbp.players_[name].affs_[aff] = 0
-- Limbs before all Things if aff == "crippled right leg" then set(target,"right_leg",0) set(target,"right_legtime",0) end if aff == "crippled left leg" then set(target,"left_leg",0) set(target,"left_leg_time",0) end if aff == "crippled right arm" then set(target,"right_arm",0) set(target,"right_arm_time",0) end if aff == "crippled left arm" then set(target,"left_arm",0) set(target,"left_arm_time",0) end
-- Deal with Instilled if has(name,"instill_pending") == aff then set(name,"instill."..aff, false) set(name,"instill_pending","") killTimer(instill_time) cecho("\n<red>Failure instilling <green>"..aff.."<red> onto "..name.."!") end local ex = {"hemotoxin","sunallergy"} if table.contains(ex,aff) and has(name,"instill."..aff) then set(name,"instill."..aff, false) cecho("\n<red>REMOVING INSTILLED <green>"..aff.."<red> FROM "..name.."!") end
if aff == "undeaf" then dbp.players_[name].affs["sensitivity"] = false dbp.players_[name].affs_["sensitivity"] = 0 end
if name == me then hide = true end -- display if not hide then if name ~= target then cecho(" <dim_grey>-"..aff.." ("..name..") ") else cecho(" <cornflower_blue>-"..aff.." ("..name..") ") end end
-- refresh UI if dbp then dbp.ui_refresh() dbp.ui_refresh_() end end end

Script.name: trax.cure
Script.script:
trax.cure = function(name,cure) local flag = false if name ~= "" and cure ~= "" and dban[cure] then -- OPEN
if config and config.trax == 2 then local count = 0 for i=1, #dban[cure] do if has(name,dban[cure][i]) > 0 and dba[dban[cure][i]].m_take == "" then count = count + 1 flag = true end end
if count > 0 then count = 1/count for i=1, #dban[cure] do local aff = dban[cure][i] if has(name,aff) > 0 and dba[aff].m_take == "" then local short = dbp.players_[name].affs_[aff] short = short - count if name == target then local str = "("..name..":"..cure..") " str = str.."-"..string.format("%0.2f",count).." "..aff.." " vw:report("Misc",str,true) end if short < 0 then short = 0 trax.take(name,aff) end dbp.players_[name].affs_[aff] = short end end end
if dbp then dbp.ui_refresh() dbp.ui_refresh_() end else -- Cycle through known afflictions to cure for i=1, #dban[cure] do -- display(dban[cure][i]) if has(name,dban[cure][i]) and dba[dban[cure][i]].m_take == "" then trax.take(name,dban[cure][i]) flag = true break end end end
end -- CLOSE
-- If you did not cure any afflictions, take a random aff
-- exclusion table local exc_t = {"quince","primrose","juniper","hyssop","violet","toadstool","linseed"}
if not flag and not table.contains(exc_t,cure) then local random_affs = has(name,"random_affs") if random_affs > 0 then set(name,"random_affs",random_affs - 1) cecho("\n<white>Taking Random Aff...") end end
-- Clear the memory trax.pending_name = "" trax.pending = "" end

Script.name: trax.cure_type
Script.script: trax.cure_type = function(name,type) if player(name) then for k,v in pairs(dbp.players_[name].affs) do if v and dba[k]["p_"..type] then trax.take(name,k) end end for k,v in pairs(dbp.players_[name].affs_) do if v > 0 and dba[k]["p_"..type] then trax.take(name,k) end end end end

Script.name: trax.process_limb
Script.script: trax.process_limb = function(name,tlimb) if trax.pending_limb ~= "" and trax.pending_limb_name ~= "" then trax.pending_limb = trax.pending_limb:gsub(" ","_") local count = tonumber(has(trax.pending_limb_name,trax.pending_limb)) count = count + 1 if class == "Defiler" and defiler.attack_type == "ravage" then count = count + 1 end set(trax.pending_limb_name,trax.pending_limb,count) set(trax.pending_limb_name,trax.pending_limb.."_time",os.time()) end trax.pending_limb_name = name trax.pending_limb = tlimb end

Script.name: trax.process_toxin
Script.script:
trax.process_toxin = function(name,toxin) if trax.pending_toxin_name ~= "" and trax.pending_toxin ~= "" then trax.pending_toxin = revlookup(trax.pending_toxin,dban.toxin_dictionary) if trax.pending_toxin == "crippled left arm" and has(trax.pending_toxin_name,"crippled left arm") then trax.pending_toxin = "crippled right arm" elseif trax.pending_toxin == "crippled right arm" and has(trax.pending_toxin_name,"crippled right arm") then trax.pending_toxin = "crippled left arm" end if trax.pending_toxin == "crippled left leg" and has(trax.pending_toxin_name,"crippled left leg") then trax.pending_toxin = "crippled right leg" elseif trax.pending_toxin == "crippled right leg" and has(trax.pending_toxin_name,"crippled right leg") then trax.pending_toxin = "crippled left leg" end
-- handle insomnia and opium if player(trax.pending_toxin_name) and trax.pending_toxin == "opium" then if has(trax.pending_toxin_name,"insomnia") then set(trax.pending_toxin_name,"insomnia",false) trax.pending_toxin = "" else trax.pending_toxin = "sleep" end end
trax.give(trax.pending_toxin_name, trax.pending_toxin) if class == "Defiler" then -- insert into set(trax.pending_toxin_name,"corrosion."..trax.pending_toxin,os.time()) end end trax.pending_toxin_name = name trax.pending_toxin = toxin end

ScriptGroup.name: limb

Script.name: limb.timer
limb.display
Script.script:
limb.display = function(name) local a,b,c = "","","" local neutral = "<grey>" local time = os.time()
local fx = function(name,var) local z,y,zc,yc = "","","<dim_grey>","<dim_grey> " -- look carefully! z = has(name,var) y = has(name,var.."_time")
if z > 0 then zc = "<green>" yc = "<green> " end if y ~= 0 then y = 60 - (time - y) if y < 11 then yc = "<red> " end end if y == 0 then y = " 0" end z = string.lpad(tostring(z),2," ") y = string.lpad(tostring(y),2) return z,y,zc,yc end
if player(name) then -- A Block -- head local head,head_time,head_c,head_time_c = fx(name,"head")
a = a.." " a = a.."[HE: "..head_c..head..head_time_c..head_time..neutral.."] " a = a.." "
-- B Block -- right arm local rarm,rarm_time,rarm_c,rarm_time_c = fx(name,"right_arm") -- torso local torso,torso_time,torso_c,torso_time_c = fx(name,"torso") -- left arm local larm,larm_time,larm_c,larm_time_c = fx(name,"left_arm")
b = b.."[RA: "..rarm_c..rarm..rarm_time_c..rarm_time..neutral.."] " b = b.."[TO: "..torso_c..torso..torso_time_c..torso_time..neutral.."] " b = b.."[LA: "..larm_c..larm..larm_time_c..larm_time..neutral.."] "
-- C Block -- right leg local rleg,rleg_time,rleg_c,rleg_time_c = fx(name,"right_leg") -- left leg local lleg,lleg_time,lleg_c,lleg_time_c = fx(name,"left_leg")
c = c.."[RL: "..rleg_c..rleg..rleg_time_c..rleg_time..neutral.."] " c = c.." " -- placeholder c = c.."[LL: "..lleg_c..lleg..lleg_time_c..lleg_time..neutral.."] " end
return a,b,c end

Script.name: limb.counts
Script.script:
limb.counts = function(name) local a,b,c,d,e,f = 0,0,0,0,0,0 local ac,bc,cc,dc,ec,fc = 0,0,0,0,0,0
local fx = function(n) if n ~= 0 then n = 60 - (os.time() - n) end return n end
a = has(name,"head") ac = fx(has(name,"head_time")) b = has(name,"right_arm") bc = fx(has(name,"right_arm_time")) c = has(name,"torso") cc = fx(has(name,"torso_time")) d = has(name,"left_arm") dc = fx(has(name,"left_arm_time")) e = has(name,"right_leg") ec = fx(has(name,"right_leg_time")) f = has(name,"left_leg") fc = fx(has(name,"left_leg_time"))
local t = {a,ac,b,bc,c,cc,d,dc,e,ec,f,fc} return t end

dr.purge = dr.purge or {} dr.purge.bal = dr.purge.bal or true dr.purge.cost = dr.purge.cost or 15 dr.purge.time = dr.purge.time or 0 dr.purge.timer = dr.purge.timer or ""
dr.salve = dr.salve or {} dr.salve.bal = dr.salve.bal or true dr.salve.cost = dr.salve.cost or 1 dr.salve.time = dr.salve.time or 0 dr.salve.timer = dr.salve.timer or ""

Script.name: dr.heal
Script.script:
dr.heal = function()
-- if diabolist in room and infirmity then mana < 50 + 10*infirmity -- if diabolist/priest in room and mana < 50 then mana -- if druid in room and mana < 10 then mana
local str = "" php = hp/mhp pmp = mp/mxmp
-- if php < health and pmp < mana then if php < health then if dr.sip.bal and not dr.lockout.sip and dr.resource.health and not has("anorexia") then str = str.."sip health"..sp if has("blackout") then dr.consume("sip") end dr.lock("sip") end elseif pmp < mana then if dr.sip.bal and not dr.lockout.sip and dr.resource.mana and not has("anorexia") then str = str.."sip mana"..sp if has("blackout") then dr.consume("sip") end dr.lock("sip") end end if (php < toadstool or pmp < toadstool) and not str:match("sip") then if dr.toadstool.bal and not dr.lockout.toadstool and dr.resource.toadstool and not has("anorexia") then str = str.."eat toadstool"..sp if has("blackout") then dr.consume("toadstool") end dr.lock("toadstool") end end if gmcp.Room.Info.area ~= "Nowhere" then send(str) end end
dr.clotter = function() local str = ""
if bleed > 15 and mp/mxmp > 0.5 then if not dr.lockout.clot and dr.resource.clot then str = str.."clot"..sp str = str.."clot"..sp str = str.."clot"..sp str = str.."clot"..sp str = str.."clot"..sp if has("blackout") then dr.consume("clot") end dr.lock("clot") end end if gmcp.Room.Info.area ~= "Nowhere" or gmcp.Room.Info.area ~= "the Underworld" then send(str) end end

Script.name: dr.lock
Script.script: dr.lock = function(arg) dr.lockout[arg] = true if dr.lockout[arg.."_timer"] and not dr.lockout[arg.."_timer"] == "" then killTimer(dr.lockout[arg.."_timer"]) end dr.lockout[arg.."_timer"] = tempTimer(1, function() dr.lockout[arg] = false killTimer(dr.lockout[arg.."_timer"]) end) end

Script.name: dr.consume
Script.script: dr.consume = function(arg,var) dr[arg].bal = false if dr[arg].timer and not dr[arg].timer == "" then killTimer(dr[arg].timer) end local seconds = var or dr[arg].cost dr[arg].timer = tempTimer(seconds, function() dr[arg].bal = true killTimer(dr[arg].timer) end) end

Script.name: wield l,r
Script.script:
wield = function() local str = "" if (not left or left == "") or (not right or right == "") then if quickdraw then str = str.."quickdraw ".._l if right then str = str.." ".._r end else str = str.."unwield left"..sp str = str.."unwield right"..sp str = str.."wield ".._l if _r then str = str..sp str = str.."wield ".._r end end end
return str end

Script.name: target system
Script.script:
targets = targets or {} tloc = tloc or 0
function _target(t1,t2) t1 = string.title(string.lower(t1)) local tx,str,rank = 0,"",3 if t2 and t2 ~= "a" then t2 = tonumber(t2) if targets[t2] then tx = targets[t2] end end
if player(target) then _hl(target) end if player(t1) and t2 ~= "a" then _hl(t1,"red") end
if t2 then -- retrieve argument if t1 == "" then if targets[t2] == nil then -- no target to retrieve cecho("
<red>No target assigned to <gold>"..t2.."<red>. Target remains <gold>"..target.."<red>.") else -- retrieve target target = tx _hl(tx,"red") cecho("
<red>Target changed to <gold>"..tx.."<red>!") end -- allocate new target to table elseif t2 == "a" then for i=10,100 do if not targets[i] then targets[i] = t1 break end end else targets[t2] = t1 target = t1 cecho("
<red>Target acquired: <gold>"..t1.."<red>!") cecho("
<red>Target from: <gold>t"..t2.."<red>!") end elseif t1 then -- unspecified location -- reset the rankings if tloc >= rank then target = t1 tloc = 1 table.remove(targets,tloc) table.insert(targets,tloc,t1) cecho("
<red>Target acquired: <gold>"..t1.."<red>!") cecho("
<red>Target assigned to: <gold>t"..tloc.."<red>!") -- add to the next rank else target = t1 tloc = tloc + 1 table.remove(targets,tloc) table.insert(targets,tloc,t1) cecho("
<red>Target acquired: <gold>"..t1.."<red>!") cecho("
<red>Target assigned to: <gold>t"..tloc.."<red>!") end end
if overmind then overmind.ui_refresh() end end

Script.name: hotload _hload
Script.script: _hload = function(name) if config and config.trax == 2 then local level = 0 if config and config.hload then level = config.hload end for aff, into in pairs(dba) do _G[aff] = nil _G[aff] = dbp.players_[name].affs_[aff] if _G[aff] >= level then _G[aff] = true else _G[aff] = false end end else for aff, into in pairs(dba) do _G[aff] = nil _G[aff] = dbp.players_[name].affs[aff] end end end

Script.name: highlights _hl
Script.script:
highlights = highlights or {}
_hl = function(name,color) if config.hl then
-- CODE -- local pattern = name.."[^A-Za-z]" local color = color or "pale_green"
if dbp.players[name] and c[dbp.players[name].circle] and color == "pale_green" then color = c[dbp.players[name].circle] end
if highlights[name] then killTrigger( highlights[name] ) end highlights[name] = tempRegexTrigger(pattern, [[ for i=1,50 do if selectString(']]..name..[[',i) > -1 then fg(']]..color..[[') resetFormat() end end ]]) -- END CODE --
end end
_hla = function() local count = 0 for k in pairs(dbp.players) do _hl(k) count = count + 1 end cecho("\n<white> - EDEN - <grey>Created "..count.." highlights.") end
_uhl = function(name) if name then if highlights[name] then killTrigger( highlights[name] ) end cecho("\n<white> - EDEN - <grey>Killed "..name.."'s highlights.") else local count = 0 for k in pairs(dbp.players) do if highlights[k] then killTrigger(highlights[k]) highlights[k] = nil count = count + 1 end end cecho("\n<white> - EDEN - <grey>Deleted "..count.." highlights.") end end

Script.name: [d] Iniar
Script.script:
Iniar = { -- [[ Globals ]] config = { prompt = "*h&d[%h&d] *m&d[%m&d] *b *i &d*B *s &d*x *w&n", hl = true, trax = 2, hload = 0.35, share = true, share_full = true, sub_special = true, },
gold = 227522,
leather = 127405, ringmail = 138780, scalemail = 230209, chainmail = 77246, splintmail = 0, fieldplate = 231333, fullplate = 191756,
plategreaves = 180347, platevambraces = 202101,
shield = 56320, buckler = 0, cavalry = 0, banded = 0, kite = 0, tower = 0,
sabre = 276801, broadsword = 151012, claymore = 272591, flail = 185840, axe = 54511,
wields = { Assassin = { "dirk", "whip", "scalemail" }, Deathknight = { "shield", "sabre", "fullplate", "vambraces", "greaves" }, Defiler = { "shield", "flail", "chainmail" }, Diabolist = { "shield", "daegger", "ringmail" }, Summoner = { "shield", "axe", "scalemail" }, Wytch = { "shield", "tablet", "scalemail" }, },
descs = { tanari = "", norrjin = "", muamrite = "", sylayan = "", sidhe = "He is a gnarly old elf, a wasted body with badly stitched scars. He has crooked hands, victims of arthritis and long hours of abuse practicing his art. Deep lines mark his face, the pockmarked skin stretched taut across his skill framing thinly pressed, pale lips and a crooked nose. He is missing several teeth and the ones he has left are in poor condition. His golden irises are set in sunken eyes and it would be easy to miss them, thin as they are, if not for the specks of turquoise lining the pupils.", akrabi = "", kohdon = "", ssylsin = "", lycaean = "", dwarf = "", lamira = "", xiur = "Granite surfaces cover almost the entirety of this towering behemoth, imperfect slabs of rock marred by the efforts of a thousand blades seeking to strike down the Nullheart. A weathered and ancient face stares out at you with wizened eyes, golden irises set deeply within shadowed crevices of a fracture faceplate. The smell of burning ozone assaults the senses as this monster lets loose a toothy grin.", cherufe = "Volcano rock man.", yeti = "Massive apish man.", minotaur = "Large, powerful bullman.", dryad = "Petite, tree-nymph.", arel = "Radiant, seraph-like man.", wolkin = "Powerful ravenman.", }, } _config()

Script.name: prompt
Script.script:
cfx.prompt = function(len) -- First load up our class or Default 'Deathknight' class local cstr,c = "","" if class then cstr = string.lower(class) else cstr = "deathknight" end if _G[cstr] then c = _G[cstr] else c = _G["deathknight"] end
if c.prompt then vw.private("[Eden]: Custom prompt. - "..cstr) c.prompt(len) -- Or implement the default else local str,neutral = "","<dim_grey>" local a,m = "<grey>","<grey>" local n = 50 n = n - len
str = string.lpad(str,n," ")
if player(target) then local count = dbp.count(target)
str = str..neutral.."[A: "..a..count..neutral.."]" end cecho(str) end end

Script.name: ui_make
Script.script:
cfx.ui_make = function() -- First clear all the class windows: for k,c in pairs(cfx.classes) do c = string.lower(c) if _G[c] and _G[c].ui then vw.private("[Eden]: Clearing ui_make of "..c..".") _G[c].ui:resize(0,0) end end
-- Next load up our class or Default 'Deathknight' class local cstr,c = "","" if class then cstr = string.lower(class) else cstr = "deathknight" end if _G[cstr] then c = _G[cstr] else c = _G["deathknight"] -- _G[cstr] = {} -- cannot use this because can't over write a 100% novel class end
-- Retrieve a custom class' ui_make() if c.ui_make then if overmind and overmind.allow then vw.private("[Eden]: Creating ui_make using "..cstr..".ui_make + Overmind.") c.ui_make("bottom",11,3) else vw.private("[Eden]: Creating ui_make using "..cstr..".ui_make.") c.ui_make() end -- Or implement the default else vw.private("[Eden]: Using default ui_make() render. - Class: "..cstr..".") -- default render of ui_make local internal_size, h, n = 11, 3, 8
local fsize, offset = 11, 0 if overmind and overmind.allow then fsize = 11 offset = 3 end
local width, height = getMainWindowSize() local fwidth,fheight = calcFontSize(internal_size) local f_width,f_height = calcFontSize(fsize)
if not _G[c] then _G[c] = {} end -- in case of undefined class
c.ui = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name=cstr.."_ui", -- this code needs checking x= 0, y= 0, width= 0, height= 0, }) c.ui:setFontSize(10) c.ui:setColor(0,0,0,0)
local x = 0 if dbp and dbp.left then x = ui.left*width end
local hg = height-(h*fheight + n/2) if overmind and overmind.allow then hg = height-(h*fheight + offset*f_height + n/2) setBorderBottom(h*fheight+offset*f_height+n) else setBorderBottom(h*fheight+n) end
c.ui:move(x,hg) c.ui:resize(width,h*fheight) end end

Script.name: ui_refresh
Script.script:
cfx.ui_refresh = function() -- First clear all the class windows: for k,c in pairs(cfx.classes) do c = string.lower(c) if _G[c] and _G[c].ui then --clearWindow(c.."_ui") end end
-- Next load up our class or Default 'Deathknight' class local cstr,c = "","" if class then cstr = string.lower(class) else cstr = "deathknight" end if _G[cstr] then c = _G[cstr] else c = _G["deathknight"] -- _G[cstr] = {} end
-- Retrieve a custom class' ui_refresh() if c.ui_refresh then c.ui_refresh() -- Or implement the default else clearWindow(cstr.."_ui") local str = "" local time = os.time() local neutral = "<grey>"
local color = "<goldenrod>" if player(target) then color = "<medium_aquamarine>" end
-- first part ------------- str = str.."T: "..color..target..neutral.." "
-- second part -------------- str = str.."\n"
local parry_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.parry ~= "nothing" then parry_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."P: "..parry_c..string.title(limb.parry)..neutral
-- third part ------------- str = str.."\n"
local limb_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.target ~= "nothing" then limb_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."T: "..limb_c..string.title(limb.target)
cecho(cstr.."_ui",str) end end

Script.name: timer
Script.script:
cfx.timer = function() -- First load up our class or Default 'Deathknight' class local c = "" if class then c = string.lower(class) else c = "deathknight" end
if _G[c].timer then _G[c].timer() -- Or implement the default elseif _G[c].ui_refresh then _G[c].ui_refresh() end end
