Script.name: prompt
Script.script:
predator.prompt = function(len) local str,neutral = "","<dim_grey>" local a,m = "<grey>","<grey>" local n = 50 n = n - len
str = string.lpad(str,n," ")
if player(target) then local count = dbp.count(target)
str = str..neutral.."[A: "..a..count..neutral.."]"
end
if class == "Predator" then cecho(str) end end

Script.name: ui_refresh
Script.script:
predator.ui_refresh = function() clearWindow("predator_ui") local str = "" local time = os.time() local neutral = "<grey>"
-- first part ------------- if player(target) then -- head local head = has(target,"head") local head_time = has(target,"head_time") local head_c = "<dim_grey>" local head_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if head > 0 then head_c = "<green>" head_time_c = "<green> " end if head_time ~= 0 then head_time = 60 - (time - head_time) if head_time < 11 then head_time_c = "<red> " end end head = string.lpad(tostring(head),2," ") head_time = string.lpad(tostring(head_time),2," ")
str = str.." " str = str.."[HE: "..head_c..head..head_time_c..head_time..neutral.."] " str = str.." " end
local color = "<goldenrod>" if player(target) and has(target,"gutwyrm") then color = "<medium_aquamarine>" end
str = str.."T: "..color..target..neutral.." "
local cn = "<grey>" if q_color[q_type] then cn = "<"..q_color[q_type]..">" end str = str.." [:"..cn..q_type..neutral.."]"
str = str.."\n" -- second part ------------- if player(target) then -- right arm local rarm = has(target,"right_arm") local rarm_time = has(target,"right_arm_time") local rarm_c = "<dim_grey>" local rarm_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if rarm > 0 then rarm_c = "<green>" rarm_time_c = "<green> " end if rarm_time ~= 0 then rarm_time = 60 - (time - rarm_time) if rarm_time < 11 then rarm_time_c = "<red> " end end rarm = string.lpad(tostring(rarm),2," ") rarm_time = string.lpad(tostring(rarm_time),2," ")
str = str.."[RA: "..rarm_c..rarm..rarm_time_c..rarm_time..neutral.."] "
-- torso local torso = has(target,"torso") local torso_time = has(target,"torso_time") local torso_c = "<dim_grey>" local torso_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if torso > 0 then torso_c = "<green>" torso_time_c = "<green> " end if torso_time ~= 0 then torso_time = 60 - (time - torso_time) if torso_time < 11 then torso_time_c = "<red> " end end torso = string.lpad(tostring(torso),2," ") torso_time = string.lpad(tostring(torso_time),2," ")
str = str.."[TO: "..torso_c..torso..torso_time_c..torso_time..neutral.."] "
-- left arm local larm = has(target,"left_arm") local larm_time = has(target,"left_arm_time") local larm_c = "<dim_grey>" local larm_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if larm > 0 then larm_c = "<green>" larm_time_c = "<green> " end if larm_time ~= 0 then larm_time = 60 - (time - larm_time) if larm_time < 11 then larm_time_c = "<red> " end end larm = string.lpad(tostring(larm),2," ") larm_time = string.lpad(tostring(larm_time),2," ")
str = str.."[LA: "..larm_c..larm..larm_time_c..larm_time..neutral.."] "
local limb_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.target ~= "nothing" then limb_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."T: "..limb_c..string.lpad(string.title(limb.target),11," ")..neutral
local parry_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.parry ~= "nothing" then parry_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.." P: "..parry_c..string.lpad(string.title(limb.parry),11," ")..neutral
str = str.."\n"
-- right leg local rleg = has(target,"right_leg") local rleg_time = has(target,"right_leg_time") local rleg_c = "<dim_grey>" local rleg_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if rleg > 0 then rleg_c = "<green>" rleg_time_c = "<green> " end if rleg_time ~= 0 then rleg_time = 60 - (time - rleg_time) if rleg_time < 11 then rleg_time_c = "<red> " end end rleg = string.lpad(tostring(rleg),2," ") rleg_time = string.lpad(tostring(rleg_time),2," ")
str = str.."[RL: "..rleg_c..rleg..rleg_time_c..rleg_time..neutral.."] "
-- placeholder str = str.." "
-- left leg local lleg = has(target,"left_leg") local lleg_time = has(target,"left_leg_time") local lleg_c = "<dim_grey>" local lleg_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if lleg > 0 then lleg_c = "<green>" lleg_time_c = "<green> " end if lleg_time ~= 0 then lleg_time = 60 - (time - lleg_time) if lleg_time < 11 then lleg_time_c = "<red> " end end lleg = string.lpad(tostring(lleg),2," ") lleg_time = string.lpad(tostring(lleg_time),2," ")
str = str.."[LL: "..lleg_c..lleg..lleg_time_c..lleg_time..neutral.."] " end
-- third part ------------- --str = str.."\n"
local stance = "<dim_grey>" if predator.stance == "Vae-Sant" then stance = "<gold>" end if predator.stance == "none" then stance = "<red>" end stance = stance..string.lpad(predator.stance,10," ")
local hid, mas, ww, con, nit, avr = "<red>","<red>","<red>","<red>","<red>","<red>" local obf, dod, pcg, rgn, shr = "<red>","<red>","<red>","<red>","<red>"
if predator.defences.hide then hid = "<green>" end if predator.defences.mask then mas = "<green>" end if predator.defences.windwalk then ww = "<green>" end if predator.defences.constitution then con = "<green>" end if predator.defences.nightsight then nit = "<green>" end if predator.defences.aversion then avr = "<green>" end if predator.defences.obfuscate then obf = "<green>" end if predator.defences.dodging then dod = "<green>" end if predator.defences.pacing then pcg = "<green>" end if predator.defences.regen then rgn = "<green>" end if predator.defences.shrug ~= "" then shr = "<green>" end
str = str.."St: "..stance..neutral.." " str = str.."["..dod.."DOD"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..rgn.."RGN"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..mas.."MAS"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..obf.."OBF"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..hid.."HID"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..ww .."WW "..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..con.."CON"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..nit.."NIT"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..avr.."AVR"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..pcg.."PCG"..neutral.."] " str = str.."Shrug: "..shr..predator.defences.shrug
cecho("predator_ui",str) end

Script.name: reset
Script.script: predator.reset = function() predator.stance = "none" predator.surge = 1 predator.combo = 3 predator.n_stance = "" end

Script.name: timer
Script.script:
predator.timer = function() if class == "Predator" then
-- operate only on 'target' otherwise the overhead is too big local time = os.time()
if player(target) then
end
predator.ui_refresh() end end

Script.name: choose_toxin
Script.script:
predator.choose_toxin = function(name,list) if not player(name) and type(name) == "table" then list = name name = me end _hload(name)
local toxin,toxin2 = "","" local list = list or ecopy(predator.toxins)
if q_type == "wAfflictor" then list = { "sunallergy", "nausea", "metrazol", "hemotoxin", "butisol", "recklessness", "anorexia", "weariness", "clumsiness", "calotropis", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "slow balance", "slow equilibrium", "withered throat",
"numbness", "asthma", "slickness", "stupidity", "dizziness", "sensitivity", "ignorance", "disloyalty", } end
if has(name,"paralysis") then table.remove(list,table.index_of(list,"numbness")) end
for i=1, #list do if not _G[list[i]] then toxin = list[i] break end end for i=1, #list do if list[i] ~= toxin and not _G[list[i]] then toxin2 = list[i] break end end
toxin = lookup(toxin,dban.toxin_dictionary) toxin2 = lookup(toxin2,dban.toxin_dictionary)
return toxin,toxin2 end

Script.name: predator.bash
Script.script:
predator.bash = function(arg) local name = arg or target local str = ""
if predator.stance == "Ein-Fasit" then str = "combo vertical lateral vertical " if predator.surge == 2 then str = str.."lateral " end elseif predator.stance == "Vae-Sant" then str = "combo lateral vertical lateral " if predator.surge == 2 then str = str.."vertical " end else str = "combo Ein-Fasit vertical lateral " if predator.surge == 2 then str = str.."vertical " end end str = str..name..sp
return str end

Script.name: predator.check
Script.script:
predator.check = function(arg,atk) local stance, nstance = predator.stance, predator.n_stance
if predator.combo >= 3 then if predator.from[stance][atk] ~= "impossible" then predator.n_stance = predator.from[stance][atk] return true end return false else if predator.from[nstance][atk] ~= "impossible" then predator.n_stance = predator.from[nstance][atk] return true end return false end return false end

Script.name: predator.raze
Script.script:
predator.raze = function(arg) local name = arg or target local stance = predator.stance local raze, str = 0, "combo "
if has(name,"shield") then raze = raze + 1 end if has(name,"rebounding") then raze = raze + 1 end
if raze >= 2 then if stance == "Rizet" then str = str.."raze gouge raze " predator.combo = predator.combo - 3 return str, 0 elseif stance == "Vae-Sant" then str = str.."ein-fasit raze raze " predator.combo = predator.combo - 3 return str, 0 else str = str.."raze raze " predator.combo = predator.combo - 2 predator.n_stance = predator.from[predator.stance]["raze"] predator.n_stance = predator.from[predator.n_stance]["raze"] return str, 1 end elseif raze == 1 then if not has(name,"shield") and stance == "Vae-Sant" then str = str.."gouge raze " predator.combo = predator.combo - 2 predator.n_stance = predator.from[predator.stance]["gouge"] predator.n_stance = predator.from[predator.n_stance]["raze"] return str, 1 elseif has(name,"shield") and stance == "Vae-Sant" then str = str.."gyanis raze " predator.combo = predator.combo - 2 predator.n_stance = "Gyanis" predator.n_stance = predator.from[predator.n_stance]["raze"] return str, 1 else str = str.."raze " predator.combo = predator.combo - 1 predator.n_stance = predator.from[predator.stance]["raze"] return str, 2 end else str = str.."" return str, 3 end end

Script.name: predator.arms
Script.script:
predator.arms = function(name,side) if predator.surge == 2 then predator.combo = 4 else predator.combo = 3 end
local name = name or target local str, combo = predator.raze(name) local toxin = predator.choose_toxin(name) local left, right = true, true
if combo > 0 then for i=1,combo do if predator.check(name,"jab") then str = str.."jab " if side then str = str..side.." " else if left then str = str.."left " left = false right = true else str = str.."right " right = false left = true end end elseif predator.check(name,"gouge") then str = str.."gouge " elseif predator.check(name,"lowhook") then str = str.."lowhook left" elseif predator.check(name,"lateral") then str = str.."lateral " elseif predator.check(name,"trip") then str = str.."trip " elseif predator.check(name,"spinslash") then str = str.."spinslash " else str = str.."none " end end end str = str.." "..name.." "..toxin return str end

Script.name: predator.legs
Script.script:
predator.legs = function(name,side) if predator.surge == 2 then predator.combo = 4 else predator.combo = 3 end
local name = name or target local str, combo = predator.raze(name) local toxin = predator.choose_toxin(name) local left, right = true, true
if combo > 0 then for i=1,combo do if predator.check(name,"lowhook") then str = str.."lowhook " if side then str = str..side.." " else if left then str = str.."left " left = false right = true else str = str.."right " right = false left = true end end elseif predator.check(name,"gouge") then str = str.."gouge " elseif predator.check(name,"lowhook") then str = str.."lowhook left" elseif predator.check(name,"lateral") then str = str.."lateral " elseif predator.check(name,"trip") then str = str.."trip " elseif predator.check(name,"spinslash") then str = str.."spinslash " else str = str.."none " end end end str = str.." "..name.." "..toxin return str end

Script.name: predator.tshot
Script.script:
predator.tshot = function(name) local str = "" local t1,t2 = predator.choose_toxin(name) display(t1)
t1 = " "..t1 t2 = " "..t2 str = str.."queue eqbal twinshot "..name..t1..t2
send(str) end

Script.name: predator.lartosis
Script.script:
predator.lartosis = function(name) local str = ""
str = str.."dismount"..sp str = str.."combo spinslash trip spinslash "..name.." lartosis"..sp
send(str) end

Script.name: NewScript
Script.script:
predator.rearm = function(t) local e = ecopy(t)
if next(e) == nil then
else predator.rearm(e) end end

Script.name: predator.ccut
Script.script:
predator.ccut = function(name) if predator.surge == 2 then predator.combo = 4 else predator.combo = 3 end
local name = name or target local str, combo = predator.raze(name) local toxin = predator.choose_toxin(name)
local prone = has(name,"prone") local trip = false
if combo > 0 then for i=1, combo do if not prone and not trip then if stance == "Gyanis" then str = str.."flashkick trip " trip = true else str = str.."trip " trip = true end elseif predator.check(name,"crescentcut") then str = str.."crescentcut " else str = str.."gyanis " end end end
str = str.." "..name.." "..toxin send(str) end

Script.name: predator.fkick
Script.script:
predator.fkick = function(name) if predator.surge == 2 then predator.combo = 4 else predator.combo = 3 end
local name = name or target local str, combo = predator.raze(name) local toxin = predator.choose_toxin(name) -- last parry
local prone = has(name,"prone") local trip = false
if combo > 0 then for i=1, combo do if predator.check(name,"flashkick") then str = str.."flashkick " predator.combo = predator.combo - 1 elseif predator.check(name,"gouge") then str = str.."gouge " predator.combo = predator.combo - 1 else str = str.."Vae-Sant " predator.combo = predator.combo - 1 end end end
str = str.." "..name.." "..toxin send(str) end

Script.name: predator.slit
Script.script:
predator.slit = function(name) if predator.surge == 2 then predator.combo = 4 else predator.combo = 3 end
local name = name or target local str, combo = predator.raze(name) local toxin = predator.choose_toxin(name) -- last parry
local prone = has(name,"prone") local trip = false
if combo > 0 then for i=1, combo do if not prone and predator.check(name,"trip") then str = str.."trip " predator.combo = predator.combo - 1 prone = true elseif predator.check(name,"slit") then str = str.."slit " predator.combo = predator.combo - 1 elseif predator.check(name,"gouge") then str = str.."gouge " predator.combo = predator.combo - 1 else str = str.."Vae-Sant " predator.combo = predator.combo - 1 end end end
str = str.." "..name.." "..toxin send(str) end

Script.name: [d]
Script.script:
ranger.defences = ranger.defences or {} ranger.defences.balancing = ranger.defences.balancing or false ranger.defences.barkskin = ranger.defences.barkskin or false ranger.defences.counter = ranger.defences.counter or false ranger.defences.fitness = ranger.defences.fitness or false ranger.defences.powersoul = ranger.defences.powersoul or false ranger.defences.weathering = ranger.defences.weathering or false
ranger.primary = ranger.primary or "" ranger.secondary = ranger.secondary or ""
ranger.toxins = { "numbness", "hemotoxin", "asthma", "sunallergy", "nausea",
"butisol", "crippled left arm", "anorexia", "slickness", "hemotoxin", "crippled right arm",
"metrazol", "calotropis", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "withered throat", "slickness", "butisol", "recklessness", "stupidity", "dizziness", "sensitivity", "clumsiness", "weariness", "slow equilibrium", "slow balance", "ignorance", "disloyalty", }

Script.name: prompt
Script.script:
ranger.prompt = function(len) local str,neutral = "","<dim_grey>" local a,m = "<grey>","<grey>" local n = 50 n = n - len
str = string.lpad(str,n," ")
if player(target) then local count = dbp.count(target)
str = str..neutral.."[A: "..a..count..neutral.."]"
end
if class == "Ranger" then cecho(str) end end

Script.name: ui_prompt
Script.script:
ranger.ui_refresh = function() clearWindow("ranger_ui") local str = "" local time = os.time() local neutral = "<grey>"
local ps = ranger.defences.powersoul local ps_c = "<grey>" if ps then ps_c = "<gold>" end
-- first part ------------- if player(target) then -- head local head = has(target,"head") local head_time = has(target,"head_time") local head_c = "<dim_grey>" local head_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if head > 0 then head_c = "<green>" head_time_c = "<green> " end if head_time ~= 0 then head_time = 60 - (time - head_time) if head_time < 11 then head_time_c = "<red> " end end head = string.lpad(tostring(head),2," ") head_time = string.lpad(tostring(head_time),2," ")
str = str.." " str = str..ps_c.."[HE: "..head_c..head..head_time_c..head_time..ps_c.."] "..neutral str = str.." " end
local color = "<goldenrod>" if player(target) and has(target,"gutwyrm") then color = "<medium_aquamarine>" end
str = str.."T: "..color..target..neutral.." "
local lup = has(target,"lockup") local lup_time = has(target,"lockup_time") local lup_c = "<dim_grey>" local lup_time_c = "<dim_grey> " if lup then lup_c = "<green>" lup_time_c = "<green>" end if lup_time ~= 0 then lup_time = 15 - (time - lup_time) if lup_time < 4 then lup_time_c = "<red> " end end lup_time = string.lpad(tostring(lup_time),2," ")
str = str.."[:"..lup_c.."Lockup"..neutral..": "..lup_time_c..lup_time..neutral.."] "
local cn = "<grey>" if q_color[q_type] then cn = "<"..q_color[q_type]..">" end str = str.." [:"..cn..q_type..neutral.."]"
str = str.."\n" -- second part ------------- if player(target) then -- right arm local rarm = has(target,"right_arm") local rarm_time = has(target,"right_arm_time") local rarm_c = "<dim_grey>" local rarm_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if rarm > 0 then rarm_c = "<green>" rarm_time_c = "<green> " end if rarm_time ~= 0 then rarm_time = 60 - (time - rarm_time) if rarm_time < 11 then rarm_time_c = "<red> " end end rarm = string.lpad(tostring(rarm),2," ") rarm_time = string.lpad(tostring(rarm_time),2," ")
str = str..ps_c.."[RA: "..rarm_c..rarm..rarm_time_c..rarm_time..ps_c.."] "
-- torso local torso = has(target,"torso") local torso_time = has(target,"torso_time") local torso_c = "<dim_grey>" local torso_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if torso > 0 then torso_c = "<green>" torso_time_c = "<green> " end if torso_time ~= 0 then torso_time = 60 - (time - torso_time) if torso_time < 11 then torso_time_c = "<red> " end end torso = string.lpad(tostring(torso),2," ") torso_time = string.lpad(tostring(torso_time),2," ")
str = str..ps_c.."[TO: "..torso_c..torso..torso_time_c..torso_time..ps_c.."] "
-- left arm local larm = has(target,"left_arm") local larm_time = has(target,"left_arm_time") local larm_c = "<dim_grey>" local larm_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if larm > 0 then larm_c = "<green>" larm_time_c = "<green> " end if larm_time ~= 0 then larm_time = 60 - (time - larm_time) if larm_time < 11 then larm_time_c = "<red> " end end larm = string.lpad(tostring(larm),2," ") larm_time = string.lpad(tostring(larm_time),2," ")
str = str..ps_c.."[LA: "..larm_c..larm..larm_time_c..larm_time..ps_c.."] "..neutral
local limb_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.target ~= "nothing" then limb_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."T: "..limb_c..string.lpad(string.title(limb.target),11," ")..neutral
local parry_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.parry ~= "nothing" then parry_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.." P: "..parry_c..string.lpad(string.title(limb.parry),11," ")..neutral
str = str.."\n"
-- right leg local rleg = has(target,"right_leg") local rleg_time = has(target,"right_leg_time") local rleg_c = "<dim_grey>" local rleg_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if rleg > 0 then rleg_c = "<green>" rleg_time_c = "<green> " end if rleg_time ~= 0 then rleg_time = 60 - (time - rleg_time) if rleg_time < 11 then rleg_time_c = "<red> " end end rleg = string.lpad(tostring(rleg),2," ") rleg_time = string.lpad(tostring(rleg_time),2," ")
str = str..ps_c.."[RL: "..rleg_c..rleg..rleg_time_c..rleg_time..ps_c.."] "
-- placeholder str = str.." "
-- left leg local lleg = has(target,"left_leg") local lleg_time = has(target,"left_leg_time") local lleg_c = "<dim_grey>" local lleg_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if lleg > 0 then lleg_c = "<green>" lleg_time_c = "<green> " end if lleg_time ~= 0 then lleg_time = 60 - (time - lleg_time) if lleg_time < 11 then lleg_time_c = "<red> " end end lleg = string.lpad(tostring(lleg),2," ") lleg_time = string.lpad(tostring(lleg_time),2," ")
str = str..ps_c.."[LL: "..lleg_c..lleg..lleg_time_c..lleg_time..ps_c.."] "..neutral end
-- third part ------------- --str = str.."\n"
local ammo = "<dim_grey>" if ranger.primary == "incendiary" then ammo = "<gold>" end if ranger.primary == "" then ammo = "<red>" end ammo = ammo..string.lpad(string.title(ranger.primary),10," ")
local bal, bar, cnt, fit, wea = "<red>","<red>","<red>","<red>","<red>"
if ranger.defences.balancing then bal = "<green>" end if ranger.defences.barkskin then bar = "<green>" end if ranger.defences.counter then cnt = "<green>" end if ranger.defences.fitness then fit = "<green>" end if ranger.defences.weathering then wea = "<green>" end
str = str.."Pr: "..ammo..neutral.." " str = str.."["..bal.."BAL"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..bar.."BAR"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..cnt.."CNT"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..fit.."FIT"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..wea.."WEA"..neutral.."] "
cecho("ranger_ui",str) end

Script.name: timer
Script.script:
ranger.timer = function() if class == "Ranger" then
-- operate only on 'target' otherwise the overhead is too big local time = os.time()
if player(target) then local lockup_t = has(target,"lockup_time")
if lockup_t ~= 0 then lockup_t = time - lockup_t if lockup_t > 15 then cecho("\n<white>Resetting Lockup Timer") set(target,"lockup",false) set(target,"lockup_time",0) end end end
ranger.ui_refresh() end end

Script.name: choose_toxin
Script.script:
ranger.choose_toxin = function(name,list) if not player(name) and type(name) == "table" then list = name name = me end _hload(name)
local toxin,toxin2 = "","" local list = list or ecopy(ranger.toxins)
if q_type == "wAfflictor" then list = { "sunallergy", "nausea", "metrazol", "hemotoxin", "butisol", "recklessness", "anorexia", "weariness", "clumsiness", "calotropis", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "slow balance", "slow equilibrium", "withered throat", "numbness", "asthma", "slickness", "stupidity", "dizziness", "sensitivity", "ignorance", "disloyalty", } end
if has(name,"paralysis") then table.remove(list,table.index_of(list,"numbness")) end
for i=1, #list do if not _G[list[i]] then toxin = list[i] break end end for i=1, #list do if list[i] ~= toxin and not _G[list[i]] then toxin2 = list[i] break end end
toxin = lookup(toxin,dban.toxin_dictionary) toxin2 = lookup(toxin2,dban.toxin_dictionary)
return toxin,toxin2 end

Script.name: sleep
Script.script:
ranger.sleep = function(name,limb) local str = ""
if has(name,"shield") or has(name,"rebounding") then str = str.."pierce "..name..sp else str = str.."qjab "..name.." opium opium"..sp end
send(str) end

Script.name: ranger.qjab
Script.script:
ranger.qjab = function(name) local str = ""
local toxin, toxin2 = ranger.choose_toxin(name)
if has(name,"shield") or has(name,"rebounding") then str = str.."pierce target "..sp else str = str.."qjab target "..toxin.." "..toxin2 end
-- str = "clan military tell afflicted target "..revlookup(toxin,dban.toxin_dictionary).." "..revlookup(toxin2,dban.toxin_dictionary)..sp..str str = str:gsub("target",name) return str end

Script.name: ranger.plimb
Script.script:
ranger.plimb = function(name,limb) local str = ""
if has(name,"shield") or has(name,"rebounding") then str = str.."pierce "..name..sp else str = str.."plimb "..name.." "..limb..sp end
send(str) end

Script.name: [d]
Script.script:
assassin.toxin_queue = { "hemotoxin", "asthma", "stupidity", "numbness", "clumsiness", "sunallergy", "nausea", "butisol", "metrazol", "slickness", "anorexia", "numbness", "sensitivity", "slow balance", "slow equilibrium", "recklessness", "calotropis", "dizziness", "withered throat", "ignorance", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "disloyalty",
"hemotoxin", "asthma", "butisol", "sunallergy", "nausea", "numbness", "metrazol", "slickness", "anorexia", "recklessness", "stupidity", "dizziness", "sensitivity", "clumsiness", "weariness", "calotropis", "slow equilibrium", "slow balance", "withered throat", "ignorance", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "disloyalty", }
shadowplant_timer = shadowplant_timer or 0 shadowplant_timer2 = shadowplant_timer2 or 0 instill_time = instill_time or 0
assassin.defences = assassin.defences or {} assassin.defences.cloak = assassin.defences.cloak or false assassin.defences.ghost = assassin.defences.ghost or false assassin.defences.hide = assassin.defences.hide or false assassin.defences.harden = assassin.defences.harden or false assassin.defences.protect = assassin.defences.protect or false assassin.defences.weaving = assassin.defences.weaving or false
assassin.worm = assassin.worm or ""

Script.name: dbp-ui
Script.script:
assassin.dbp = function() local time = os.time() local str,neutral = "","<grey>" local hyp = dbp.count(target,"hypno") local hyp_c = "<grey>" if hyp > 6 then hyp_c = "<green>" elseif hyp >= 4 then hyp_c = "<red>" end local hypno_queue = has(target,"hypno_queue")
local f_c, f_t = "<gold> ", 0 if has(target,"fenugreek") then f_c = "<maroon> " elseif has(target,"fenugreek_time") ~= 0 then f_c = "<deep_pink> " f_t = os.time() - has(target,"fenugreek_time") end
-- append hypnosis count, colored differently str = str.."Target: "..f_c..target..neutral str = str.." +"..hyp_c..hyp..neutral
if f_t ~= 0 then str = str.." (in "..f_t..")" end str = str.."\n"
local e_c = has(target,engulf) if e_c then e_c = "<green>" else e_c = neutral end str = str.."["..e_c.."Engulf"..neutral.."]" str = str.."\n"
str = str.."[Shadowplant]: " local sstate = has(target,"shadowplant_state") if sstate == 1 then str = str.."<green>inc "..neutral.."| active " -- "eaten" elseif sstate == 2 then str = str..neutral.."inc | <green>active"..neutral -- "eaten" end
str = str.."\n"
{ "instill_pending", "" }, { "hypno", false }, { "hypno_snap", false }, { "hypno_snap_timer", 0 }, { "sealed", false }, { "ascourge", false }, { "ascourge_time", 0 },
-- do the append -- engulf, hypno, sealed, fired -- instill pending
local count = 0 local level = 0.30 local tablen = ecopy(dbp.players_[target].affs) local lcr = { ["0.35"] = "<sea_green>", ["0.55"] = "<forest_green>", ["0.75"] = "<lime_green>", } local lfc = function(num) if num < 0.35 then num = 0.35 elseif num < 0.55 then num = 0.55 elseif num < 0.75 then num = 0.75 end num = tostring(num) if lcr[num] then return lcr[num] else return "<green>" end end
local lock_affs = { "anorexia", "asthma", "hemotoxin", "impatience", "numbness", "slickness", }
local c_affs = {}
if config and config.trax == 2 then tablen = ecopy(dbp.players_[target].affs_) for i=1,#lock_affs do str = str.."\n" local dis,turb = "", "" local aff = lock_affs[i] local score = has(target,lock_affs[i])
dis = string.format("%3.2f",score) if score >= level then local k = lfc(score) dis = k..dis.."<grey>" else dis = "<saddle_brown>"..dis.."<grey>" end
turb = string.rpad(aff,23," ") if score >= level then local k = lfc(score) if has(target,"instill."..aff) then k = "<orange>" end if table.contains(hypno_queue,k) then k = "<deep_sky_blue>" end turb = k..turb.."<grey>" else turb = "<dim_grey>"..turb.."<grey>" end str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end str = str.."\n\n" for k,v in pairs(tablen) do if not table.contains(lock_affs,k) and not table.contains(c_affs,k) and v >= level then local shine = lfc(v) local dis,turb = "", "" if has(target,"instill."..k) then k = "<orange>" end if table.contains(hypno_queue,k) then k = "<deep_sky_blue>" end dis = shine..string.format("%3.2f",v).."<grey>" turb = string.rpad(k,23," ") turb = shine..turb.."<grey>" str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb.."\n" end end else for i=1,#lock_affs do str = str.."\n" local dis,turb = "", "" if has(target,lock_affs[i]) then dis = "<green>x<grey>" else dis = "<saddle_brown>o<grey>" end turb = string.rpad(lock_affs[i],23," ") if has(target,lock_affs[i]) then if has(target,"instill."..lock_affs[i]) then turb = "<orange>"..turb.."<grey>" elseif table.contains(hypno_queue,k) then turb = "<deep_sky_blue>"..turb.."<grey>" else turb = "<green>"..turb.."<grey>" end else turb = "<dim_grey>"..turb.."<grey>" end str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end str = str.."\n\n" for k,v in pairs(tablen) do if not table.contains(lock_affs,k) and not table.contains(c_affs,k) and v then local shine = "<green>" local dis,turb = "", "" if has(target,"instill."..k) then k = "<orange>" end if table.contains(hypno_queue,k) then k = "<deep_sky_blue>" end dis = shine.."x<grey>" turb = string.rpad(k,23," ") turb = shine..turb.."<grey>" str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb.."\n" end end end return str end

Script.name: reset
Script.script: assassin.reset = function() shadowplant_timer = 0 shadowplant_timer2 = 0 instill_time = 0 assassin.defences = { cloak = false, ghost = false, hide = false, harden = false, protect = false, weaving = false, } assassin.worm = "" end

Script.name: prompt
Script.script:
assassin.prompt = function(len) local str,neutral = "","<dim_grey>" local a,m = "<grey>","<grey>" local n = 36 n = n - len
str = string.lpad(str,n," ")
if player(target) then local count = dbp.count(target) local mcount = dbp.count(target,"hypno")
str = str..neutral.."[A: "..a..count..neutral.."][M: "..m..mcount..neutral.."] "
end
if class == "Assassin" then cecho(str) end end

Script.name: ui_refresh
Script.script:
assassin.ui_refresh = function() clearWindow("assassin_ui") local str = "" local time = os.time() local neutral = "<grey>"
local color = "<goldenrod>" if player(target) then color = "<medium_aquamarine>" end if player(target) and has(target,"hypno") then color = "<yellow>" end if player(target) and has(target,"sealed") then color = "<red>" end
str = str.."T: "..color..target..neutral.." "
-- first part ------------- if player(target) then local random_affs = has(target,"random_affs") local random_affs_c = neutral if random_affs > 1 then random_affs_c = "<red>" end str = str..neutral.."(+"..random_affs_c..random_affs..neutral..") " end
local cn = "<grey>" if q_color[q_type] then cn = "<"..q_color[q_type]..">" end str = str.." [:"..cn..q_type..neutral.."]"
-- second part ------------- str = str.."\n"
if player(target) then
local worm = assassin.worm local worm_c = "<dim_grey>" local worm_t = { ["Rashirmir"] = "DRE", ["the volcano"] = "VOL", ["the Demonic Plane"] = "DEM", ["the frozen tundra"] = "TUN", ["itself"] = "CIR", } local worm_ct = { ["Rashirmir"] = "<medium_slate_blue>", ["the volcano"] = "<orange_red>", ["the Demonic Plane"] = "<violet_red>", ["the frozen tundra"] = "<dodger_blue>", ["itself"] = "<spring_green>", }
str = str.."[" local count = 0 for k,v in orderedPairs(worm_t) do count = count + 1 if k == worm and worm_ct[k] then str = str..worm_ct[k] else str = str.."<dim_grey>" end str = str..worm_t[k]..neutral if count == 5 then else str = str.."|" end end str = str..neutral.."] "
local hemo, sun = "<red>","<red>" if has(target,"instill.hemotoxin") then hemo = "<green>" end if has(target,"instill.sunallergy") then sun = "<green>" end
str = str.."["..hemo.."HEMOT"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..sun .."SALLE"..neutral.."] " end
local parry_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.parry ~= "nothing" then parry_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."P: "..parry_c..string.title(limb.parry)..neutral
-- third part ------------- str = str.."\n" local gho, hid, har, wvg, pro = "<red>","<red>","<red>","<red>", "<red>" local clk = "<red>"
if assassin.defences.ghost then gho = "<medium_sea_green>" end if assassin.defences.hide then hid = "<medium_sea_green>" end if assassin.defences.harden then har = "<medium_sea_green>" end if assassin.defences.weaving then wvg = "<medium_sea_green>" end if assassin.defences.protect then pro = "<medium_sea_green>" end if assassin.defences.cloak then clk = "<medium_sea_green>" end
str = str.."["..wvg.."WVG"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..pro.."PRO"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..hid.."HID"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..har.."HAR"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..gho.."GHO"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..clk.."CLK"..neutral.."] "
local lse = "<red>" if df_ and df_.landsense then lse = "<green>" end str = str.."["..lse.."LSE"..neutral.."] "
local limb_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.target ~= "nothing" then limb_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."T: "..limb_c..string.title(limb.target)
cecho("assassin_ui",str) end

Script.name: timer
Script.script:
assassin.timer = function() if class == "Assassin" then
-- operate only on 'target' otherwise the overhead is too big local time = os.time()
if player(target) then local fenugreek_t = has(target,"fenugreek_time")
if fenugreek_t ~= 0 then fenugreek_t = time - fenugreek_t if fenugreek_t > 5 then cecho("\n<white>Resetting Fenugreek Timer") set(target,"fenugreek",true) set(target,"fenugreek_time",0) end end
local ascourge_t = has(target,"ascourge_time") if ascourge_t ~= 0 then ascourge_t = time - ascourge_t if ascourge_t > 5 then cecho("\n<white>Resetting Scourge Timer") set(target,"ascourge",false) set(target,"ascourge_time",0) end end
end
assassin.ui_refresh() end end

Script.name: sleep
Script.script:
assassin.sleep = function(name) local str = ""
if player(name) then
if has(name,"shield") then str = str.."touch hammer target"..sp str = str.."suggest target whisper"..sp elseif has(name,"rebounding") then str = str.."flay target aura"..sp str = str.."suggest target whisper"..sp else str = str.."dstab target opium opium"..sp str = str.."suggest target whisper"..sp end else str = "dstab target opium opium"..sp str = str.."suggest target whisper"..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: choose_toxin
Script.script:
assassin.choose_toxin = function(name,list) if not player(name) and type(name) == "table" then list = name name = me end
_hload(name)
local toxin,toxin2 = "","" local list = list or ecopy(assassin.toxin_queue)
if q_type == "vBard" then list = { "numbness", "asthma", "hemotoxin", "slow equilibrium", "slickness", "anorexia", "withered throat", "slow herbs", "butisol", "sunallergy", "numbness", "metrazol", "clumsiness", "nausea", "stupidity", "sensitivity", "recklessness", "calotropis", "slow balance", "dizziness", "ignorance", "slow elixirs", "disloyalty", } end
if _G.paralysis then table.remove(list,table.index_of(list,"numbness")) end
for i=1, #list do if not _G[list[i]] then toxin = list[i] break end end for i=1, #list do if list[i] ~= toxin and not _G[list[i]] then toxin2 = list[i] break end end
toxin = lookup(toxin,dban.toxin_dictionary) toxin2 = lookup(toxin2,dban.toxin_dictionary)
return toxin, toxin2 end

Script.name: assassin.dstab
Script.script:
assassin.dstab = function(name) _hload(name)
local str = "" local toxin, toxin2 = assassin.choose_toxin(name)
if has(name,"rebounding") then str = str.."flay target aura"..sp elseif has(name, "shield") then str = str.."touch hammer target"..sp else str = str.."dstab target "..toxin.." "..toxin2..sp end
if hemotoxin and butisol and weariness and clumsiness then str = str.."queue eq worm instill target hemotoxin"..sp elseif has(name,"shadowplant_state") == 0 then str = str.."worm shadowplant target kelp"..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: assassin.damage
Script.script:
assassin.damage = function(name,ta) local str = "" local ta = ta or true
if has(name,"shield") then str = str.."touch hammer target"..sp elseif not has(name,"ascourge") and not has(name,"rebounding") then send("queue reset all") str = str.."queue eqbal scourge target"..sp str = str.."worm choke target"..sp if ta then str = str.."trueassess target"..sp end elseif has(name,"fenugreek") then send("queue reset all") str = str.."flay target"..sp else send("queue bal puncture "..name.." with trioxin") str = str.."queue eq worm choke target"..sp if ta then str = str.."trueassess target"..sp end end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: assassin.whisper
Script.script:
assassin.whisper = function(name) local str = "" local t = { "stupidity", "hemotoxin", "asthma", "butisol", "sensitivity", "anorexia", "slickness", "sunallergy", "nausea", "metrazol", "numbness", "recklessness", "dizziness", "clumsiness", "weariness", "calotropis", "slow equilibrium", "slow balance", "withered throat", "ignorance", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "disloyalty", }
_hload(name) local toxin, toxin2 = assassin.choose_toxin(name)
if has(name,"rebounding") then str = str.."flay target aura"..sp elseif has(name, "shield") then str = str.."touch hammer target"..sp else -- Before lookup the syntax, check for reporting: local inc = {"anorexia","asthma"} if config and config.share_full then str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..toxin..sp str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..toxin2..sp elseif config and config.share then if table.contains(inc,toxin) then str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..toxin..sp end if table.contains(inc,toxin2) then str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..toxin2..sp end end
str = "dstab target "..toxin.." "..toxin2..sp..str end
str = "queue eqbal "..str.."suggest target whisper"..sp
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: assassin.final
Script.script:
assassin.final = function(name) local str = ""
local tlist = { "asthma", "slow balance", "clumsiness", "metrazol", "numbness", "hemotoxin", "clumsiness", "butisol", "asthma", "sunallergy", "slickness", "anorexia", "numbness", "metrazol", "nausea", "stupidity", "sensitivity", "recklessness", "calotropis", "slow equilibrium", "dizziness", "withered throat", "ignorance", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "disloyalty", } local hlist = { "impatience", "hypochondria", "heroism", "lethargy", "confusion", -- "stupidity", -- "hallucinations", "claustrophobia", "masochism", -- "clumsiness", -- -- "recklessness", -- -- "anorexia", -- }
local count = dbp.count(name) local shield = has(name,"shield") local rebounding = has(name,"rebounding") local engulf = has(name,"engulf") local i_list = has(name,"instill") local i_pending = has(name,"instill_pending")
local shadowplant_state = has(name,"shadowplant_state") local hypno = has(name,"hypno") local hypno_queue = has(name, "hypno_queue" ) local hypno_snap = has(name, "hypno_snap" )
local toxin, toxin2 = assassin.choose_toxin( name, tlist )
-- consider using cyanide if anorexia and asthma and hemotoxin and numbness and slickness and count > 10 then -- toxin2 = "cyanide" end
str = str.."queue eqbal " str = str.."order loyals attack target"..sp if shield then str = str.."touch hammer "..name..sp elseif not engulf then str = str.."flay "..name.." aura "..sp str = str.."worm engulf "..name..sp elseif rebounding then str = str.."flay "..name.." aura "..sp str = str.."worm engulf "..name..sp else str = str.."dstab "..name.." "..toxin.." "..toxin2..sp end
if not has(name,"instill.hemotoxin") and i_pending == "" and hemotoxin and butisol and (asthma or clumsiness or weariness) then str = str.."queue eq worm instill target hemotoxin"..sp elseif not has(name,"instill.hemotoxin") and shadowplant_state == 0 then str = str.."worm shadowplant target kelp"..sp elseif not hypno and not hypno_snap then str = str.."hypnotise target"..sp elseif #hypno_queue < #hlist and not has(name,"sealed") then local number = #hypno_queue + 1 str = str.."suggest target "..hlist[number]..sp elseif #hypno_queue >= #hlist and not has(name,"sealed") then str = str.."seal target 3"..sp elseif not hypno_snap then set(name,"sealed",false) str = str.."snap target"..sp set(name,"hypno_snap_timer", tempTimer( #hlist * 3, function() set( name,"hypno_snap",false) killTimer(has(name,"hypno_snap_timer")) dbp.players_[name]["hypno_queue"] = {} end) ) else str = str.."worm shadowplant target kelp"..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: assassin.annihilate/devour
Script.script:
assassin.annihilate = function(name) expandAlias("ac off") local str = ""
str = str.."queue eq worm attach circular"..sp str = str.."queue eqbal worm annihilate target"..sp
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end
assassin.devour = function(name) expandAlias("ac off") local str = ""
str = str.."queue eq worm attach rashirmir"..sp str = str.."queue eqbal worm devour target"..sp
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: assassin.kill
Script.script:
assassin.kill = function(name) local str = ""
local tlist = { "asthma", "hemotoxin", "slickness", "anorexia", "butisol", "sunallergy", "numbness", "metrazol", "nausea", "stupidity", "sensitivity", "clumsiness", "recklessness", "calotropis", "slow balance", "slow equilibrium", "dizziness", "withered throat", "ignorance", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "disloyalty", } local hlist = { "impatience", "hypochondria", "masochism", }
local count = dbp.count(name) local shield = has(name,"shield") local rebounding = has(name,"rebounding") local engulf = has(name,"engulf") local i_list = has(name,"instill") local i_pending = has(name,"instill_pending")
local shadowplant_state = has(name,"shadowplant_state") local hypno = has(name,"hypno") local hypno_queue = has(name, "hypno_queue" ) local hypno_snap = has(name, "hypno_snap" )
local toxin, toxin2 = assassin.choose_toxin( name, tlist )
-- consider using cyanide if anorexia and asthma and hemotoxin and numbness and slickness and count > 15 then toxin2 = "cyanide" end
str = str.."queue eqbal " str = str.."order loyals attack target"..sp if shield then str = str.."touch hammer "..name..sp elseif not engulf then str = str.."flay "..name.." aura "..sp str = str.."worm engulf "..name..sp elseif rebounding then str = str.."flay "..name.." aura "..sp str = str.."worm engulf "..name..sp else str = str.."dstab "..name.." "..toxin.." "..toxin2..sp end
if not has(name,"instill.hemotoxin") and i_pending == "" and hemotoxin and butisol and (asthma or clumsiness or weariness) then str = str.."queue eq worm instill target hemotoxin"..sp elseif not has(name,"instill.hemotoxin") and shadowplant_state == 0 then str = str.."worm shadowplant target kelp"..sp elseif not hypno and not hypno_snap then str = str.."hypnotise target"..sp elseif #hypno_queue < #hlist and not has(name,"sealed") then local number = #hypno_queue + 1 str = str.."suggest target "..hlist[number]..sp elseif #hypno_queue >= #hlist and not has(name,"sealed") then str = str.."seal target 3"..sp elseif not hypno_snap then set(name,"sealed",false) str = str.."snap target"..sp set(name,"hypno_snap_timer", tempTimer( #hlist * 3, function() set( name,"hypno_snap",false) killTimer(has(name,"hypno_snap_timer")) dbp.players_[name]["hypno_queue"] = {} end) ) else str = str.."worm shadowplant target kelp"..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: assassin.asthma
Script.script:
assassin.asthma = function(name) local str = ""
local tlist = { "hemotoxin", -- "clumsiness", "butisol", "asthma", "stupidity", "recklessness", "ignorance", "disloyalty", "sunallergy", "slow balance", "metrazol", "nausea", "sensitivity", "calotropis", "dizziness", "withered throat", "slow equilibrium", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", } local hlist = { "impatience", "hypochondria", "heroism", "lethargy", "confusion", -- "stupidity", -- "hallucinations", "claustrophobia", "masochism", -- "clumsiness", -- -- "recklessness", -- -- "anorexia", -- }
local count = dbp.count(name) local focusable = dbp.count(name,"focus") local shield = has(name,"shield") local rebounding = has(name,"rebounding") local engulf = has(name,"engulf") local i_list = has(name,"instill") local i_pending = has(name,"instill_pending")
local shadowplant_state = has(name,"shadowplant_state") local hypno = has(name,"hypno") local hypno_queue = has(name, "hypno_queue" ) local hypno_snap = has(name, "hypno_snap" )
if has(name,"tree") or (os.time() - has(name,"tree_time")) >= 12 then table.insert(tlist,1,"numbness") else table.insert(tlist,1,"metrazol") end
if impatience then table.insert(tlist,1,"anorexia") table.insert(tlist,1,"slickness") elseif asthma and (numbness or paralysis) and hemotoxin and focusable >= 2 then table.insert(tlist,1,"anorexia") table.insert(tlist,1,"slickness") vw.private("Focusable count: "..focusable..".") elseif asthma and hemotoxin and count >= 4 and (not numbness or not paralysis) then table.insert(tlist,1,"numbness") end
local toxin, toxin2 = assassin.choose_toxin( name, tlist )
-- always deliver anorexia with slickness if not slickness and not anorexia then if toxin == "iodine" and toxin2 ~= "bromine" then toxin2 = "bromine" elseif toxin == "bromine" and toxin2 ~= "iodine" then toxin2 = "iodine" end end
str = str.."queue eqbal " -- str = str.."order loyals attack target"..sp if shield then str = str.."touch hammer "..name..sp elseif rebounding then str = str.."flay "..name.." aura "..sp str = str.."worm engulf "..name..sp else str = str.."dstab "..name.." "..toxin.." "..toxin2..sp end
if has(name,"instill.asthma") and shadowplant_state == 0 and hemotoxin and (butisol or clumsiness or weariness) then str = str.."worm shadowplant target maidenhair "..sp elseif not has(name,"instill.asthma") and i_pending == "" and asthma and hemotoxin and (butisol or clumsiness or weariness) then str = str.."queue eq worm instill target asthma"..sp elseif not has(name,"instill.asthma") and shadowplant_state == 0 then str = str.."worm shadowplant target kelp"..sp else str = str.."worm shadowplant target kelp"..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: assassin.impatience
Script.script:
assassin.impatience = function(name) local str = ""
local tlist = { "numbness", "hemotoxin", "clumsiness", "butisol", "asthma", "sunallergy", "slickness", "anorexia", "numbness", "metrazol", "nausea", "stupidity", "sensitivity", "recklessness", "calotropis", "slow balance", "slow equilibrium", "dizziness", "withered throat", "ignorance", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "disloyalty", } local hlist = { "impatience", "hypochondria", }
local count = dbp.count(name) local shield = has(name,"shield") local rebounding = has(name,"rebounding") local engulf = has(name,"engulf") local i_list = has(name,"instill") local i_pending = has(name,"instill_pending")
local shadowplant_state = has(name,"shadowplant_state") local hypno = has(name,"hypno") local hypno_queue = has(name, "hypno_queue" ) local hypno_snap = has(name, "hypno_snap" )
local toxin, toxin2 = assassin.choose_toxin( name, tlist )
-- consider using cyanide if anorexia and asthma and hemotoxin and numbness and slickness and count > 10 then -- toxin2 = "cyanide" end
str = str.."queue eqbal " -- str = str.."order loyals attack target"..sp if shield then str = str.."touch hammer "..name..sp elseif rebounding and not engulf then str = str.."flay "..name.." aura "..sp else str = str.."dstab "..name.." "..toxin.." "..toxin2..sp end
if not hypno and not hypno_snap then str = str.."hypnotise target"..sp elseif #hypno_queue < #hlist and not has(name,"sealed") then local number = #hypno_queue + 1 str = str.."suggest target "..hlist[number]..sp elseif #hypno_queue >= #hlist and not has(name,"sealed") then str = str.."seal target 3"..sp else str = str.."worm shadowplant target mandrake"..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

}

"asthma", "slow balance", "hemotoxin", "numbness", "sunallergy", "nausea", "numbness", "clumsiness", "metrazol", "slickness", "anorexia", "recklessness", "stupidity", "dizziness", "sensitivity", "weariness", "calotropis", "slow equilibrium", "slow balance", "withered throat", "ignorance", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "disloyalty",
"hemotoxin", "asthma", "slow balance", "butisol", "numbness", "sunallergy", "nausea", "numbness", "clumsiness", "metrazol", "slickness", "anorexia", "recklessness", "stupidity", "dizziness", "sensitivity", "weariness", "calotropis", "slow equilibrium", "slow balance", "withered throat", "ignorance", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "disloyalty",
"asthma", "hemotoxin", "sunallergy", "clumsiness", "butisol", "slow balance", "stupidity", "slickness", "anorexia", "metrazol", "nausea", "numbness", "recklessness", "dizziness", "sensitivity", "weariness", "calotropis", "slow equilibrium", "slow balance", "withered throat", "ignorance", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "disloyalty",]]

Script.name: reset
Script.script:
deathknight.reset = function()
end

Script.name: prompt
Script.script:
deathknight.prompt = function(len) local suppress = deathknight.suppress local str = "" local n = 45 n = n - len
str = string.lpad(str,n," ")
if player(target) then local count = dbp.count(target) local x = "<dim_grey>" local c = "<dim_grey>"
if count >= 5 then c = "<red>" end
str = str..x.."[A: "..c..string.lpad(tostring(count),2)..x.."] "
local t = limb.counts(target) for i=1,#t do t[i] = string.lpad(tostring(t[i]),2) end local h,hc,ra,rac,tr,trc = t[1],t[2],t[3],t[4],t[5],t[6] local la,lac,rl,rlc,ll,llc = t[7],t[8],t[9],t[10],t[11],t[12]
if not suppress then str = str.."\n " str = str.."RA:"..ra.."("..rac..") " str = str.."LA:"..la.."("..lac..") " str = str.."RL:"..rl.."("..rlc..") " str = str.."LL:"..ll.."("..llc..") " end end
if class == "Deathknight" then cecho(str) end end

Script.name: ui_refresh
Script.script:
deathknight.ui_refresh = function() clearWindow("deathknight_ui") local str = "" local time = os.time() local neutral = "<grey>" local color = "<goldenrod>"
local a,b,c = limb.display(target)
str = str..a str = str.."T: "..color..target..neutral.." "
-- second part -------------- str = str.."\n" str = str..b
if player(target) then
local limb_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.target ~= "nothing" then limb_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."T: "..limb_c..string.lpad(string.title(limb.target),11," ")..neutral
local parry_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.parry ~= "nothing" then parry_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.." P: "..parry_c..string.lpad(string.title(limb.parry),11," ")..neutral end
-- third part ------------- str = str.."\n" str = str..c
cecho("deathknight_ui",str) end

Script.name: timer
Script.script:
deathknight.timer = function() if class == "Deathknight" then
-- operate only on 'target' otherwise the overhead is too big local time = os.time()
if player(target) then
end
deathknight.ui_refresh() end end

Script.name: choose_toxin
Script.script:
deathknight.choose_toxin = function(name,list) if not player(name) and type(name) == "table" then list = name name = me end
_hload(name)
local toxin,toxin2 = "","" local list = list or ecopy(deathknight.toxin_queue)
-- Some custom logic before choosing local time = os.time() local herb = has(name,"herb") local herbT = has(name,"herb_time") local purge = has(name,"purge") local purgeT = has(name,"purge_time") local tree = has(name,"tree") local treeT = has(name,"tree_time")
if purgeT ~= 0 then purgeT = 15 - (os.time() - purgeT) end
if herb and not anorexia and (not paralysis or not numbness) and not metrazol then table.insert(list,1,"numbness") elseif tree and (not paralysis or not numbness) then table.insert(list,1,"numbness") end if (not purge or purgeT < 5) and not hemotoxin and not paralysis and not table.contains(list,"numbness") then table.insert(list,1,"metrazol") end if (not purge or hemotoxin) and asthma and (hemotoxin or butisol) then -- table.insert(list,1,"anorexia") -- table.insert(list,1,"slickness") end if impatience then table.insert(list,1,"anorexia") table.insert(list,1,"slickness") table.insert(list,1,"asthma") table.insert(list,1,"hemotoxin") -- hemo, asthma, slickness, anorexia end -- End custom logic
if _G.paralysis then table.remove(list,table.index_of(list,"numbness")) end
for i=1, #list do if not _G[list[i]] then toxin = list[i] break end end for i=1, #list do if list[i] ~= toxin and not _G[list[i]] then toxin2 = list[i] break end end
-- Always pair slickness and anorexia if toxin == "slickness" and not anorexia then toxin2 = "anorexia" end if toxin == "anorexia" and not slickness then toxin2 = "slickness" end if toxin2 == "anorexia" and toxin ~= "slickness" then toxin = "slickness" end if toxin2 == "slickness" and toxin ~= "anorexia" then toxin = "anorexia" end
toxin = lookup(toxin,dban.toxin_dictionary) toxin2 = lookup(toxin2,dban.toxin_dictionary)
return toxin, toxin2 end

Script.name: sleep
Script.script:
deathknight.sleep = function(name) local str = ""
if player(name) then
if has(name,"shield") or has(name,"rebounding") then str = str.."rsl target ciguatoxin"..sp else str = str.."dsl target opium opium"..sp end else str = "rsl target ciguatoxin"..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: deathknight.dsl
Script.script:
deathknight.dsl = function(name) local str = ""
local toxin, toxin2 = deathknight.choose_toxin(name)
if has(name,"shield") or has(name,"rebounding") then str = str.."rsl target "..toxin..sp else str = str.."dsl target "..toxin.." "..toxin2..sp end
-- Before lookup the syntax, check for reporting: local inc = {"impatience","anorexia","asthma"} local t = revlookup(toxin,dban.toxin_dictionary) local t2 = revlookup(toxin2,dban.toxin_dictionary)
if config and config.share_full then str = "queue eqbal "..str str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..t..sp if not string.match(str,"rsl") then str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..t2..sp end elseif config and config.share then if table.contains(inc,toxin) then str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..t..sp end if table.contains(inc,toxin2) and not string.match(str,"rsl") then str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..t2..sp end str = "queue eqbal "..str end
str = str:gsub("target",name) return str end

Script.name: deathknight.damage
Script.script:
deathknight.damage = function(name) local list = { "stupidity", "slow elixirs", "nausea", "anorexia", -- claustrophobia -- caloric strip "numbness", "hemotoxin", "asthma", "butisol", "sunallergy", "numbness", "metrazol", "slickness", "numbness", "recklessness", "stupidity", "dizziness", "sensitivity", "clumsiness", "weariness", "calotropis", "slow equilibrium", "slow balance", "withered throat", "ignorance", "slow herbs", "disloyalty", }
local str = ""
local toxin, toxin2 = deathknight.choose_toxin(name,list)
if has(name,"shield") or has(name,"rebounding") then send("queue reset eqbal") str = str.."queue eqbal quickdraw sabre shield"..sp str = str.."rsl target "..toxin..sp str = str.."engage target"..sp else local t = {"stupidity","slow elixirs","nausea","anorexia"} str = str.."quickdraw claymore"..sp str = str.."dsl target "..toxin.." "..toxin2..sp if table.contains(t,revlookup(toxin,dban.toxin_dictionary)) or table.contains(t,revlookup(toxin2,dban.toxin_dictionary)) then str = str.."soulstorm target"..sp str = "queue eqbal "..str end end
str = str:gsub("target",name) return str end

Script.name: deathknight.broadsword
Script.script:
deathknight.broadsword = function(name) local list = { "stupidity", "slow elixirs", "nausea", "anorexia", -- claustrophobia -- caloric strip "numbness", "hemotoxin", "asthma", "butisol", "sunallergy", "numbness", "metrazol", "slickness", "numbness", "recklessness", "stupidity", "dizziness", "sensitivity", "clumsiness", "weariness", "calotropis", "slow equilibrium", "slow balance", "withered throat", "ignorance", "slow herbs", "disloyalty", }
local str = ""
local toxin, toxin2 = deathknight.choose_toxin(name,list)
if has(name,"shield") or has(name,"rebounding") then send("queue reset eqbal") str = str.."queue eqbal quickdraw sabre shield"..sp str = str.."rsl target "..toxin else local t = {"stupidity","slow elixirs","nausea","anorexia"} str = str.."quickdraw broadsword"..sp str = str.."dsl target "..toxin.." "..toxin2..sp if table.contains(t,revlookup(toxin,dban.toxin_dictionary)) or table.contains(t,revlookup(toxin2,dban.toxin_dictionary)) then str = str.."soulstorm target"..sp str = "queue eqbal "..str end end
str = str:gsub("target",name) return str end

Script.name: deathknight.vivisect
Script.script:
deathknight.vivisect = function(name) local str = ""
str = str.."dismount"..sp str = str.."unwield left"..sp str = str.."unwield right"..sp str = str.."wield sabre"..sp str = str.."vivisect target"..sp str = str.."queue eqbal mount horse"..sp
if name then str = str:gsub( "target", name ) else str = str:gsub( "target", target ) end
send(str) end

ScriptGroup.name: defiler

Script.name: [d]
Script.script:
defiler.attack_type = defiler.attack_type or "ravage" defiler.auto_bellow = false defiler.augur_balance = defiler.augur_balance or true defiler.augur_time = defiler.augur_time or 0
defiler.defences = defiler.defences or { antibodies = false, blooddrinker = false, confutation = false, fleetness = false, heartblood = "", regrowth = false, recuperation = false, tears = false, transmission = false, toughness = false, }
defiler.germinate = defiler.germinate or true defiler.germinate_time = defiler.germinate_time or 0 defiler.haze = defiler.haze or 0 defiler.heartblood = "metrazol" defiler.hound = 114148 defiler.hound_target = defiler.hound_target or ""
defiler.flail = 62442
defiler.prompt_allow = true
defiler.shadow_balance = defiler.shadow_balance or true defiler.shadow_balance_time = defiler.shadow_balance_time or 0
defiler.shroud_type = defiler.shroud_type or ""
defiler.spellbook = { haemophilia = "torment target with haemophilia", hallucinations = "torment target with hallucinations", entropy = "torment target with entropy", paranoia = "torment target with paranoia", claustrophobia = "torment target with claustrophobia", disloyalty = "torment target with bile",
confusion = "treant confuse target", dryblood = "treant intoxicate target", rigidity = "treant rigidity target", addiction = "treant shred target", ["crippled right arm"] = "treant smash target right arm", ["crippled left arm"] = "treant smash target left arm", ["crippled right leg"] = "treant smash target right leg", ["crippled left leg"] = "treant smash target left leg", }
defiler.spell_queue = { "addiction", "confusion", "hallucinations", "haemophilia", }
defiler.sprouts = defiler.sprouts or false
defiler.transmission_target = defiler.transmission_target or "" defiler.toxins = { "numbness", "asthma", "hemotoxin", "butisol", "sunallergy", } defiler.vial = 306573 defiler.whirl_balance = defiler.whirl_balance or true

Script.name: dbp-ui
Script.script:
defiler.dbp = function() local time = os.time() local str = ""
str = str.."Target: <gold>"..target.."<grey> ("..defiler.hound_target..")" str = str.."\n"
if player(target) then
-- Shadow local shadow = has(target,"shadow") local shadow_balance = defiler.shadow_balance local shadow_balance_t = defiler.shadow_balance_time
if shadow then shadow = "Attacking" elseif shadow_balance then shadow = "Ready" elseif shadow_balance_t ~= 0 then shadow = 30 - (time - shadow_balance_t) else shadow = "?" end
str = str.."\n" str = str.." [Shadow]: "..shadow
-- Gutwyrm (It is an affliction, but we will track it specifically) str = str.."\n" str = str.."[Gutwyrm]: " if config and config.trax == 2 then str = str..has(target,"gutwyrm") elseif has(target,"gutwyrm") then str = str.."Afflicted" else str = str.."None" end
-- display saps 2x2
local a,b,c,d = "","","","" local at,bt,ct,dt = 0,0,0,0
a = has(target,"asphyxiation_sap") at = has(target,"asphyxiation_sap_time") b = has(target,"fire_sap") bt = has(target,"fire_sap_time") c = has(target,"poison_sap") ct = has(target,"poison_sap_time") d = has(target,"psychic_sap") dt = has(target,"psychic_sap_time")
if at ~= 0 then at = 30 - (time - at) end if bt ~= 0 then bt = 30 - (time - bt) end if ct ~= 0 then ct = 30 - (time - ct) end if dt ~= 0 then dt = 30 - (time - dt) end at = string.lpad(tostring(at),3," ") bt = string.lpad(tostring(bt),3," ") ct = string.lpad(tostring(ct),3," ") dt = string.lpad(tostring(dt),3," ")
str = str.."\n\n" str = str.."[Asp]:"..at.." " str = str.."[Fir]:"..bt str = str.."\n" str = str.."[Poi]:"..ct.." " str = str.."[psY]:"..dt
-- display splinters str = str.."\n"
local empowered = ecopy( has(target,"empowered") ) local slist = { "apple","ash","beech", "birch","blackthorn","elder", "hazel","honeysuckle","hawthorn","willow" }
for i=1,#slist do str = str.."\n" local dis,turb = "","" local type = slist[i] local splinter = "splinters."..type splinter = has(target,splinter) if splinter == 0 then splinter = false else splinter = 140 - (time - splinter) splinter = string.lpad(tostring(splinter),3," ") end
if splinter and table.contains(empowered,type) then dis = "<deep_sky_blue>"..splinter.."<grey>" elseif splinter then dis = "<medium_sea_green>"..splinter.."<grey>" else dis = "<saddle_brown> o <grey>" end turb = string.rpad(type,23," ") if table.contains(empowered,type) then turb = "<deep_sky_blue>"..type.."<grey>" elseif splinter then turb = "<medium_sea_green>"..type.."<grey>" else turb = "<dim_grey>"..type.."<grey>" end str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end
-- display limbs
-- display afflictions
str = str.."\n" local count = 0 local level = 0.30 local tablen = ecopy(dbp.players_[target].affs)
local lock_affs = { "anorexia", "asthma", "hemotoxin", "impatience", "numbness", "slickness", }
local c_affs = {}
if config and config.trax == 2 then tablen = ecopy(dbp.players_[target].affs_) for i=1,#lock_affs do str = str.."\n" local dis,turb = "", "" local aff = lock_affs[i] local score = has(target,lock_affs[i])
dis = string.format("%3.2f",score) if score >= level then dis = "<green>"..dis.."<grey>" else dis = "<saddle_brown>"..dis.."<grey>" end turb = string.rpad(aff,23," ") if score >= level then turb = "<green>"..turb.."<grey>" else turb = "<dim_grey>"..turb.."<grey>" end str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end str = str.."\n\n" for k,v in pairs(tablen) do if not table.contains(lock_affs,k) and v >= level then local shine = "<green>" local dis,turb = "", "" dis = shine..string.format("%3.2f",v).."<grey>" turb = string.rpad(k,23," ") turb = shine..turb.."<grey>" str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb.."\n" end end else for i=1,#lock_affs do str = str.."\n" local dis,turb = "", "" if has(target,lock_affs[i]) then dis = "<green>x<grey>" else dis = "<saddle_brown>o<grey>" end turb = string.rpad(lock_affs[i],23," ") if has(target,lock_affs[i]) then turb = "<green>"..turb.."<grey>" else turb = "<dim_grey>"..turb.."<grey>" end str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb end str = str.."\n\n" for k,v in pairs(tablen) do if not table.contains(lock_affs,k) and not table.contains(c_affs,k) and v then local shine = "<green>" local dis,turb = "", "" dis = shine.."x<grey>" turb = string.rpad(k,23," ") turb = shine..turb.."<grey>" str = str.."["..dis.."] "..turb.."\n" end end end end return str end

Script.name: reset
Script.script: defiler.reset = function() defiler.augur_balance = true defiler.augur_time = 0 defiler.defences = { antibodies = false, blooddrinker = false, confutation = false, fleetness = false, heartblood = "", regrowth = false, recuperation = false, tears = false, transmission = false, toughness = false, } defiler.germinate = true defiler.germinate_time = 0 defiler.haze = 0 defiler.heartblood = "metrazol" defiler.hound_target = "" defiler.shroud_type = "" defiler.sprouts = false defiler.transmission_target = "" defiler.whirl_balance = true end

Script.name: prompt
Script.script:
defiler.prompt = function(len) local str = "" local time = os.time()
local n = 36 n = n - len
str = string.lpad(str,n," ")
if player(target) then
local prefix = " (" local postfix = ") " local separator = ":" local neutral = "<grey>"
if not defiler.sprouts then prefix = " <red>[<grey>" postfix = "<red>]<grey> " end
-- thornroot local troot = has(target,"thornroot") local troot_time = has(target,"thornroot_time")
if troot_time ~= 0 then troot_time = time - troot_time end troot_time = string.lpad(tostring(troot_time),2," ") if troot then troot_time = "<green>"..troot_time.."<grey>" end
-- demonic seeds local dseed = has(target,"demonic_seed") local dseed_time = has(target,"demonic_seed_time")
if dseed_time ~= 0 then dseed_time = time - dseed_time end dseed_time = string.lpad(tostring(dseed_time),2," ")
str = str..prefix str = str..troot_time..separator str = str..dseed..separator str = str..dseed_time str = str..postfix
local toxin = defiler.choose_toxin(target) -- str = str.." T: "..toxin
-- splinters local splints = has(target,"splinters") local to_print = {}
for name,moment in pairs(splints) do if moment ~= 0 then moment = 140 - (time - moment) -- do color referencing here -- string em up once! moment = tostring(moment) moment = string.lpad(moment,2," ") -- str = str..string.title(name)..": "..moment.." " end end
end if class == "Defiler" then cecho(str) end end

Script.name: ui_refresh
Script.script:
defiler.ui_refresh = function() clearWindow("defiler_ui") local str = "" local time = os.time() local neutral = "<grey>"
local color = "<goldenrod>" if player(target) and has(target,"gutwyrm") then color = "<medium_aquamarine>" end
-- local gcolor = neutral -- if not defiler.germinate then gcolor = "<red>" end -- str = str.."["..gcolor.."x"..neutral.."] "
-- first part ------------- if player(target) then -- head local head = has(target,"head") local head_time = has(target,"head_time") local head_c = "<dim_grey>" local head_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if head > 0 then head_c = "<green>" head_time_c = "<green> " end if head_time ~= 0 then head_time = 60 - (time - head_time) if head_time < 11 then head_time_c = "<red> " end end head = string.lpad(tostring(head),2," ") head_time = string.lpad(tostring(head_time),2," ")
str = str.." " str = str.."[HE: "..head_c..head..head_time_c..head_time..neutral.."] " str = str.." " end
local color = "<goldenrod>" if player(target) and has(target,"gutwyrm") then color = "<medium_aquamarine>" end
str = str.."T: "..color..target..neutral.." "
if player(target) then local sprouts = neutral
if not defiler.sprouts then sprouts = "<red>" end
-- thornroot local troot = has(target,"thornroot") local troot_time = has(target,"thornroot_time") local troot_c = "<red>"
if troot then troot_c = "<green>" end
if troot_time ~= 0 then troot_time = string.format("%.1f", 30 - (time - troot_time)) troot_time = string.lpad(troot_time,4,"0") else troot_time = "00.0" end
-- demonic seeds local dseed = has(target,"demonic_seed") local dseed_time = has(target,"demonic_seed_time") local dseed_c = neutral
if dseed > 0 then dseed_c = "<green>" end if dseed_time ~= 0 then dseed_time = 15 - (time - dseed_time) -- dseed_time = string.format("%.1f", time - dseed_time) end
str = str..sprouts.."Thornroot"..neutral..": "..troot_c..troot_time.." "..neutral str = str.."Seeds: "..dseed_c..dseed..neutral.." " str = str.."Timer: "..dseed_time..neutral.." "
-- whirling local whirl_c = neutral if defiler.whirl_balance then whirl_c = "<goldenrod>" end str = str..whirl_c.." || "..neutral
-- splinters local splints = has(target,"splinters") local to_print = {}
for name,moment in pairs(splints) do if moment ~= 0 then moment = 120 - (time - moment) -- do color referencing here -- string em up once! moment = tostring(moment) moment = string.lpad(moment,2," ") str = str..string.title(name)..": "..moment.." " end end end
str = str.."\n" -- second part ------------- if player(target) then -- right arm local rarm = has(target,"right_arm") local rarm_time = has(target,"right_arm_time") local rarm_c = "<dim_grey>" local rarm_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if rarm > 0 then rarm_c = "<green>" rarm_time_c = "<green> " end if rarm_time ~= 0 then rarm_time = 60 - (time - rarm_time) if rarm_time < 11 then rarm_time_c = "<red> " end end rarm = string.lpad(tostring(rarm),2," ") rarm_time = string.lpad(tostring(rarm_time),2," ")
str = str.."[RA: "..rarm_c..rarm..rarm_time_c..rarm_time..neutral.."] "
-- torso local torso = has(target,"torso") local torso_time = has(target,"torso_time") local torso_c = "<dim_grey>" local torso_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if torso > 0 then torso_c = "<green>" torso_time_c = "<green> " end if torso_time ~= 0 then torso_time = 60 - (time - torso_time) if torso_time < 11 then torso_time_c = "<red> " end end torso = string.lpad(tostring(torso),2," ") torso_time = string.lpad(tostring(torso_time),2," ")
str = str.."[TO: "..torso_c..torso..torso_time_c..torso_time..neutral.."] "
-- left arm local larm = has(target,"left_arm") local larm_time = has(target,"left_arm_time") local larm_c = "<dim_grey>" local larm_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if larm > 0 then larm_c = "<green>" larm_time_c = "<green> " end if larm_time ~= 0 then larm_time = 60 - (time - larm_time) if larm_time < 11 then larm_time_c = "<red> " end end larm = string.lpad(tostring(larm),2," ") larm_time = string.lpad(tostring(larm_time),2," ")
str = str.."[LA: "..larm_c..larm..larm_time_c..larm_time..neutral.."] "
local limb_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.target ~= "nothing" then limb_c = "<dark_turquoise>" end str = str.."T: "..limb_c..string.lpad(string.title(limb.target),8," ")..neutral
local parry_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.parry ~= "nothing" then parry_c = "<dark_turquoise>" end str = str.." P: "..parry_c..string.lpad(string.title(limb.parry),8," ")..neutral
local hb_c,hb = "<dim_grey>","" if defiler.defences.heartblood ~= "" then hb_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" hb = string.lpad(string.title(defiler.defences.heartblood),8," ") else hb = "Nothing" end str = str.." Hb: "..hb_c..hb..neutral
str = str.."\n"
-- right leg local rleg = has(target,"right_leg") local rleg_time = has(target,"right_leg_time") local rleg_c = "<dim_grey>" local rleg_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if rleg > 0 then rleg_c = "<green>" rleg_time_c = "<green> " end if rleg_time ~= 0 then rleg_time = 60 - (time - rleg_time) if rleg_time < 11 then rleg_time_c = "<red> " end end rleg = string.lpad(tostring(rleg),2," ") rleg_time = string.lpad(tostring(rleg_time),2," ")
str = str.."[RL: "..rleg_c..rleg..rleg_time_c..rleg_time..neutral.."] "
-- placeholder str = str.." "
-- left leg local lleg = has(target,"left_leg") local lleg_time = has(target,"left_leg_time") local lleg_c = "<dim_grey>" local lleg_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if lleg > 0 then lleg_c = "<green>" lleg_time_c = "<green> " end if lleg_time ~= 0 then lleg_time = 60 - (time - lleg_time) if lleg_time < 11 then lleg_time_c = "<red> " end end lleg = string.lpad(tostring(lleg),2," ") lleg_time = string.lpad(tostring(lleg_time),2," ")
str = str.."[LL: "..lleg_c..lleg..lleg_time_c..lleg_time..neutral.."] " end
-- Third part ------------- -- str = str.."\n" local haze, anb, rcp, reg, tgh, cnf = "<dim_grey>","<red>", "<red>", "<red>", "<red>", "<red>" local shr, bdr, ele = "<red>", "<red>", "<dim_grey>" if defiler.haze < 100000 then haze = "<red>" end if defiler.defences.antibodies then anb = "<medium_sea_green>" end if defiler.transmission_target ~= "" and inroom(defiler.transmission_target) then -- and enemy in room anb = "<cyan>" end if defiler.defences.recuperation then rcp = "<medium_sea_green>" end if defiler.defences.regrowth then reg = "<medium_sea_green>" end if defiler.defences.toughness then tgh = "<medium_sea_green>" end if defiler.defences.confutation then cnf = "<medium_sea_green>" end if defiler.defences.shroud then shr = "<medium_sea_green>" end if defiler.defences.blooddrinker then bdr = "<medium_sea_green>" end if defiler.shroud_type == "ice" then ele = "<cyan>" elseif defiler.shroud_type == "flame" then ele = "<orange_red>" elseif defiler.shroud_type == "bile" then ele = "<pale_green>" end
haze = haze..string.lpad(tostring(defiler.haze),7," ")
str = str.."Hz: "..haze..neutral.." " str = str.."["..anb.."ANB"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..rcp.."RCP"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..reg.."REG"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..tgh.."TGH"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..cnf.."CNF"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..shr.."SHR"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..bdr.."BDR"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..ele.."Ele"..neutral.."] "
cecho("defiler_ui",str) end

Script.name: timer
Script.script:
defiler.timer = function() if class == "Defiler" then
-- operate only on 'target' otherwise the overhead is too big local time = os.time()
local shadow_time = defiler.shadow_balance_time if shadow_time ~= 0 then shadow_time = time - shadow_time
if shadow_time > 30 then cecho("\n<red>Resetting Shadow Balance.") defiler.shadow_balance = true defiler.shadow_balance_time = 0 end end
if player(target) then
-- thornroots local troot = has(target,"thornroot") local troot_time = has(target,"thornroot_time")
if troot_time ~= 0 then troot_time = time - troot_time
if troot_time > 40 then cecho("\n<red>Resetting Thornroot for "..target..".") set(target,"thornroot",false) set(target,"thornroot_time",0) end end
-- demonic seeds local dseed = has(target,"demonic_seed") local dseed_time = has(target,"demonic_seed_time")
if dseed_time ~= 0 then dseed_time = time - dseed_time
if dseed_time > 15 then cecho("\n<red>Resetting demonic seed for "..target..".") dseed = dseed - 1 if dseed < 0 then dseed = 0 end set(target,"demonic_seed",dseed) set(target,"demonic_seed_time",0) end end
local augur = defiler.augur_time
if not defiler.augur_balance and augur ~= 0 then augur = time - augur if augur > 8 then cecho("\n<red>Resetting Augury Balance.") defiler.augur_balance = true defiler.augur_time = 0 end end
-- splinters local splints = has(target,"splinters") local to_clear = {}
for name,moment in pairs(splints) do if moment ~= 0 then moment = time - moment if moment > 140 then table.insert(to_clear,name) end end end for i=1,#to_clear do local short = "splinters."..to_clear[i] set(target,short,0) end
local gtime = defiler.germinate_time if gtime ~= 0 then gtime = time - gtime if gtime > 5 then cecho("\n<red>Resetting GERMINATE.") defiler.germinate = true defiler.germinate_time = 0 end end
local corrosion = has(target,"corrosion") local to_clear_c = {}
for name,moment in pairs(corrosion) do if moment ~= 0 then moment = time - moment if moment > 11 then table.insert(to_clear_c,name) end end end for i=1,#to_clear_c do local short = "corrosion."..to_clear_c[i] set(target,short,0) end
end
defiler.ui_refresh() dbp.ui_refresh() end end

Script.name: choose_spell
Script.script:
defiler.choose_spell = function(name,list) _hload(name) if not player(name) and type(name) == "table" then list = name name = me end local spell = "" local list = list or ecopy(defiler.spell_queue)
for i=1, #list do if not has(name, list[i]) then spell = list[i] break end end
spell = lookup(spell,defiler.spellbook)
return spell end

Script.name: choose_toxin
Script.script:
defiler.choose_toxin = function(name,list) _hload(name) if not player(name) and type(name) == "table" then list = name name = me end local toxin = "" local list = list or ecopy(defiler.toxins) local clist = has(name,"corrosion")
if _G.paralysis then table.remove(list,table.index_of(list,"numbness")) end
for i=1, #list do if not _G[list[i]] and (not clist[list[i]] or clist[list[i]] == 0) then toxin = list[i] break end end
toxin = lookup(toxin,dban.toxin_dictionary)
return toxin end

Script.name: sleep
Script.script:
defiler.sleep = function(name) local str = ""
if player(name) then if (has(name,"rebounding") or has(name,"shield")) and tonumber(defiler.haze) > 5000 then str = str.."devastate target opium "..sp str = str.."shadowbind target with sleep"..sp elseif has(name,"rebounding") or has(name,"shield") then str = str.."devastate target ciguatoxin "..sp str = str.."torment target with entropy"..sp else str = str.."ravage target opium"..sp str = str.."shadowbind target with sleep"..sp end else str = str.."devastate target ciguatoxin"..sp str = str.."torment target with entropy"..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: splinters
Script.script:
defiler.splinters = function(name)
local apple = has(name,"splinters.apple") local ash = has(name,"splinters.ash") local beech = has(name,"splinters.beech") local birch = has(name,"splinters.birch") local blackthorn = has(name,"splinters.blackthorn") local elder = has(name,"splinters.elder") local hazel = has(name,"splinters.hazel") local honeysuckle = has(name,"splinters.honeysuckle") local hawthorn = has(name,"splinters.hawthorn") local willow = has(name,"splinters.willow")
if apple == 0 then apple = false end if ash == 0 then ash = false end if beech == 0 then beech = false end if birch == 0 then birch = false end if blackthorn == 0 then blackthorn = false end if elder == 0 then elder = false end if hazel == 0 then hazel = false end if honeysuckle == 0 then honeysuckle = false end if hawthorn == 0 then hawthorn = false end if willow == 0 then willow = false end
return apple,ash,beech,birch,blackthorn,elder,hazel,honeysuckle,hawthorn,willow end

Script.name: defiler.damage
Script.script:
defiler.damage = function(name) _hload(name)
local toxin = " "..defiler.choose_toxin(name).." "
local apple,ash,beech,birch,blackthorn,elder,hazel,honeysuckle,hawthorn,willow = defiler.splinters(name)
local str,whirl,germinate = "","","" local strike,post = "","" local empowered = ecopy(has(name,"empowered")) -- table.contains(empowered,"apple") local draw = wield()
-- Whirl if defiler.whirl_balance then if not apple then whirl = "apple" elseif not hawthorn then whirl = "hawthorn" elseif not elder then whirl = "elder" elseif not blackthorn then whirl = "blackthorn" elseif not beech then whirl = "beech" elseif not honeysuckle then whirl = "honeysuckle" elseif not birch then whirl = "birch" elseif not hazel then whirl = "hazel" elseif not ash then whirl = "ash" elseif not willow then whirl = "willow" end end
-- Germinate if defiler.germinate then if has(name,"shield") and (apple or whirl == "apple") then germinate = "apple" elseif hawthorn or whirl == "hawthorn" then germinate = "hawthorn" elseif elder or whirl == "elder" then germinate = "elder" elseif blackthorn or whirl == "blackthorn" then germinate = "blackthorn" elseif beech or whirl == "beech" then germinate = "beech" elseif honeysuckle or whirl == "honeysuckle" then germinate = "honeysuckle" elseif birch or whirl == "birch" then germinate = "birch" elseif hazel or whirl == "hazel" then germinate = "hazel" elseif ash or whirl == "ash" then germinate = "ash" elseif willow or whirl == "willow" then germinate = "willow" else end -- Empower else end
-- Balance if has(name,"rebounding") then strike = "devastate " elseif has(name,"shield") and not germinate == "apple" then strike = "devastate " else strike = "ravage " end
-- Thornroot local troot = has(name,"thornroot") if not troot and defiler.sprouts then troot = " with thornroot " else troot = "" end
-- Equilibrium -- if seed then bellow if has(name,"demonic_seed") > 0 then post = "treant bellow target" end -- if empower, then choose empower action -- otherwise local splint = "" if has(name,"thornroot") then if not apple and whirl ~= "apple" then splint = "apple" elseif not hawthorn and whirl ~= "hawthorn" then splint = "hawthorn" elseif not elder and whirl ~= "elder" then splint = "elder" elseif not blackthorn and whirl ~= "blackthorn" then splint = "blackthorn" end if splint ~= "" then splint = "treant splinter target "..splint end end if hp/mhp < 0.4 then splint = "shadowbind target with healthdrain" end
-- Construction str = str.."order treant attack target"..sp if draw ~= "" then str = str..draw..sp end if whirl ~= "" then str = str.."whirl branch at target "..whirl..sp end if germinate ~= "" then str = str.."treant germinate target "..germinate..sp end if strike ~= "" then str = str..strike.." target "..toxin..troot..sp end if post ~= "" then str = str..post..sp end if splint ~= "" then str = str..splint..sp end
str = "queue eqbal "..str str = str.."trueassess target"..sp str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: defiler.damager
Script.script:
defiler.damager = function(name) _hload(name)
local toxin = " "..defiler.choose_toxin(name).." "
-- Seed | Empower | Germinate | -- =================================================================== -- * Apple | | -Shield |. -- * Ash | | Torment aff @5s | -- * Beech | | Reset Sap timer |. -- * Birch | | Nausea, small damage | -- * Blackthorn | Shred x 2 | Inverse to hp |. -- * Elder | Dryblood @4s | Bleeding to dmg, clot 33% |. -- * Hazel | 50% Bellow heal | Electrical to torments | -- * Honeysuckle | Harrow dmg | Recklessness |. -- * Hawthorn | Entangle dmg | Bleeding |. -- * Willow | | Torment aff @10s | -- -------------------------------------------------------------------
