-- Desecration | C | Balance | Effect | -- ====================================================================== -- * Whirl | x | - | Implants splinter | -- * Confuse | x | Eq: 2.20 | Confusion | -- * Intoxicate | x | Eq: 2.20 | Dryblood | -- * Rigidity | x | Eq: 3.20 | Rigidity, longer writhe times | repeats t:3 if <75% mhp -- * Shred | x | Eq: 3.20 | Addiction, damage, bleeding | -- * Splinter | x | Eq: 2.70 | Forms splinter <type> | -- * Smash | x | Eq: 2.20 | Crippled limb | -- * Trip | x | Eq: 2.20 | Trip | -- * Bellow | x | Eq: 3.20 | Explodes demonic seeds | -- * Harrow | - | Eq: 2.70 | Steals eq 2.20 | -- * Sustain | - | Eq: 3.20 | Heals player | -- * Entangle | - | Eq: 3.20 | Entangle | -- * Woodheart | - | Bal: 3.70 | Invincible 30s | -- * Implant | - | Eq: 4.24 | Implant seed, seed x 3 is insta | -- * Evolve | - | Eq: 2.75 | | -- ---------------------------------------------------------------------- -- * Whirlpool | - | Bal: 2.60 | Periodic underwater (no mass) | -- * Tempest | - | Bal: 3.00 | Periodic disruption | -- * Bloodrain | - | Bal: 3.00 | Periodic poison/toxin area-wide | -- * Blackvines | - | Bal: 2.60 | Tangle on exit | -- * Heartblood | - | Bal: 2.60 | 60s ignore <toxin> | -- ----------------------------------------------------------------------
local apple,ash,beech,birch,blackthorn,elder,hazel,honeysuckle,hawthorn,willow = defiler.splinters(name)
local str,whirl,germinate = "","","" local strike,post = "","" local empowered = ecopy(has(name,"empowered")) -- table.contains(empowered,"apple") local draw = wield()
-- Whirl if defiler.whirl_balance then if not apple then whirl = "apple" elseif not hawthorn then whirl = "hawthorn" elseif not blackthorn then whirl = "blackthorn" elseif not beech then whirl = "beech" elseif not elder then whirl = "elder" elseif not honeysuckle then whirl = "honeysuckle" elseif not birch then whirl = "birch" elseif not hazel then whirl = "hazel" elseif not ash then whirl = "ash" elseif not willow then whirl = "willow" end end
-- Germinate if defiler.germinate then if has(name,"shield") and (apple or whirl == "apple") then germinate = "apple" elseif hawthorn or whirl == "hawthorn" then germinate = "hawthorn" elseif blackthorn or whirl == "blackthorn" then germinate = "blackthorn" elseif beech or whirl == "beech" then germinate = "beech" elseif elder or whirl == "elder" then germinate = "elder" elseif honeysuckle or whirl == "honeysuckle" then germinate = "honeysuckle" elseif birch or whirl == "birch" then germinate = "birch" elseif hazel or whirl == "hazel" then germinate = "hazel" elseif ash or whirl == "ash" then germinate = "ash" elseif willow or whirl == "willow" then germinate = "willow" else end -- Empower else end
-- Balance if has(name,"rebounding") then strike = "devastate " elseif has(name,"shield") then strike = "devastate " else strike = "ravage " end
-- Thornroot local troot = has(name,"thornroot") if not troot and defiler.sprouts then troot = " with thornroot " else troot = "" end
-- Equilibrium
-- if empower, then choose empower action -- otherwise local splint = "" if has(name,"thornroot") then if not apple and whirl ~= "apple" then splint = "apple" elseif not hawthorn and whirl ~= "hawthorn" then splint = "hawthorn" elseif not blackthorn and whirl ~= "blackthorn" then splint = "blackthorn" elseif not beech and whirl ~= "beech" then splint = "beech" elseif not elder and whirl ~= "elder" then splint = "elder" elseif not honeysuckle and whirl ~= "honeysuckle" then splint = "honeysuckle" elseif not birch and whirl ~= "birch" then splint = "birch" elseif not hazel and whirl ~= "hazel" then splint = "hazel" elseif not ash and whirl ~= "ash" then splint = "ash" elseif not willow and whirl ~= "willow" then splint = "willow" end splint = "treant splinter target "..splint end if hp/mhp < 0.4 then splint = "shadowbind target with healthdrain" end
-- if seed then bellow if has(name,"demonic_seed") > 0 then post = "treant bellow target" if defiler.germinate and (elder or whirl == "elder") then germinate = "elder" end end
-- Construction if draw ~= "" then str = str..draw..sp end if whirl ~= "" then str = str.."whirl branch at target "..whirl..sp end if germinate ~= "" then str = str.."treant germinate target "..germinate..sp end if strike ~= "" then str = str..strike.." target "..toxin..troot..sp end if post ~= "" then str = str..post..sp end
str = "queue eqbal "..str str = str.."trueassess target"..sp str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: defiler.control
defiler.shatter
Script.script:
defiler.shatter = function(name) local str = "" local tlist = { "butisol", "hemotoxin", "metrazol", "crippled right leg", "slow balance", "stupidity", } local toxin = " "..defiler.choose_toxin(name,tlist)
local apple,ash,beech,birch,blackthorn,elder,hazel,honeysuckle,hawthorn,willow = defiler.splinters(name)
-- whirl local w = "" if defiler.whirl_balance then if not hawthorn then w = "hawthorn" elseif not elder then w = "elder" elseif not blackthorn then w = "blackthorn" elseif not birch then w = "birch" elseif not honeysuckle then w = "honeysuckle" elseif not beech then w = "beech" end w = "whirl branch at target "..w end
-- attack local strike = "ravage " if has(name,"rebounding") or has(name,"shield") then strike = "devastate " end
-- thornroot local troot = has(name,"thornroot") if not troot and defiler.sprouts then troot = " with thornroot " else troot = "" end
-- off-bal action local post = "" -- splinters first local splint = "" if has(name,"thornroot") then if not elder then splint = "elder" elseif not hawthorn then splint = "hawthorn" elseif not blackthorn then splint = "blackthorn" elseif not birch then splint = "birch" elseif not honeysuckle then splint = "honeysuckle" elseif not beech then splint = "beech" end splint = "treant splinter target "..splint end if defiler.augur_balance then post = post.."shadowbind target with augury of applying restoration to back"..sp else post = post.."treant rigidity target"..sp end
str = str.."order treant attack target"..sp str = str.."quickdraw ".._l.." ".._r..sp str = str..w..sp str = str..strike..name..toxin..troot..sp str = str..post..sp
-- calculate the queue portion [treant trip] local newstrike,newtoxin,newpost = "","","" if strike == "devastate " then newstrike = "ravage " else newstrike = "devastate " end table.remove(tlist,table.index_of(tlist,"butisol")) table.remove(tlist,table.index_of(tlist,"hemotoxin")) for i=1,#tlist do if tlist[i] == revlookup(string.trim(toxin),dban.toxin_dictionary) then newtoxin = " "..tlist[i+1] break else newtoxin = " metrazol" end end newpost = "treant trip target"
-- str = str.."queue eqbal "..newstrike..name..newtoxin..sp -- str = str..newpost..sp
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: defiler.prone
Script.script:
defiler.prone = function(name) local str = "" local tlist = { "butisol", "hemotoxin", "metrazol", "crippled right leg", "slow balance", "stupidity", } local toxin = " "..defiler.choose_toxin(name,tlist)
local apple,ash,beech,birch,blackthorn,elder,hazel,honeysuckle,hawthorn,willow = defiler.splinters(name)
-- whirl local w = "" if defiler.whirl_balance then if not hawthorn then w = "hawthorn" elseif not elder then w = "elder" elseif not blackthorn then w = "blackthorn" elseif not birch then w = "birch" elseif not honeysuckle then w = "honeysuckle" elseif not beech then w = "beech" end w = "whirl branch at target "..w end
-- attack local strike = "ravage " if has(name,"rebounding") or has(name,"shield") then strike = "devastate " end
-- thornroot local troot = has(name,"thornroot") if not troot and defiler.sprouts then troot = " with thornroot " else troot = "" end
-- off-bal action local post = "treant trip target"..sp
str = str.."order treant attack target"..sp str = str.."quickdraw "..left.." "..right..sp str = str..w..sp str = str..strike..name..toxin..troot..sp str = str..post..sp
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: defiler.stall
Script.script:
defiler.stall = function(name) local str = ""
local spell = " treant smash target " local tlist = { "crippled left arm", "crippled right arm", "crippled left leg", "crippled right leg", } local toxin = " "..defiler.choose_toxin(name,tlist)
local apple,ash,beech,birch,blackthorn,elder,hazel,honeysuckle,hawthorn,willow = defiler.splinters(name)
-- whirl local w = "" if defiler.whirl_balance then if not hawthorn then w = "hawthorn" elseif not elder then w = "elder" elseif not blackthorn then w = "blackthorn" elseif not birch then w = "birch" elseif not honeysuckle then w = "honeysuckle" elseif not beech then w = "beech" end w = "whirl branch at target "..w end
-- attack local strike = "ravage " if has(name,"rebounding") or has(name,"shield") then strike = "devastate " end
-- thornroot local troot = has(name,"thornroot") if not troot and defiler.sprouts then troot = " with thornroot " else troot = "" end
-- treant smash if toxin == " benzene" and not has(name,"crippled left arm") then spell = spell.."right arm"..sp elseif toxin == " benzene" and not has(name,"crippled right leg") then spell = spell.."right leg"..sp elseif toxin == " benzedrine" and not has(name,"crippled right leg") then spell = spell.."right leg"..sp end
str = str.."order treant attack target"..sp str = str.."quickdraw "..defiler.flail..sp str = str..w..sp str = str..strike..name..toxin..troot..sp str = str..spell..sp
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: defiler.push
Script.script:
defiler.push_toxins = { "sunallergy", "nausea", "numbness", "metrazol", "hemotoxin", "asthma", } defiler.push_spells = { "dryblood", "addiction", "confusion", "hallucinations", "haemophilia", }
defiler.push = function(name,list) _hload(name)
local str = ""
local spell = " " local toxin = " "..defiler.choose_toxin(name).." "
for i=1,#defiler.push_spells do if not _G[defiler.push_spells[i]] then spell = spell..lookup(defiler.push_spells[i],defiler.spellbook)..sp table.insert(defiler.push_spells,defiler.push_spells[i]) table.remove(defiler.push_spells,1) end end
local apple,ash,beech,birch,blackthorn,elder,hazel,honeysuckle,hawthorn,willow = defiler.splinters(name)
-- whirl local w,step = "","" if defiler.whirl_balance then if not blackthorn then w = "blackthorn" elseif not hawthorn then w = "hawthorn" elseif not elder then w = "elder" elseif not birch then w = "birch" elseif not honeysuckle then w = "honeysuckle" elseif not beech then w = "beech" end step = "whirl branch at target "..w end
-- attack local strike = "ravage " if has(name,"rebounding") or has(name,"shield") then strike = "devastate " end
-- thornroot local troot = has(name,"thornroot") if not troot and defiler.sprouts then troot = " with thornroot " else troot = "" end
-- off-bal action local post = "" -- splinters first local splint = "" if has(name,"thornroot") then if not blackthorn and w ~= "blackthorn" then splint = "blackthorn" elseif not elder and w ~= "elder" then splint = "elder" elseif not hawthorn and w ~= "hawthorn" then splint = "hawthorn" elseif not birch and w ~= "birch" then splint = "birch" elseif not honeysuckle and w ~= "honeysuckle" then splint = "honeysuckle" elseif not beech and w ~= "beech" then splint = "beech" end splint = "treant splinter target "..splint end post = post..splint..sp post = post..spell..sp
str = str.."order treant attack target"..sp str = str.."quickdraw flail shield"..sp str = str..step..sp str = str..strike..name..toxin..troot..sp str = str..post..sp
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: defiler.hit
Script.script:
defiler.hit_toxins = { "numbness", "hemotoxin", "nausea", "asthma", "metrazol", "sunallergy", } defiler.hit_spells = { "rigidity", "hallucinations", "confusion", "haemophilia", "dryblood", "addiction", }
defiler.hit = function(name) _hload(name)
local str = "" local spell = " " local toxin = " "..defiler.choose_toxin(name).." "
for i=1,#defiler.push_spells do if not _G[defiler.push_spells[i]] then spell = spell..lookup(defiler.push_spells[i],defiler.spellbook)..sp table.insert(defiler.push_spells,defiler.push_spells[i]) table.remove(defiler.push_spells,1) break end end
if has(name,"rebounding") or has(name,"shield") then str = str.."devastate " else str = str.."ravage " end
str = str..name..toxin..sp str = str..spell..sp str = str:gsub("target",name) return str end

Script.name: [d]
reset
Script.script: diabolist.reset = function() diabolist.daegger_balance = true diabolist.defences = { armor = false, putrefaction = false, syphon = false, lifevision = false, shroud = false, soulmask = false, deathaura = false, vengeance = false, blackwind = false, } diabolist.demon = "" diabolist.form = "" end

Script.name: prompt
Script.script:
diabolist.prompt = function(len) local str = "" local n = 44 n = n - len
str = string.lpad(str,n," ")
if player(target) then local count = dbp.count(target) local mcount = dbp.count(target,"hypno")
str = str.."[a: "..count.."][h: "..mcount.."] "
end
if class == "Diabolist" then cecho(str) end end

Script.name: ui_refresh
Script.script:
diabolist.ui_refresh = function() clearWindow("diabolist_ui") local str = "" local time = os.time() local neutral = "<grey>"
local color = "<goldenrod>" if player(target) then color = "<medium_aquamarine>" end if player(target) and has(target,"curseward") then color = "<red>" else color = "<green>" end
str = str.."T: "..color..target..neutral.." "
-- first part ------------- if player(target) then local random_affs = has(target,"random_affs") local random_affs_c = neutral if random_affs > 1 then random_affs_c = "<red>" end str = str..neutral.."(+"..random_affs_c..random_affs..neutral..") " end
-- second part ------------- str = str.."\n"
if player(target) then
end
local f_c = { wight = "<purple>", lich = "<violet_red>", ghast = "<cadet_blue>", ghoul = "<yellow>", } local fnc = "" if f_c[diabolist.form] then fnc = f_c[diabolist.form] end
str = str.."[ " str = str..fnc..string.rpad(string.title(diabolist.form),7," ") str = str..neutral.." ] "
local d_c = { daemonite = "<purple>", fiend = "<violet_red>", nightmare = "<cadet_blue>", } local dnc = "" if d_c[diabolist.demon] then dnc = d_c[diabolist.demon] end
str = str.."[ " str = str..dnc..string.rpad(string.title(diabolist.demon),9," ") str = str..neutral.." ] "
local parry_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.parry ~= "nothing" then parry_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."P: "..parry_c..string.title(limb.parry)..neutral
-- third part ------------- str = str.."\n" local arm, put = "<red>","<red>" local syp, lvi, shr, smk, dth = "<red>","<red>","<red>","<red>","<red>" local ven, bwd = "<red>","<red>"
if diabolist.defences.armor then arm = "<medium_sea_green>" end if diabolist.defences.putrefaction then put = "<medium_sea_green>" put_str = "SOD" end if diabolist.defences.syphon then syp = "<medium_sea_green>" end if diabolist.defences.lifevision then lvi = "<medium_sea_green>" end if diabolist.defences.shroud then shr = "<medium_sea_green>" end if diabolist.defences.soulmask then smk = "<medium_sea_green>" end if diabolist.defences.deathaura then dth = "<medium_sea_green>" end if diabolist.defences.vengeance then ven = "<medium_sea_green>" end if diabolist.defences.blackwind then bwd = "<medium_sea_green>" end
str = str.."["..dth.."DTH"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..ven.."VEN"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..arm.."DA "..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..lvi.."LVI"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..smk.."SMK"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..shr.."SHR"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..syp.."DSY"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..put.."PUT"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..bwd.."BWD"..neutral.."] "
local lse = "<red>" if df_ and df_.landsense then lse = "<green>" end str = str.."["..lse.."LSE"..neutral.."] "
local limb_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.target ~= "nothing" then limb_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."T: "..limb_c..string.title(limb.target)
cecho("diabolist_ui",str) end

Script.name: timer
Script.script:
diabolist.timer = function() if class == "Diabolist" then
-- operate only on 'target' otherwise the overhead is too big local time = os.time()
if player(target) then local fenugreek_t = has(target,"fenugreek_time")
if fenugreek_t ~= 0 then fenugreek_t = time - fenugreek_t if fenugreek_t > 5 then cecho("\n<white>Resetting Fenugreek Timer") set(target,"fenugreek",true) set(target,"fenugreek_time",0) end end
end
diabolist.ui_refresh() end end

Script.name: sleep
Script.script:
diabolist.sleep = function(name) local str = ""
if player(name) then
if not has(name,"curseward") then str = "deadeyes target sleep sleep"..sp else str = "deadeyes target breach fear"..sp end else str = "deadeyes target sleep sleep"..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: choose_toxin
Script.script:
diabolist.choose_toxin = function(name,elist,list) if not player(name) and type(name) == "table" then if elist then list = elist end elist = name name = me end
_hload(name)
local eye,eye2,toxin = "","","" local elist = elist or ecopy(diabolist.eye_queue) local list = list or ecopy(diabolist.toxin_queue)
if _G.paralysis then table.remove(elist,table.index_of(elist,"numbness")) table.remove(list,table.index_of(list,"numbness")) end
for i=1, #elist do if not _G[elist[i]] then eye = elist[i] break end end for i=1, #elist do if elist[i] ~= eye and not _G[elist[i]] then eye2 = elist[i] break end end
if has(name,"curseward") then eye2 = eye eye = "breach" end
for i=1, #list do if list[i] ~= eye and list[i] ~= eye2 and not _G[list[i]] then toxin = list[i] break end end
eye = lookup(eye,diabolist.spellbook) eye2 = lookup(eye2,diabolist.spellbook) toxin = lookup(toxin,dban.toxin_dictionary)
return eye, eye2, toxin end

Script.name: diabolist.deadeyes
Script.script:
diabolist.deadeyes = function(name) local str = ""
local eye, eye2, toxin = diabolist.choose_toxin(name)
_hload(name)
if not has(name,"prismatic") and diabolist.daegger_balance then str = str.."wipe daegger"..sp str = str.."daegger hunt target "..toxin..sp end str = str.."deadeyes target "..eye.." "..eye2..sp
-- Before lookup the syntax, check for reporting: local inc = {"impatience","anorexia","asthma"}
local e = revlookup(eye,diabolist.spellbook) local e2 = revlookup(eye2,diabolist.spellbook)
if config and config.share_full then str = "queue eqbal "..str str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..e..sp str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..e2..sp elseif config and config.share then if table.contains(inc,eye) then str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..e..sp end if table.contains(inc,eye2) then str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..e2..sp end str = "queue eqbal "..str end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: diabolist.damage, damage_
Script.script:
diabolist.damage = function(name,ta) local str = ""
local eye, eye2, toxin = diabolist.choose_toxin(name) _hload(name)
str = str.."deadeyes target breach vomiting"..sp str = str.."soulstorm target"..sp
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end
diabolist.damage_ = function(name,ta) local str = ""
local eye, eye2, toxin = diabolist.choose_toxin(name) _hload(name)
str = str.."deadeyes target breach vomiting"..sp
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: diabolist.deadeyes_
Script.script:
diabolist.deadeyes_ = function(name) local str = "" local elist = ecopy(diabolist.eye_queue) local list = ecopy(diabolist.toxin_queue)
_hload(name)
if anorexia and asthma and hemotoxin and impatience and (numbness or paralysis) and not slickness then table.insert(list,1,"slickness") elseif hemotoxin and impatience and (numbness or paralysis) and not slickness and not anorexia then table.insert(list,1,"slickness") table.insert(elist,1,"anorexia") end
local eye, eye2, toxin = diabolist.choose_toxin(name,elist,list)
if not has(name,"prismatic") and diabolist.daegger_balance then str = str.."wipe daegger"..sp str = str.."daegger hunt target "..toxin..sp end str = str.."deadeyes target "..eye.." "..eye2..sp
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: diabolist.infirmity
Script.script:
diabolist.infirmity = function(name) local str = "" local elist = ecopy(diabolist.eye_queue) local list = ecopy(diabolist.toxin_queue)
_hload(name)
local eye, eye2, toxin = diabolist.choose_toxin(name,elist,list)
if not has(name,"prismatic") and diabolist.daegger_balance then str = str.."wipe daegger"..sp str = str.."daegger hunt target "..toxin..sp end if eye ~= "breach" then str = str.."stare target infirmity"..sp else str = str.."deadeyes target "..eye.." "..eye2..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: diabolist.kelp
Script.script:
diabolist.kelp = function(name) local str = "" local elist = { "numbness", "impatience", "asthma", "clumsiness", "anorexia", "stupidity", "nausea", "epilepsy", "addiction", "peace", "masochism", "dementia", "vertigo", "claustrophobia", "agoraphobia", "recklessness", "dizziness", "confusion", "paranoia", "cyanide", } local list = { "hemotoxin", "butisol", "slickness", "sunallergy", "anorexia", "asthma", "numbness", "nausea", "slow equilibrium", "calotropis", "weariness", "stupidity", "metrazol", "recklessness", "dizziness", "clumsiness", "sensitivity", "slow balance", "withered throat", "ignorance", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "disloyalty", }
local eye, eye2, toxin = diabolist.choose_toxin(name,elist,list) _hload(name)
if not has(name,"prismatic") and diabolist.daegger_balance then str = str.."wipe daegger"..sp str = str.."daegger hunt target "..toxin..sp end str = str.."deadeyes target "..eye.." "..eye2..sp
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: diabolist.orphine
Script.script:
diabolist.orphine = function(name) local str = "" local elist = { "numbness", "impatience", "masochism", "claustrophobia", "asthma", "clumsiness", "anorexia", "stupidity", "nausea", "epilepsy", "vertigo", "addiction", "peace", "dementia", "agoraphobia", "recklessness", "dizziness", "confusion", "paranoia", "cyanide", } local list = { "calotropis", "sunallergy", "stupidity", "hemotoxin", "butisol", "anorexia", "slickness", "asthma", "numbness", "nausea", "slow equilibrium", "weariness", "metrazol", "recklessness", "dizziness", "clumsiness", "sensitivity", "slow balance", "withered throat", "ignorance", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "disloyalty", }
local eye, eye2, toxin = diabolist.choose_toxin(name,elist,list) _hload(name)
if not has(name,"prismatic") and diabolist.daegger_balance then str = str.."wipe daegger"..sp str = str.."daegger hunt target "..toxin..sp end str = str.."deadeyes target "..eye.." "..eye2..sp
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: diabolist.wormwood
Script.script:
diabolist.wormwood = function(name) local str = "" local elist = { "numbness", "impatience", "confusion", "dementia", "paranoia", "asthma", "clumsiness", "anorexia", "stupidity", "nausea", "epilepsy", "addiction", "peace", "masochism", "vertigo", "claustrophobia", "agoraphobia", "recklessness", "dizziness", "cyanide", } local list = { "hemotoxin", "butisol", "slickness", "sunallergy", "anorexia", "asthma", "numbness", "nausea", "slow equilibrium", "calotropis", "weariness", "stupidity", "metrazol", "recklessness", "dizziness", "clumsiness", "sensitivity", "slow balance", "withered throat", "ignorance", "slow herbs", "slow elixirs", "disloyalty", }
local eye, eye2, toxin = diabolist.choose_toxin(name,elist,list) _hload(name)
if not has(name,"prismatic") and diabolist.daegger_balance then str = str.."wipe daegger"..sp str = str.."daegger hunt target "..toxin..sp end str = str.."deadeyes target "..eye.." "..eye2..sp
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: [d]
[d] unleashes
Script.script:
summoner.unleash = summoner.unleash or true summoner.unleash_timer = summoner.unleash_timer or 0
summoner.arctar = summoner.arctar or true summoner.belial = summoner.belial or true summoner.buul = summoner.buul or true summoner.cadmus = summoner.cadmus or true summoner.dameron = summoner.dameron or true summoner.danaeus = summoner.danaeus or true summoner.eerion = summoner.eerion or true summoner.golgotha = summoner.golgotha or true summoner.hecate = summoner.hecate or true summoner.lyncantha = summoner.lyncantha or true summoner.marduk = summoner.marduk or true summoner.ninkharsag = summoner.ninkharsag or true summoner.palpatar = summoner.palpatar or true summoner.pyradius = summoner.pyradius or true summoner.rixil = summoner.rixil or true summoner.scrag = summoner.scrag or true summoner.skyrax = summoner.skyrax or true

Script.name: reset
Script.script: summoner.reset = function() summoner.marduk_g = false summoner.mlg = false summoner.mlg_timer = 0 summoner.defences = { deathsight = false, distortion = false, lifevision = false, soulchain = false, warmth = false, } summoner.unleash = true summoner.unleash_timer = 0 summoner.arctar = true summoner.belial = true summoner.buul = true summoner.cadmus = true summoner.dameron = true summoner.danaeus = true summoner.eerion = true summoner.golgotha = true summoner.hecate = true summoner.lyncantha = true summoner.marduk = true summoner.ninkharsag = true summoner.palpatar = true summoner.pyradius = true summoner.rixil = true summoner.scrag = true summoner.skyrax = true end

Script.name: prompt
Script.script:
summoner.prompt = function(len) local str = "" local n = 40 n = n - len
str = string.lpad(str,n," ")
if player(target) then local count = dbp.count(target) local mcount = dbp.count(target,"madness")
str = str.."[a: "..count.."][m: "..mcount.."] "
local taint = has(target,"taint") local incin = has(target,"incinerate") local ttn, symbol, edge = "<red>", "\\", "<dim_grey>" if incin then edge = "<red>" end if taint >= 10 then ttn = "<firebrick>" end if taint >= 20 then ttn = "<OrangeRed>" end if taint >= 30 then ttn = "<tomato>" end if taint >= 40 then ttn = "<HotPink>" end if taint >= 50 then ttn = "<medium_orchid>" end if taint >= 60 then ttn = "<magenta>" end if taint >= 70 then ttn = "<violet_red>" end if taint >= 80 then ttn = "<DeepPink>" end if taint >= 90 then ttn = "<medium_violet_red>" end if taint >= 100 then ttn = "<red>" end taint = math.floor( taint /10 ) str = str.." "..edge.."[[<grey>" if taint == 0 then ttn = ttn.."<dark_green>" for i=10, 1, -1 do ttn = ttn..symbol end else limit = taint for i=1, taint do ttn = ttn..symbol end ttn = ttn.."<dark_green>" for i=10, taint + 1, -1 do ttn = ttn..symbol end end str = str..ttn str = str..edge.."]]<gray>" end
if class == "Summoner" then cecho(str) end end

Script.name: ui_refresh
Script.script:
summoner.ui_refresh = function() clearWindow("summoner_ui") local str = "" local time = os.time() local neutral = "<grey>"
local color = "<goldenrod>" if player(target) then if has(target,"incinerate") then color = "<red>" else color = "<medium_aquamarine>" end end
str = str.."T: "..color..target..neutral.." "
-- first part ------------- if player(target) then local random_affs = has(target,"random_affs") local random_affs_c = neutral if random_affs > 1 then random_affs_c = "<red>" end str = str..neutral.."(+"..random_affs_c..random_affs..neutral..") " end
-- second part ------------- str = str.."\n"
if player(target) then local taint = has(target,"taint") local incin = has(target,"incinerate") local ttn, symbol, edge = "<red>", "\\", "<dim_grey>" if incin then edge = "<red>" end if taint >= 10 then ttn = "<firebrick>" end if taint >= 20 then ttn = "<OrangeRed>" end if taint >= 30 then ttn = "<tomato>" end if taint >= 40 then ttn = "<HotPink>" end if taint >= 50 then ttn = "<medium_orchid>" end if taint >= 60 then ttn = "<magenta>" end if taint >= 70 then ttn = "<violet_red>" end if taint >= 80 then ttn = "<DeepPink>" end if taint >= 90 then ttn = "<medium_violet_red>" end if taint >= 100 then ttn = "<red>" end taint = math.floor( taint /10 ) str = str.."T: "..edge.."[[<grey>" if taint == 0 then ttn = ttn.."<dark_green>" for i=10, 1, -1 do ttn = ttn..symbol end else limit = taint for i=1, taint do ttn = ttn..symbol end ttn = ttn.."<dark_green>" for i=10, taint + 1, -1 do ttn = ttn..symbol end end str = str..ttn str = str..edge.."]]<gray> "
-- hierophant local hierophant = has(target,"hierophant") local hierophant_time = has(target,"hierophant_time") local hierophant_c = "<dim_grey>"
if hierophant then hierophant_c = "<green>" end
if hierophant_time ~= 0 then hierophant_time = string.format("%.1f", 60 - (time - hierophant_time)) hierophant_time = string.lpad(hierophant_time,4,"0") else hierophant_time = "00.0" end
str = str.."H"..neutral..": "..hierophant_c..hierophant_time.." "..neutral end
local parry_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.parry ~= "nothing" then parry_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."P: "..parry_c..string.title(limb.parry)..neutral
-- third part ------------- str = str.."\n"
str = str.."U: "
local unleash_timer = summoner.unleash_timer local ttn, symbol, edge = "<red>", "x", "<dim_grey>"
if unleash_timer ~= 0 then edge = "<green>" unleash_timer = 5 - (time - unleash_timer) end
if unleash_timer >= 1 then ttn = "<firebrick>" end if unleash_timer >= 2 then ttn = "<tomato>" end if unleash_timer >= 3 then ttn = "<medium_orchid>" end if unleash_timer >= 4 then ttn = "<violet_red>" end if unleash_timer >= 5 then ttn = "<medium_violet_red>" end
str = str..edge..":<gray>" if unleash_timer <= 0 then ttn = ttn.."<dim_grey>" for i=5,1,-1 do ttn = ttn..symbol end else for i=1,unleash_timer do ttn = ttn..symbol end ttn = ttn.."<gray>" for i=5,unleash_timer+1,-1 do ttn = ttn..symbol end end str = str..ttn str = str..edge..":<gray> "
local dth, dst, lif, sch, wrm = "<red>","<red>","<red>","<red>","<red>"
if summoner.defences.deathsight then dth = "<medium_sea_green>" end if summoner.defences.distortion then dst = "<medium_sea_green>" end if summoner.defences.lifevision then lif = "<medium_sea_green>" end if summoner.defences.soulchain then sch = "<medium_sea_green>" end if summoner.defences.warmth then wrm = "<medium_sea_green>" end
str = str.."["..sch.."SCH"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..dst.."DST"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..wrm.."WRM"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..dth.."AVIS"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..lif.."LIF"..neutral.."] "
local limb_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.target ~= "nothing" then limb_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."T: "..limb_c..string.title(limb.target)
cecho("summoner_ui",str) end

Script.name: timer
Script.script:
summoner.timer = function() if class == "Summoner" then -- operate only on 'target' otherwise the overhead is too big local time = os.time()
-- if summoner.mlg_timer ~= 0 and (time - summoner.mlg) > 3 then -- summoner.mlg = false -- summoner.mlg_timer = 0 -- end
if player(target) then local unleash_timer = summoner.unleash_timer
if unleash_timer ~= 0 then unleash_timer = time - unleash_timer if unleash_timer > 5 then cecho("\n<white>Resetting Unleash Timer") summoner.unleash = true summoner.unleash_timer = 0 end end
local hierophant_time = has(target,"hierophant_time") if hierophant_time ~= 0 then hierophant_time = time - hierophant_time if hierophant_time > 60 then cecho("\n<white>Resetting <gold>Hierophant <white>Time") set(target,"hierophant",false) set(target,"hierophant_time",0) end end end
summoner.ui_refresh() end end

Script.name: choose_spell
Script.script:
summoner.choose_spell = function(name,list) if not player(name) and type(name) == "table" then list = name name = me end local spell,spell2,spell_h = "","","" local list = list or summoner.spell_queue local taint = tonumber(has(name,"taint"))
_hload(name)
for i=1, #list do if not _G[list[i]] then if string.match(lookup(list[i],summoner.spellbook)," ") and taint <= 20 then elseif list[i] == "manaleech" and summoner.mlg then else spell = list[i] break end end end
spell_h = spell spell = lookup(spell,summoner.spellbook) if spell == "moon masochism" then spell = "soulburn" end local t = {}
if string.match(spell," ") then t = string.split(spell," ") spell = t[1] spell2 = t[2] end
-- [[ instant ]] local spell3,spell4 = "","" if player(name) then local taint = has(name,"taint") if (taint >= 70 and spell2 == "") or taint >= 80 then for i=1,#list do if list[i] == "manaleech" and summoner.mlg then elseif not _G[list[i]] and list[i] ~= spell_h and not string.match(lookup(list[i],summoner.spellbook)," ") then spell3 = list[i] spell4 = "instant" break end end end end if spell3 ~= "" then spell3 = lookup(spell3,summoner.spellbook) end if spell3 == "moon masochism" then spell3 = "soulburn" end
return spell,spell2,spell3,spell4 end

Script.name: choose_tarot
Script.script:
summoner.choose_tarot = function(name,list) if not player(name) and type(name) == "table" then list = name name = me end local card,card2 = "","" local list = list or summoner.tarot_queue
_hload(name)
for i=1, #list do if not _G[list[i]] then card = list[i] break end end
card = lookup(card,summoner.spellbook) local t = {}
if string.match(card," ") then t = string.split(card," ") card = t[1] card2 = t[2] end
return card,card2 end

Script.name: choose_unleash
Script.script:
summoner.choose_unleash = function(list) local str = "" local list = list or summoner.unleash_queue
if summoner.unleash then str = "unleash demon at target" for i=1,#list do local d,e,t = list[i],"",{} if string.match(d,"dameron %l+") then t = string.split(d,"%s+") d = t[1] e = t[2] end if summoner[d] then str = str:gsub("demon",d) str = str.." "..e break end end end
return str end

Script.name: summoner.damage
Script.script:
summoner.damage = function(name, ta) local str = "" local taint = tonumber(has(name,"taint")) local count = tonumber(dbp.count(name))
_hload(name)
local spells = { "impatience", "epilepsy", "asthma", "vertigo", "hallucinations", "masochism", }
if taint < 30 then table.insert(spells,1,"burning nerves") end
local spell,spell2 = summoner.choose_spell(name, spells) local unleasher = summoner.choose_unleash() -- , "dmg" local eq = eq or 0 local bal = bal or 0 local eqbal = false if eq == 1 and bal == 1 then eqbal = true end
local e_valid = evalid()
if has(name,"shield") then if e_valid and e.hp <= 0.6*e.mhp then str = str.."invoke cleanseaura "..name..sp str = str..unleasher unleasher = "" else str = str.."touch hammer "..name..sp str = str..unleasher unleasher = "" end else if madness then str = str.."invoke enlighten "..name..sp elseif hp/mhp < 0.4 then str = str.."invoke aurashift "..name..sp elseif count >= 7 and taint >= 70 then str = str.."fling devil at "..name..sp elseif count >= 3 and summoner.unleash and taint >= 70 and summoner.cadmus and eqbal then str = str.."unleash cadmus at "..name..sp str = str.."invoke hellsight "..name.." instant"..sp str = str.."fling devil at "..name..sp elseif count >= 3 and summoner.unleash and taint >= 70 and summoner.lyncantha and eqbal then str = str.."unleash lyncantha at "..name..sp str = str.."invoke combustion "..name.." instant intensify"..sp str = str.."fling devil at "..name..sp elseif not has(name,"tree") and not has(name,"purge") and not has(name,"herb") and taint >= 70 and summoner.unleash and summoner.pyradius and summoner.cadmus and eqbal then str = str.."unleash cadmus at "..name..sp str = str.."invoke disorient "..name.." instant intensify"..sp str = str.."fling moon hellsight at "..name.." recklessness"..sp elseif taint >= 60 and asthma then str = str.."invoke hellsight "..name.." duplicate"..sp elseif taint >= 100 then if not incin then str = str.."invoke incinerate "..name..sp else str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." "..spell2.." duplicate"..sp end elseif taint >= 90 and incin and pyradius == 1 then str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." "..spell2.." duplicate"..sp elseif taint >= 90 and incin and dameron == 1 then str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." "..spell2.." duplicate"..sp elseif taint >= 10 and taint < 40 then if summoner.pyradius and summoner.unleash and eqbal then str = str.."invoke heave "..name.." intensify"..sp str = str.."unleash pyradius at "..name..sp elseif summoner.dameron and summoner.unleash and eqbal then str = str.."invoke heave "..name.." intensify"..sp str = str.."unleash dameron at "..name.." pyradius"..sp else str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." "..spell2..sp end elseif taint >= 40 then str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." "..spell2..sp elseif incin and taint >= 90 then str = str.."invoke quicken "..name.." "..spell2.." duplicate"..sp elseif incin and taint <= 20 then str = str.."invoke nerveburn "..name.." "..spell2..sp else str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." "..spell2..sp end end
if unleasher then str = str..unleasher..sp end
local ta = ta or false if ta then str = str.."trueassess "..name..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name)
send(str) end

Script.name: summoner.duplicate
Script.script:
summoner.duplicate = function(name, ta) local str = "" local taint = tonumber(has(name,"taint")) local count = tonumber(dbp.count(name))
_hload(name)
local spells = { "impatience", "masochism", "epilepsy", "asthma", "vertigo", "hallucinations", }
if taint < 30 then table.insert(spells,1,"burning nerves") end
local spell,spell2 = summoner.choose_spell(name, spells) local unleasher = summoner.choose_unleash() -- , "dmg" local eq = eq or 0 local bal = bal or 0 local eqbal = false if eq == 1 and bal == 1 then eqbal = true end
local e_valid = evalid()
if has(name,"shield") then if e_valid and e.hp <= 0.6*e.mhp then str = str.."invoke cleanseaura "..name..sp str = str..unleasher unleasher = "" else str = str.."touch hammer "..name..sp str = str..unleasher unleasher = "" end else if madness then str = str.."enlighten "..name..sp elseif hp/mhp < 0.4 then str = str.."invoke aurashift "..name..sp elseif count >= 3 and summoner.unleash and taint >= 70 and summoner.cadmus and eqbal then str = str.."unleash cadmus at "..name..sp str = str.."invoke hellsight "..name.." instant"..sp str = str.."fling devil at "..name..sp elseif count >= 3 and summoner.unleash and taint >= 70 and summoner.lyncantha and eqbal then str = str.."unleash lyncantha at "..name..sp str = str.."invoke combustion "..name.." instant intensify"..sp str = str.."fling devil at "..name..sp elseif taint >= 100 then spell = "soulburn" str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." "..spell2.." duplicate"..sp elseif taint >= 70 and pyradius == 1 then str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." "..spell2.." duplicate"..sp elseif taint >= 70 and dameron == 1 then str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." "..spell2.." duplicate"..sp elseif taint >= 10 and taint < 40 then if summoner.pyradius and summoner.unleash and eqbal then str = str.."invoke heave "..name.." intensify"..sp str = str.."unleash pyradius at "..name..sp elseif summoner.dameron and summoner.unleash and eqbal then str = str.."invoke heave "..name.." intensify"..sp str = str.."unleash dameron at "..name.." pyradius"..sp else str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." "..spell2..sp end elseif taint >= 40 then str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." "..spell2..sp elseif incin and taint >= 90 then str = str.."invoke quicken "..name.." "..spell2.." duplicate"..sp elseif incin and taint <= 30 then str = str.."invoke nerveburn "..name.." "..spell2..sp else str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." "..spell2..sp end end
if unleasher then str = str..unleasher..sp end
local ta = ta or false if ta then str = str.."trueassess "..name..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: summoner.afflict
Script.script:
summoner.afflict = function(name,list) local str = "" local slist = { "impatience", "asthma", "sunallergy", "hellsight", "burning nerves", "masochism", "clumsiness", "butisol", "taint attunement", "disloyalty", "epilepsy", "vertigo", "hallucinations", "prone", } local tlist = { "numbness", "manaleech", "justice", "masochism", "stupidity", "heroism", "confusion", "recklessness", "numbness", "dementia", "hypersomnia", "paranoia", -- "lovers", } local ulist = { "hecate", "dameron hecate", "cadmus", "dameron cadmus", "lyncantha", "belial", "golgotha", "dameron golgotha", "palpatar", "pyradius", "scrag", "cadmus", "dameron hecate", "rixil", "buul", } if player(name) then local taint = has(name,"taint") local affcount = dbp.count(name) local mcount = dbp.count(name,"madness") local hierophant = has(name,"hierophant") -- local incin = has(name,"incinerate")
_hload(name)
if taint < 50 then table.insert(ulist,1,"pyradius") table.insert(ulist,2,"dameron pyradius") end
local spell,spell2,spell3,spell4 = summoner.choose_spell(name,slist) local unl = summoner.choose_unleash(ulist) unl = unl:gsub("target",name)
if taint >= 60 then table.insert( slist,2,"sensitivity" ) table.insert( slist,3,"taint attunement" ) end if taint >= 20 then table.insert( slist,2,"asthma" ) end if affcount >= 4 and has(name,"asthma") then table.insert( slist,2,"hellsight" ) end if affcount >= 4 then table.insert( slist,2,"clumsiness" ) table.insert( slist,2,"masochism" ) end if hellsight and not asthma and taint >= 20 then table.insert( slist,2,"asthma" ) end if affcount >= 4 then slist = { "impatience", "hellsight", "clumsiness", "asthma", "taint attunement", "butisol", "disloyalty", "sunallergy", "burning nerves", "masochism", "epilepsy", "vertigo", "hallucinations", "prone", } tlist = { "stupidity", "confusion", "masochism", "lovers", "heroism", "manaleech", "recklessness", "dementia", "hypersomnia", "paranoia", "justice", "numbness", } end
local spell, spell2, spell3, spell4 = summoner.choose_spell( name, slist ) local card, card2 = summoner.choose_tarot( name,tlist )
-- if not hierophant then card = "hierophant" card2 = "" end
if taint >= 80 and not stupidity and impatience then spell = "fever" spell2 = "intensify" end
if spell3 ~= "" then str = str.."invoke "..spell3.." "..name.." "..spell4..sp end
if madness then str = "queue eqbal "..str str = str.."light pipes"..sp str = str.."give 180911 to "..name..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed "..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp str = str.."invoke enlighten "..name..sp -- str = str.."trueassess "..name..sp elseif mcount >= 4 and affcount >= 7 and impatience then str = "queue eqbal "..str str = str..unl..sp if taint >= 60 and not impatience then str = str.."invoke quicken "..name.." instant"..sp end str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness "..name..sp -- str = str.."trueassess "..name..sp elseif mcount >=3 and summoner.cadmus and (not hallucinations or not addiction) and not madness then str = "queue eqbal "..str str = str.."unleash cadmus at "..name..sp if taint >= 60 and not impatience then str = str.."invoke quicken "..name.." instant"..sp end str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness "..name..sp -- str = str.."trueassess "..name..sp elseif mcount >=3 and summoner.dameron and (not hallucinations or not addiction) and not madness then str = "queue eqbal "..str str = str.."unleash dameron at "..name.." cadmus"..sp if taint >= 60 and not impatience then str = str.."invoke quicken "..name.." instant"..sp end str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness "..name..sp -- str = str.."trueassess "..name..sp elseif mcount >= 3 and taint >= 60 and not madness then str = "queue eqbal "..str str = str.."invoke quicken "..name.." instant"..sp str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness "..name..sp -- str = str.."trueassess "..name..sp else str = str..unl..sp str = str.."fling "..card.." "..spell.." at "..name.." "..card2.." "..spell2..sp end
if has(name,"shield") then str = "invoke cleanseaura "..name..sp str = str..unl end
-- send("queue reset all") send(str) end end

Script.name: summoner.control
Script.script:
summoner.control = function(name) local eqbal = false if eq == 1 and bal == 1 then eqbal = true end
local unleash = summoner.unleash local dameron = summoner.dameron local eerion = summoner.eerion local palpatar = summoner.palpatar local hierophant = has( name, "hierophant" ) local shield = has( name, "shield" ) local str = ""
if shield then str = str.."touch hammer "..name..sp elseif hierophant then str = str.."order "..name.." dive "..sp str = str.."order "..name.." kneel "..me..sp str = str.."order "..name.." kneel "..me..sp str = str.."fling hangedman at "..name..sp elseif unleash and eqbal and eerion then str = str.."unleash eerion at "..name..sp str = str.."fling hangedman at "..name..sp elseif unleash and eqbal and dameron then str = str.."unleash dameron at "..name.." eerion"..sp str = str.."fling hangedman at "..name..sp else if palpatar then str = str.."unleash palpatar at "..name..sp end str = str.."fling hierophant heave at "..name..sp end
send(str) end

Script.name: summoner.enlighten
Script.script:
summoner.enlighten = function(name) -- load enemy afflictions _hload(name) -- initiate your final send string, and your intermediate variables local str = "" local tarot,tarot2 = "","" local spell,spell2 = "",""
-- locally initiate your player specific variables local count = dbp.count(name) local taint = has(name,"taint") local unl = summoner.choose_unleash() local spell = summoner.choose_spell(name)
str = str.."light pipes"..sp str = str.."give 180911 to target"..sp str = str.."order target smoke pipe with linseed"..sp -- unleash pattern if summoner.cadmus and (not hallucinations or not addiction) then str = str.."unleash cadmus at target"..sp elseif summoner.dameron and (not hallucinations or not addiction) then str = str.."unleash dameron at target cadmus"..sp elseif summoner.hecate then str = str.."unleash hecate at target"..sp elseif summoner.dameron then str = str.."unleash dameron at target hecate"..sp elseif summoner.lyncantha then str = str.."unleash lyncantha at target"..sp elseif summoner.dameron then str = str.."unleash dameron at target lyncantha"..sp else str = str..unl..sp end -- instant pattern if not impatience then str = str.."invoke quicken target instant"..sp elseif not athma and taint >= 70 then str = str.."invoke combustion target instant intensify"..sp elseif not disloyalty then str = str.."invoke devolve target instant"..sp else str = str.."invoke "..spell.." target instant"..sp end -- madness str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness target"..sp str = str.."queue eqbal invoke enlighten target"..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: summoner.dps
Script.script:
summoner.dps = function(name)
_hload(name) local atk = "" local taint = has(name,"taint")
local spells = { "impatience", "epilepsy", "asthma", "vertigo", "hallucinations", "vertigo", "masochism", } if taint <= 40 then table.insert( spells, 1, "burning nerves" ) end local spell,spell2 = summoner.choose_spell( name, spells ) local str = summoner.choose_unleash() -- , "dmg"
if has(name,"shield") then str = "" atk = atk.."touch hammer "..name..sp elseif madness then if taint >= 80 then atk = atk.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." instant "..sp end atk = atk.."invoke enlighten "..name.." "..sp elseif hp < 150 then atk = atk.."invoke aurashift "..name..sp if summoner.danaeus then str = "" atk = atk.."unleash danaeus at "..name.." "..sp elseif summoner.arctar then str = "" atk = atk.."unleash arctar at "..me.." "..sp elseif summoner.belial then str = "" atk = atk.."unleash belial at "..name.." "..sp elseif summoner.lyncantha then str = "" atk = atk.."unleash lyncantha at "..name.." "..sp end else if summoner.unleash and ( summoner.pyradius or summoner.dameron ) and taint >= 90 then if not has(name,"smoke") then str = "" atk = atk.."muhaha "..name..sp atk = atk.."invoke combustion "..name.." instant intensify "..sp atk = atk.."unleash pyradius at "..name.." "..sp atk = atk.."unleash dameron at "..name.." pyradius "..sp atk = atk.."invoke fever "..name.." instant "..sp atk = atk.."invoke whisperingmadness "..name.." "..sp elseif not asthma then str = "" atk = atk.."muhaha "..name..sp atk = atk.."invoke soulburn "..name.." instant"..sp atk = atk.."unleash pyradius at "..name..sp atk = atk.."unleash dameron at "..name.." pyradius"..sp atk = atk.."invoke flash "..name.." instant"..sp atk = atk.."invoke quicken "..name..sp elseif not incin then atk = atk.."invoke incinerate "..name.." "..sp else atk = atk.."invoke "..spell.." duplicate "..sp end elseif str and string.match( str, "eerion" ) then if taint >= 60 then atk = atk.."invoke disorient "..name.." instant" if taint >= 70 then atk = atk.." intensify" end atk = atk..sp end atk = atk.."fling hangedman at "..name.." "..sp elseif str and string.match( str, "lyncantha" ) and taint >= 60 then atk = atk.."invoke devolve "..name.." instant "..sp atk = atk.."invoke combustion "..name.." "..sp elseif not asthma and taint >= 70 then atk = atk.."invoke hellsight "..name.." instant "..sp atk = atk.."invoke combustion "..name.." intensify "..sp else local plk = "" if taint >= 80 then kpk = "soulwrack" if not epilepsy then kpk = "flash" end if not impatience then kpk = "quicken" end if not masochism then kpk = "soulburn" end atk = atk.."invoke "..kpk.." "..name.." instant strengthen"..sp end if (str and string.match( str, "cadmus" )) or hallucinations then local speller = "" if kpk ~= "soulwrack" then speller = "soulwrack" end if not epilepsy and kpk ~= "flash" then speller = "flash" end if not impatience and kpk ~= "quicken" then speller = "quicken" end if not masochism and kpk ~= "soulburn" then speller = "soulburn" end if speller == "" then speller = "combustion" end atk = atk.."invoke "..speller.." "..name if taint >= 10 and speller == "combustion" then atk = atk.." intensify" end atk = atk..sp else if taint >= 60 then atk = atk.."invoke flash "..name.." instant "..sp end atk = atk.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." "..sp end end end
if str == nil then str = "" end atk = str..sp..atk..sp
atk = atk:gsub("target", name)
send(atk) end

Script.name: summoner.perfidy
Script.script:
summoner.perfidy = function(name) -- load enemy afflictions _hload(name) -- initiate your final send string, and your intermediate variables local str = "" local tarot,tarot2 = "","" local spell,spell2 = "","" local unleash,unleash2 = "","" -- locally initiate your player specific variables local count = dbp.count(name) local taint = has(name,"taint") local hierophant = has(name,"hierophant")
-- my custom attack queue -- unleashes if summoner.cadmus and not hallucinations and not addiction then unleash = "cadmus " elseif summoner.dameron and not hallucinations and not addiction then unleash = "dameron " unleash2 = "cadmus " elseif summoner.hecate then unleash = "hecate " elseif summoner.dameron then unleash = "dameron " unleash2 = "hecate " elseif summoner.lyncantha then unleash = "lyncantha " elseif summoner.palpatar then unleash = "palpatar " elseif summoner.rixil then unleash = "rixil " elseif summoner.golgotha then unleash = "golgotha " elseif summoner.belial then unleash = "belial " elseif summoner.eerion then unleash = "eerion " end
-- tarot if not hierophant then tarot = "hierophant " elseif has(name,"tree") and not paralysis and not numbness then tarot = "emperor " elseif not justice then tarot = "justice " elseif not masochism then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "masochism " elseif not dementia then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "dementia " elseif not stupidity then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "stupidity " elseif not recklessness then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "recklessness " elseif not manaleech then tarot = "fool " elseif not heroism then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "heroism " elseif not confusion then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "confusion " elseif not hypersomnia then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "hypersomnia " elseif not lovers then tarot = "lovers " elseif not paranoia then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "paranoia " else tarot = "sun " end
if has(name,"focus") and not impatience then spell = "quicken " elseif not has(name,"smoke") and tonumber(has(name,"smoke_delay")) >= 3 and not hellsight then spell = "hellsight " elseif not _G["burning nerves"] then spell = "nerveburn " elseif not _G["taint attunement"] and taint >= 80 then spell = "heave " spell2 = "intensify " elseif not has(name,"focus") and not vertigo and not clumsiness and taint >= 70 then spell = "disorient " spell2 = "intensify " elseif not sunallergy then spell = "nervewrack " elseif not asthma and taint >= 20 then spell = "combustion " spell2 = "intensify " elseif not hellsight then spell = "hellsight " elseif not butisol then spell = "dehydrate " elseif not sensitivity and not sunallergy and taint >= 20 then spell = "nervewrack " spell2 = "intensify " elseif not epilepsy then spell = "flash " elseif not hallucinations then spell = "fever " elseif not vertigo then spell = "disorient " elseif not disloyalty then spell = "devolve " elseif not _G["taint_attunement"] and taint >= 20 then spell = "heave " spell2 = "intensify " else spell = "quicken " end
if spell2 == "" and taint >= 60 then -- spell2 = "duplicate" end
if summoner.unleash and unleash ~= "" then str = str.."unleash "..unleash.." at "..name.." "..unleash2..sp elseif summoner.unleash then local unl = summoner.choose_unleash() str = str..unl..sp end
local pipe = "180911" if evalid() and hierophant then elseif e.hp/e.mhp < 0.25 and summoner.unleash and (summoner.cadmus or summoner.dameron) then -- 1 affliction str = str.."light pipes"..separator str = str.."give "..pipe.." to "..name..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp if summoner.cadmus then str = str.."unleash cadmus at "..name..sp elseif summoner.dameron then str = str.."unleash dameron at "..name.." cadmus"..sp end if taint >= 60 then str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." instant "..spell2..sp end str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness "..name..sp str = str.."queue eqbal invoke enlighten "..name..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp elseif e.hp/e.mhp < 0.25 and taint >= 60 then -- 1 affliction str = str.."light pipes"..sp str = str.."give "..linseed[1].." to "..arg..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp if summoner.cadmus then str = str.."unleash cadmus at "..name..sp elseif summoner.dameron then str = str.."unleash dameron at "..name.." cadmus"..sp elseif summoner.hecate then str = str.."unleash hecate at "..name..sp elseif summoner.lyncantha then str = str.."unleash lyncantha at "..name..sp end str = str.."invoke impatience "..name.." instant "..sp str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness "..name..sp str = str.."queue eqbal invoke enlighten "..name..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp elseif e.hp/e.mhp < 0.50 and ( summoner.cadmus or summoner.dameron ) then -- 2 afflictions str = str.."light pipes"..sp str = str.."give "..pipe.." to "..name..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp if summoner.cadmus then str = str.."unleash cadmus at "..name..sp elseif summoner.dameron then str = str.."unleash dameron at "..name.." cadmus"..sp end if taint >= 70 and not asthma then str = str.."invoke combustion "..name.." instant intensify"..sp elseif taint >= 70 and not string.match( str,"cadmus" ) then str = str.."invoke fever "..name.." instant intensify"..sp elseif taint >= 70 and not vertigo and not clumsiness then str = str.."invoke disorient "..name.." instant intensify"..sp elseif taint >= 60 then str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." instant "..spell2..sp end str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness "..name..sp str = str.."queue eqbal invoke enlighten "..name..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp elseif e.hp/e.mhp < 0.75 and taint >= 60 then -- 2 afflictions str = str.."light pipes"..sp str = str.."give "..pipe.." to "..name..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp if summoner.cadmus then str = str.."unleash cadmus at "..name..sp elseif summoner.dameron then str = str.."unleash dameron at "..name.." cadmus"..sp elseif summoner.hecate then str = str.."unleash hecate at "..name..sp elseif summoner.lyncantha then str = str.."unleash lyncantha at "..name..sp end if taint >= 70 and not asthma then str = str.."invoke combustion "..name.." instant intensify"..sp elseif taint >= 70 and not string.match( str,"cadmus" ) then str = str.."invoke fever "..name.." instant intensify"..sp elseif taint >= 70 and not vertigo and not clumsiness then str = str.."invoke disorient "..name.." instant intensify"..sp elseif taint >= 60 then str = str.."invoke "..spell.." "..name.." instant "..spell2..sp end str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness "..name..sp str = str.."queue eqbal invoke enlighten "..name..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp elseif e.hp/e.mhp < 0.75 and taint >= 60 and (summoner.cadmus or summoner.dameron) then -- 3 afflictions str = str.."light pipes"..sp str = str.."give "..pipe.." to "..name..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp str = str.."order "..name.." smoke pipe with linseed"..sp str = str.."unleash cadmus at "..name..sp str = str.."unleash dameron at "..name.." cadmus"..sp str = str.."invoke impatience "..name.." instant"..sp str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness "..name..sp str = str.."queue eqbal invoke enlighten "..name..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp end
str = str.."fling "..tarot..spell.." at target "..tarot2..spell2..sp str = str:gsub("target",target) -- send the final string send(str) end

Script.name: summoner.armageddon
Script.script:
summoner.armageddon = function(name)
_hload(name)
local taint = has(name,"taint") local hierophant = has(name,"hierophant") local count = dbp.count(name) local mcount = dbp.count(name,"madness") local cadmus = summoner.cadmus local dameron = summoner.dameron local hecate = summoner.hecate local pyradius = summoner.pyradius
local time = os.time() local tree_time = has(name,"tree_time") local purge_time = has(name,"purge_time") local smoke_time = has(name,"smoke_time") local smoke_delay = has(name,"smoke_delay") local focus_time = has(name,"focus_time")
if tree_time ~= 0 then tree_time = 15 - (time - tree_time) else tree_time = false end if purge_time ~= 0 then purge_time = 15 - (time - purge_time) else purge_time = false end if smoke_time ~= 0 and smoke_delay == 4 then smoke_time = 4 - (time - smoke_time) else smoke_time = false end if focus_time ~= 0 then focus_time = 4 - (time - focus_time) else focus_time = false end local str = "" local pre = "" pre = pre.."light pipes"..sp pre = pre.."give 180911 to target"..sp pre = pre.."order target smoke pipe with linseed "..sp pre = pre.."beckon artifacts"..sp local insta = "" if taint >= 60 and not impatience then insta = insta.."invoke quicken target instant"..sp elseif taint >= 70 and not asthma then insta = insta.."invoke combustion target instant intensify"..sp elseif taint >= 70 and not sunallergy and not sensitivity then insta = insta.."invoke nervewrack target instant intensify"..sp elseif taint >= 70 and not vertigo and not clumsiness then insta = insta.."invoke disorient target instant intensify"..sp elseif taint >= 70 and not hallucinations and not stupidity then insta = insta.."invoke fever target instant intensify"..sp elseif taint >= 60 and not hellsight and ( not has(name,"tree") or has(name,"numbness") or has(name,"paralysis") ) then insta = insta.."invoke hellsight target instant"..sp elseif taint >= 50 and not hellsight and ( not has(name,"tree") or has(name,"numbness") or has(name,"paralysis") ) and asthma then insta = insta.."invoke hellsight target duplicate"..sp end
if madness then str = str.."say Ha, Enlighten!"..sp elseif focus_time and focus_time > 3 and smoke_time and smoke_time > 1 and (cadmus or dameron) and (not addiction or not hallucinations) and mcount >= 2 then str = str..pre..sp str = str.."unleash cadmus at target"..sp str = str.."unleash dameron at target cadmus"..sp str = str..insta..sp str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness target"..sp str = str.."queue eqbal invoke enlighten target"..sp elseif focus_time and focus_time > 3 and smoke_time and smoke_time > 1 and (hecate or dameron) and mcount >= 3 then str = str..pre..sp str = str.."unleash hecate at target"..sp str = str.."unleash dameron at target hecate"..sp str = str..insta..sp str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness target"..sp str = str.."queue eqbal invoke enlighten target"..sp elseif impatience and smoke_time and smoke_time > 1 and (cadmus or dameron) and (not addiction or not hallucinations) and mcount >= 2 then str = str..pre..sp str = str.."unleash cadmus at target"..sp str = str.."unleash dameron at target cadmus"..sp str = str..insta..sp str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness target"..sp str = str.."queue eqbal invoke enlighten target"..sp elseif focus_time and focus_time > 3 and asthma and (cadmus or dameron) and (not addiction or not hallucinations) and mcount >= 2 then str = str..pre..sp str = str.."unleash cadmus at target"..sp str = str.."unleash dameron at target cadmus"..sp str = str..insta..sp str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness target"..sp str = str.."queue eqbal invoke enlighten target"..sp elseif impatience and asthma and (cadmus or dameron) and (not addiction or not hallucinations) and mcount >= 2 then str = str..pre..sp str = str.."unleash cadmus at target"..sp str = str.."unleash dameron at target cadmus"..sp str = str..insta..sp str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness target"..sp str = str.."queue eqbal invoke enlighten target"..sp elseif impatience and smoke_time and smoke_time > 1 and (hecate or dameron) and mcount >= 3 then str = str..pre..sp str = str.."unleash hecate at target"..sp str = str.."unleash dameron at target hecate"..sp str = str..insta..sp str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness target"..sp str = str.."queue eqbal invoke enlighten target"..sp elseif focus_time and focus_time > 3 and asthma and (hecate or dameron) and mcount >= 3 then str = str..pre..sp str = str.."unleash hecate at target"..sp str = str.."unleash dameron at target hecate"..sp str = str..insta..sp str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness target"..sp str = str.."queue eqbal invoke enlighten target"..sp elseif impatience and asthma and (hecate or dameron) and mcount >= 3 then str = str..pre..sp str = str.."unleash hecate at target"..sp str = str.."unleash dameron at target hecate"..sp str = str..insta..sp str = str.."invoke whisperingmadness target"..sp str = str.."queue eqbal invoke enlighten target"..sp
else if not hierophant and taint == 0 then str = str.."fling hierophant nerveburn at target"..sp elseif name ~= me and (pyradius or dameron) and taint < 40 and taint >= 10 and not has(name,"taint attunement") then str = str.."invoke heave target intensify"..sp str = str.."unleash pyradius at target"..sp str = str.."unleash dameron at target pyradius"..sp elseif insta ~= "" then str = str..insta..sp str = str..summoner.choose_unleash()..sp if taint == 100 and not insta:gmatch("intensify") and not has(name,"disloyalty") then str = str.."invoke devolve target hasten"..sp elseif insta:gmatch("intensify") and (taint - 70) >= 10 then --and count >= 3 if not asthma and not insta:gmatch("combustion") then str = str.."invoke combustion target intensify"..sp elseif not clumsiness and not insta:gmatch("disorient") then -- not vertigo and str = str.."invoke disorient target intensify"..sp elseif not stupidity and not hallucinations and not insta:gmatch("fever") then str = str.."invoke fever target intensify"..sp elseif not sunallergy and (not sensitivity or not undeaf) and not insta:gmatch("nervewrack") then str = str.."invoke nervewrack target intensify"..sp end else local spell,spell2 = "","" local tarot,tarot2 = "","" if not impatience and not insta:gmatch("quicken") then spell = "quicken " elseif not sensitivity and taint >= 70 and not insta:gmatch("nervewrack") then spell = "nervewrack " spell2 = "intensify " elseif not clumsiness and taint >= 70 and not insta:gmatch("disorient") then spell = "disorient " spell2 = "intensify " elseif not has(name,"purge") and taint >= 70 and not asthma and not insta:gmatch("combustion") then spell = "combustion " spell2 = "intensify " elseif not disloyalty and asthma and not insta:gmatch("devolve") then spell = "devolve " elseif not butisol and not insta:gmatch("dehydrate") then spell = "dehydrate " elseif not sunallergy and not insta:gmatch("nervewrack") then spell = "nervewrack " elseif not epilepsy and not insta:gmatch("flash") then spell = "flash " elseif not vertigo and not insta:gmatch("disorient")then spell = "disorient " elseif not _G["burning nerves"] and not insta:gmatch("nerveburn") then spell = "nerveburn " elseif not _G["taint attunement"] and not insta:gmatch("heave") then spell = "heave " spell2 = "intensify " elseif not hallucinations and not insta:gmatch("fever") then spell = "fever " else spell = "hellsight " end
if not numbness and not paralysis then tarot = "emperor " elseif not masochism then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "masochism " elseif not manaleech and not summoner.mlg then tarot = "fool " elseif not confusion then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "confusion " elseif not lovers and impatience then tarot = "lovers " elseif not stupidity then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "stupidity " elseif not justice then tarot = "justice " elseif not heroism then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "heroism " elseif not dementia then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "dementia " elseif not hypersomnia then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "hypersomnia " elseif not paranoia then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "paranoia " else tarot = "moon " end
str = str.."fling "..tarot..spell.." at target "..tarot2..spell2..sp end else str = str..summoner.choose_unleash()..sp local spell,spell2 = "","" local tarot,tarot2 = "","" if not impatience then spell = "quicken " elseif not sensitivity and taint >= 10 then spell = "nervewrack " spell2 = "intensify " elseif not clumsiness and taint >= 10 then spell = "disorient " spell2 = "intensify " elseif not has(name,"purge") and taint >= 10 and not asthma then spell = "combustion " spell2 = "intensify " elseif not disloyalty and asthma then spell = "devolve " elseif not butisol then spell = "dehydrate " elseif not sunallergy then spell = "nervewrack " elseif not epilepsy then spell = "flash " elseif not vertigo then spell = "disorient " elseif not _G["burning nerves"] then spell = "nerveburn " elseif not _G["taint attunement"] then spell = "heave " spell2 = "intensify " elseif not hallucinations then spell = "fever " else spell = "hellsight " end
if not numbness and not paralysis then tarot = "emperor " elseif not masochism then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "masochism " elseif not stupidity then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "stupidity " elseif not justice then tarot = "justice " elseif not confusion then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "confusion " elseif not manaleech and not summoner.mlg and asthma then tarot = "fool " elseif not lovers and impatience then tarot = "lovers " elseif not heroism then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "heroism " elseif not dementia then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "dementia " elseif not hypersomnia then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "hypersomnia " elseif not paranoia then tarot = "moon " tarot2 = "paranoia " else tarot = "moon " end
str = str.."fling "..tarot..spell.." at target "..tarot2..spell2..sp end end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: summoner.wise
Script.script:
summoner.wise = function(name) local str = ""
_hload(name)
local t = { "sunallergy", "burning nerves", -- "taint attunement", "impatience", "asthma", "clumsiness", "hellsight", "epilepsy", }
local spell,spell2 = summoner.choose_spell(name,t) local taint = tonumber(has(name,"taint")) local count = dbp.count(name) local mcount = dbp.count(name,"madness")
local unleasher = summoner.choose_unleash() -- , "dmg" local eq = eq or 0 local bal = bal or 0 local eqbal = false if eq == 1 and bal == 1 then eqbal = true end
local e_valid = evalid()
local insta = "" if taint >= 60 and not impatience then insta = insta.."invoke quicken target instant"..sp elseif taint >= 70 and not asthma then insta = insta.."invoke combustion target instant intensify"..sp elseif taint >= 70 and not sunallergy and not sensitivity then insta = insta.."invoke nervewrack target instant intensify"..sp elseif taint >= 70 and not vertigo and not clumsiness then insta = insta.."invoke disorient target instant intensify"..sp elseif taint >= 70 and not hallucinations and not stupidity then insta = insta.."invoke fever target instant intensify"..sp elseif taint >= 60 and not hellsight and ( not has(name,"tree") or has(name,"numbness") or has(name,"paralysis") ) then insta = insta.."invoke hellsight target instant"..sp elseif taint >= 50 and not hellsight and ( not has(name,"tree") or has(name,"numbness") or has(name,"paralysis") ) and asthma then insta = insta.."invoke hellsight target duplicate"..sp end
if has(name,"shield") then if e_valid and e.hp <= 0.6*e.mhp then str = str.."invoke cleanseaura "..name..sp str = str..unleasher unleasher = "" else str = str.."touch hammer "..name..sp str = str..unleasher unleasher = "" end else if taint == 0 and summoner.unleash and (summoner.pyradius or summoner.dameron) then str = str.."invoke hellsight target"..sp elseif name ~= me and taint >= 10 and count <= 1 and summoner.unleash and (summoner.pyradius or summoner.dameron) then str = str.."invoke heave target intensify"..sp str = str.."unleash pyradius at target"..sp str = str.."unleash dameron at target pyradius"..sp elseif insta ~= "" then str = str..insta..sp str = str..summoner.choose_unleash()..sp str = str.."invoke "..spell.." target "..spell2..sp else local spell3 = "" if taint >= 40 then spell3 = "hasten" end str = str..summoner.choose_unleash()..sp str = str.."invoke "..spell.." target "..spell2..spell3..sp
end
end
if unleasher then str = str..unleasher..sp end
local ta = ta or false if ta then str = str.."trueassess "..name..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name)
send(str) end

ScriptGroup.name: wytch
ScriptGroup.script:
wytch = wytch or {}
-- inhibit = dizziness + confusion => lethargy if both

Script.name: [d]
Script.script:
wytch.curse_spellbook = { paralysis = "paralyse", clumsiness = "clumsy", recklessness = "reckless", stupidity = "stupid", nausea = "vomiting", dizziness = "dizzy", cyanide = "plague", } wytch.dust_spellbook = { paralysis = "paralyse", slickness = "slick", weariness = "drain", dizziness = "disorient", recklessness = "reckless", confusion = "inhibit", lethargy = "inhibit", disloyalty = "disfigure", } wytch.greater = { "Belial", "Cadmus", "Hecate", "Istria", "Marduk", } wytch.lesser = { "Arctar", "Buul", "Danaeus", "Pyradius", "Scrag", }
wytch.defences = wytch.defences or {} wytch.defences.ghost = wytch.defences.ghost or false wytch.defences.hide = wytch.defences.hide or false
wytch.mannaz = wytch.mannaz or false
--Ahkan cursed you. --Your curseward has failed! --def- curseward. --Ahkan's attack is repelled by your prismatic barrier.
--Ahkan rebounding down. --Ahkan cursed you. --aff+ asthma --The Mark of Cadmus on your body flares briefly. --Ahkan throws some blue bone dust at you, causing you to feel weak. --aff+ weariness --Ahkan's attack is repelled by your prismatic barrier.
--Ahkan cursed you. --You feel a terrible thirst for elixirs grow within you. --aff+ addiction --The Mark of Cadmus on your body flares briefly. --Ahkan mixes some yellow and red bone dust and throws it lightly at you. As the dust reaches you, your movements slow down and --your mind feels detached and slow. --aff+ confusion --aff+ lethargy --Ahkan's attack is repelled by your prismatic barrier.
--Ahkan rebounding down. --Ahkan cursed you. --None may stand in your way! You are invincible! --aff+ recklessness --The Mark of Cadmus on your body flares briefly. --Ahkan flings some blue bone dust at you, disorienting you. --aff+ dizziness

Script.name: [d] lists
Script.script:
wytch.clist = { "impatience", -- m "asthma", "anorexia", -- m + slick please "numbness", "peace", -- m "epilepsy", -- m "clumsiness", "healthleech", "sensitivity", "masochism", -- m "vertigo", -- m "claustrophobia", -- m "agoraphobia", -- m "dizziness", -- m "recklessness", -- m "addiction", "nausea", "manaleech", "dementia", -- m "paranoia", -- m "cyanide", }
wytch.dlist = { -- "confound body", "numbness", "recklessness", "confusion", "lethargy", "dizziness", "weariness", }

Script.name: reset
Script.script: wytch.reset = function() wytch.mannaz = false end

Script.name: prompt
Script.script:
wytch.prompt = function(len) local str,neutral = "","<dim_grey>" local a,m = "<grey>","<grey>" local n = 50 n = n - len
str = string.lpad(str,n," ")
if player(target) then local count = dbp.count(target) local mcount = dbp.count(target,"mental")
str = str..neutral.."[A: "..a..count..neutral.."][M: "..m..mcount..neutral.."] "
end
if class == "Wytch" then cecho(str) end end

Script.name: ui_refresh
Script.script:
wytch.ui_refresh = function() clearWindow("wytch_ui") local str = "" local time = os.time() local neutral = "<grey>"
local color = "<goldenrod>" if player(target) then color = "<medium_aquamarine>" end if player(target) and has(target,"curseward") then color = "<red>" else color = "<green>" end
str = str.."T: "..color..target..neutral.." "
-- first part ------------- if player(target) then local random_affs = has(target,"random_affs") local random_affs_c = neutral if random_affs > 1 then random_affs_c = "<red>" end str = str..neutral.."(+"..random_affs_c..random_affs..neutral..") " end
-- second part ------------- str = str.."\n"
if player(target) then local greater = has(target,"greater") local lesser = has(target,"lesser")
str = str.."[ G: " if has(target,"ignite") then str = str.."<red>" end str = str..""..string.rpad(string.title(greater),7," ") str = str..neutral.." ] "
str = str.."[ L: " str = str..""..string.rpad(string.title(lesser),7," ") str = str..neutral.." ] "
local nairat = has(target,"nairat") local nairat_time = has(target,"nairat_time") local nairat_c = "<dim_grey>" local nairat_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if nairat then nairat_c = "<green>" nairat_time_c = "<green> " end if nairat_time ~= 0 then nairat_time = 22 - (time - nairat_time) if nairat_time < 17 then nairat_c = "<red>" nairat_time_c = "<red> " end end nairat_time = string.lpad(tostring(nairat_time),2," ")
str = str.."[: "..nairat_c.."Nairat"..nairat_time_c..nairat_time..neutral.."] "
local loshre = has(target,"loshre") local loshre_time = has(target,"loshre_time") local loshre_c = "<dim_grey>" local loshre_time_c = "<dim_grey> "
if loshre then loshre_c = "<green>" loshre_time_c = "<green> " end if loshre_time ~= 0 then loshre_time = 22 - (time - loshre_time) if loshre_time < 17 then loshre_c = "<red>" loshre_time_c = "<red> " end end loshre_time = string.lpad(tostring(loshre_time),2," ")
str = str.."[: "..loshre_c.."Loshre"..loshre_time_c..loshre_time..neutral.."] "
end
local parry_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.parry ~= "nothing" then parry_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."P: "..parry_c..string.title(limb.parry)..neutral
-- third part ------------- str = str.."\n" local gho, hid = "<red>","<red>"
if wytch.defences.ghost then gho = "<medium_sea_green>" end if wytch.defences.hide then hid = "<medium_sea_green>" end
str = str.."["..hid.."HID"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..gho.."GHO"..neutral.."] "
local lse = "<red>" if df_ and df_.landsense then lse = "<green>" end str = str.."["..lse.."LSE"..neutral.."] "
local limb_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.target ~= "nothing" then limb_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."T: "..limb_c..string.title(limb.target)
str = str.." [ " for i=1,#wytch.hlist do local curse = wytch.hlist[i][2] local htime = wytch.hlist[i][1] str = str.."("..i.."): ".. curse..", "
if htime ~= 0 then htime = time - htime str = str..htime end end
str = str.."] "
cecho("wytch_ui",str) end

Script.name: timer
Script.script:
wytch.timer = function() if class == "Wytch" then
-- operate only on 'target' otherwise the overhead is too big local time = os.time()
if player(target) then local confound_t = has(target,"confound_time")
if confound_t ~= 0 then confound_t = time - confound_t if confound_t > 20 then cecho("\n<white>Resetting Confound Timer") set(target,"confound",false) set(target,"confound_time",0) end end
local loshre_time = has(target,"loshre_time")
if loshre_time ~= 0 then loshre_time = time - loshre_time if loshre_time > 22 then cecho("\n<white>Resetting Loshre Timer") set(target,"loshre",false) set(target,"loshre_time",0) end end
local nairat_time = has(target,"nairat_time")
if nairat_time ~= 0 then nairat_time = time - nairat_time if nairat_time > 22 then cecho("\n<white>Resetting Nairat Timer") set(target,"nairat",false) set(target,"nairat_time",0) end end
local n = {} for i=1,#wytch.hlist do local htime = wytch.hlist[i][1] local curse = wytch.hlist[i][2] if htime ~= 0 then htime = time - htime if htime > 4 then table.insert( n, i ) end end end
for j=#n, 1, -1 do table.remove( wytch.hlist, j ) end
end
wytch.ui_refresh() end end

Script.name: sleep
Script.script:
wytch.sleep = function(name) local str = ""
if player(name) then local greater = has(name,"greater") local lesser = has(name,"lesser")
if greater == "Cadmus" then if has(name,"curseward") and lesser ~= "Arctar" then str = str.."curse target breach numbness"..sp else str = str.."curse target sleep sleep"..sp end else if has(name,"curseward") and lesser ~= "Arctar" then str = str.."curse target breach numbness"..sp else str = str.."curse target sleep sleep"..sp end end else str = str.."curse target breach numbness"..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: choose_toxin
Script.script:
wytch.choose_toxin = function(name,clist,dlist) if not player(name) and type(name) == "table" then if clist then dlist = clist end clist = name name = me end
_hload(name)
local curse,dust = "","" local clist = clist or ecopy(wytch.clist) local dlist = dlist or ecopy(wytch.dlist)
if _G.paralysis then table.remove(clist,table.index_of(clist,"numbness")) table.remove(dlist,table.index_of(dlist,"numbness")) end
for i=1, #clist do if not _G[clist[i]] then curse = clist[i] break end end
if has(name,"curseward") and has(name,"lesser") ~= "Arctar" then curse = "breach" end
for i=1, #dlist do if dlist[i] ~= curse and not _G[dlist[i]] then dust = dlist[i] break end end
curse = lookup(curse,wytch.curse_spellbook) dust = lookup(dust,wytch.dust_spellbook)
return curse,dust end

Script.name: wytch.curse
Script.script:
wytch.curse = function(name,clist,dlist) local str = ""
_hload(name)
local curse,dust = wytch.choose_toxin(name) local count = dbp.count(name)
local greater = has(name,"greater") local lesser = has(name,"lesser") local confound = has(name,"confound")
local method = "curse" local str = "" local curse = "" local dust = "" local flare = ""
if has(name,"shield") then str = str.."touch hammer target"..sp elseif has(name,"curseward") and lesser ~= "Arctar" then curse = "breach" if not confound and count < 3 then dust = "confound body" elseif not numbness then dust = "numbness" elseif not slickness then dust = "slick" elseif not dizziness and not confusion then dust = "inhibit" elseif not recklessness then dust = "reckless" elseif not dizziness then dust = "disorient" elseif not weariness then dust = "drain" else dust = "assess" end elseif anorexia and slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and impatience and asthma and not hemotoxin then str = str.."queue eqbal target nothing"..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp str = str.."quickdraw "..axe..sp str = str.."wipe "..axe..sp str = str.."envenom "..axe.." with hemotoxin "..sp str = str.."throw "..axe.." at target"..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp elseif anorexia and slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and impatience and hemotoxin and not asthma then str = str.."swiftcurse target asthma inhibit"..sp elseif anorexia and slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and asthma and hemotoxin and not impatience then str = str.."swiftcurse target stupid
