impatience"..sp -- str = str.."curse target stupid impatience"..sp elseif anorexia and slickness and impatience and asthma and hemotoxin and not numbness and not paralysis then str = str.."swiftcurse target numbness inhibit"..sp elseif anorexia and (numbness or paralysis) and impatience and asthma and hemotoxin and not slickness then str = str.."curse target stupid slick"..sp elseif slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and impatience and asthma and hemotoxin and not anorexia then str = str.."swiftcurse target anorexia inhibit"..sp elseif hemotoxin and anorexia and not slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and impatience and not asthma then str = str.."curse target asthma slick"..sp elseif hemotoxin and not anorexia and not slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and impatience and asthma then str = str.."curse target anorexia slick"..sp elseif hemotoxin and anorexia and not slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and not impatience and asthma then str = str.."curse target impatience slick"..sp elseif hemotoxin and anorexia and not slickness and not numbness and not paralysis and impatience and asthma then str = str.."curse target numbness slick"..sp elseif hemotoxin and anorexia and slickness and not numbness and not paralysis and impatience and not asthma then str = str.."curse target asthma numbness"..sp elseif hemotoxin and not anorexia and slickness and not numbness and not paralysis and impatience and asthma then str = str.."curse target anorexia numbness"..sp elseif hemotoxin and anorexia and slickness and not numbness and not paralysis and not impatience and asthma then str = str.."curse target impatience numbness"..sp elseif not hemotoxin and anorexia and not slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and impatience and not asthma then str = str.."swiftcurse target asthma slick"..sp elseif not hemotoxin and not anorexia and not slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and impatience and asthma then str = str.."swiftcurse target anorexia slick"..sp elseif not hemotoxin and anorexia and not slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and not impatience and asthma then str = str.."swiftcurse target impatience slick"..sp elseif not hemotoxin and anorexia and not slickness and not numbness and not paralysis and impatience and asthma then str = str.."curse target numbness slick"..sp elseif not hemotoxin and anorexia and slickness and not numbness and not paralysis and impatience and not asthma then str = str.."curse target asthma numbness"..sp elseif not hemotoxin and not anorexia and slickness and not numbness and not paralysis and impatience and asthma then str = str.."curse target anorexia numbness"..sp elseif not hemotoxin and anorexia and slickness and not numbness and not paralysis and not impatience and asthma then str = str.."curse target impatience numbness"..sp elseif not impatience then curse = "impatience" elseif not asthma then method = "swiftcurse" curse = "asthma" elseif not numbness and not paralysis then curse = "numbness" elseif not anorexia then method = "swiftcurse" curse = "anorexia" else curse = "steal herb" end
if curse == "anorexia" and not has(name,"nairat") and not has(name,"loshre") then flare = "loshre" elseif curse == "asthma" and not has(name,"nairat") and not has(name,"loshre") then flare = "nairat" end
if dust == "" then if flare ~= "" and ( not dizziness or not confusion ) then dust = "inhibit" elseif not confound and count <= 3 then dust = "confound body" elseif curse ~= "numbness" and not numbness and not paralysis then dust = "numbness" elseif curse == "anorexia" and not slickness then dust = "slick" elseif curse == "asthma" and not weariness then dust = "drain" elseif curse == "impatience" and not dizziness then dust = "disorient" elseif curse == "impatience" and not recklessness then dust = "reckless" elseif not dizziness and not confusion then dust = "inhibit" elseif not recklessness then dust = "reckless" elseif not dizziness then dust = "disorient" elseif not weariness then dust = "drain" elseif not slickness then dust = "slick" else dust = "assess" end end
if str == "" then str = str..method.." target "..curse.." "..dust..sp end if flare ~= "" then str = "queue eqbal "..str str = str.."flare "..flare.." at "..name.." plant "..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: wytch.damage
Script.script:
wytch.damage = function(name) local greater = has(name,"greater") local lesser = has(name,"lesser") local curseward = has(name,"curseward")
local sowulu = has(target,"sowulu") local pithakhan = has(target,"pithakhan") local hugalaz = has(target,"hugalaz") local nauthiz = has(target,"nauthiz")
local str = ""
if has(name,"shield") then str = str.."queue eqbal touch hammer target"..sp if not hugalaz then str = str.."flare hugalaz at target"..sp end elseif curseward and lesser ~= "Arctar" then str = str.."queue eqbal swiftcurse target breach choke"..sp else if not sowulu then str = str.."quickdraw 105494 56320"..sp str = str.."curse target sensitivity choke"..sp str = str.."flare sowulu at target"..sp str = str.."trueassess target"..sp set(name,"sowulu",true) tempTimer(5.0, function() set(name,"sowulu",false) end) elseif not pithakhan then str = str.."quickdraw 105494 56320"..sp str = str.."curse target addiction choke"..sp str = str.."flare pithakhan at target"..sp str = str.."trueassess target"..sp set(name,"pithakhan",true) tempTimer(20.0, function() set(name,"sowulu",false) end) elseif not hugalaz then str = str.."quickdraw 105494 56320"..sp str = str.."curse target reckless choke"..sp str = str.."flare hugalaz at target"..sp str = str.."trueassess target"..sp set(name,"hugalaz",true) tempTimer(20.0, function() set(name,"hugalaz",false) end) elseif not nauthiz then str = str.."quickdraw 105494 56320"..sp str = str.."curse target steal choke"..sp str = str.."flare nauthiz at target"..sp str = str.."trueassess target"..sp set(name,"nauthiz",true) tempTimer(20.0, function() set(name,"nauthiz",false) end) else str = str.."dustthrow inhibit choke target"..sp str = str.."trueassess target"..sp end end str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: wytch.lock
Script.script:
wytch.lock = function(name) _hload(name)
local greater = has(name,"greater") local lesser = has(name,"lesser") local curseward = has(name,"curseward") local shield = has(name,"shield") local obstruct = has(name,"obstruct") local confound = has(name,"confound")
local sowulu = has(target,"sowulu") local pithakhan = has(target,"pithakhan") local hugalaz = has(target,"hugalaz") local nauthiz = has(target,"nauthiz")
local loshre = has(target,"loshre") local nairat = has(target,"nairat") local kena = has(target,"kena")
local mannaz = wytch.mannaz
local str,curse,dust,flare,method = "","","","","curse"
if shield then send("touch hammer "..name) else if curseward and wytch.mannaz == false and lesser ~= "Arctar" then if not obstruct then curse = "breach" dust = "obstruct" elseif not confound then curse = "breach" dust = "confound body" elseif not numbness then curse = "breach" dust = "numbness" method = "blight" elseif not recklessness then curse = "breach" dust = "reckless" method = "blight" elseif not dizziness then curse = "breach" dust = "disorient" method = "blight" else curse = "breach" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" end if not mannaz then flare = "mannaz" end elseif curseward and lesser ~= "Arctar" then if not obstruct then curse = "breach" dust = "obstruct" elseif not confound then curse = "breach" dust = "confound body" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not numbness then curse = "breach" dust = "numbness" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not recklessness then curse = "breach" dust = "reckless" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not dizziness then curse = "breach" dust = "disorient" method = "swiftcurse" else curse = "breach" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" end elseif not asthma and (not mannaz or not loshre) then if not confound then curse = "asthma" dust = "confound body" method = "blight" elseif not numbness then curse = "asthma" dust = "numbness" method = "blight" elseif not confusion then curse = "asthma" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" elseif not recklessness then curse = "asthma" dust = "reckless" method = "blight" elseif not dizziness then curse = "asthma" dust = "disorient" method = "blight" else curse = "asthma" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" end if not mannaz and ( not nairat or not kena ) then flare = "mannaz" elseif not loshre and not nairat then flare = "loshre" end elseif not asthma then if not confound then curse = "asthma" dust = "confound body" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not numbness then curse = "asthma" dust = "numbness" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not confusion then curse = "asthma" dust = "inhibit" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not recklessness then curse = "asthma" dust = "reckless" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not dizziness then curse = "asthma" dust = "disorient" method = "swiftcurse" else curse = "asthma" dust = "inhibit" method = "swiftcurse" end elseif not impatience and not mannaz then if not confound then curse = "impatience" dust = "confound body" method = "blight" elseif not numbness then curse = "impatience" dust = "numbness" method = "blight" elseif not confusion then curse = "impatience" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" elseif not recklessness then curse = "impatience" dust = "reckless" method = "blight" elseif not dizziness then curse = "impatience" dust = "disorient" method = "blight" else curse = "impatience" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" end if not mannaz and ( not nairat or not kena ) then flare = "mannaz" end elseif not impatience then if not confound then curse = "impatience" dust = "confound body" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not numbness then curse = "impatience" dust = "numbness" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not confusion then curse = "impatience" dust = "inhibit" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not recklessness then curse = "impatience" dust = "reckless" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not dizziness then curse = "impatience" dust = "disorient" method = "swiftcurse" else curse = "impatience" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" end elseif not anorexia then if not slickness then curse = "anorexia" dust = "slick" elseif not numbness then curse = "anorexia" dust = "numbness" method = "swiftcurse" elseif slickness then curse = "anorexia" dust = "assess" end if not loshre and not nairat then flare = "loshre" end elseif not hemotoxin then str = str.."queue eqbal target nothing"..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp str = str.."quickdraw "..axe..sp str = str.."wipe "..axe..sp str = str.."envenom "..axe.." with hemotoxin "..sp str = str.."throw "..axe.." at target"..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp if not mannaz then flare = "mannaz" elseif not loshre and not nairat then flare = "loshre" end elseif not peace and has(name,"peace_time") == 0 then if not confound then curse = "peace" dust = "confound body" method = "blight" elseif not numbness then curse = "peace" dust = "numbness" method = "blight" elseif not confusion then curse = "peace" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" elseif not recklessness then curse = "peace" dust = "reckless" method = "blight" elseif not dizziness then curse = "peace" dust = "disorient" method = "blight" else curse = "peace" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" end if not mannaz and ( not nairat or not kena ) then flare = "mannaz" elseif not loshre and not nairat then flare = "loshre" end elseif not stupidity then if not confound then curse = "stupid" dust = "confound body" method = "curse" elseif not numbness then curse = "stupid" dust = "numbness" method = "curse" elseif not confusion then curse = "stupid" dust = "slick" method = "curse" else curse = "stupid" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" end if not mannaz and ( not nairat or not kena ) then flare = "mannaz" elseif not loshre and not nairat then flare = "loshre" end elseif not epilepsy then if not confound then curse = "epilepsy" dust = "confound body" method = "curse" elseif not numbness then curse = "epilepsy" dust = "numbness" method = "curse" elseif not confusion then curse = "epilepsy" dust = "slick" method = "curse" else curse = "epilepsy" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" end if not mannaz then flare = "mannaz" elseif not kena and not nairat then flare = "nairat" end elseif not peace and has(name,"peace_time") == 0 then if not confound then curse = "peace" dust = "confound body" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not numbness then curse = "peace" dust = "numbness" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not confusion then curse = "peace" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" elseif not recklessness then curse = "peace" dust = "reckless" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not dizziness then curse = "peace" dust = "disorient" method = "swiftcurse" else curse = "peace" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" end elseif not addiction and (not mannaz or not nairat) then if not confound then curse = "addiction" dust = "confound body" method = "blight" elseif not numbness then curse = "addiction" dust = "numbness" method = "blight" elseif not confusion then curse = "addiction" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" elseif not recklessness then curse = "addiction" dust = "reckless" method = "blight" elseif not dizziness then curse = "addiction" dust = "disorient" method = "blight" else curse = "addiction" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" end if not mannaz and ( not nairat or not kena ) then flare = "mannaz" end elseif not addiction then if not confound then curse = "addiction" dust = "confound body" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not numbness then curse = "addiction" dust = "numbness" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not recklessness then curse = "addiction" dust = "reckless" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not dizziness then curse = "addiction" dust = "disorient" method = "swiftcurse" else curse = "addiction" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" end elseif not healthleech and (not mannaz or not nairat) then if not confound then curse = "healthleech" dust = "confound body" method = "blight" elseif not numbness then curse = "healthleech" dust = "numbness" method = "blight" elseif not recklessness then curse = "healthleech" dust = "reckless" method = "blight" elseif not dizziness then curse = "healthleech" dust = "disorient" method = "blight" else curse = "healthleech" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" end if not mannaz and ( not nairat or not kena ) then flare = "mannaz" end elseif not healthleech then if not confound then curse = "healthleech" dust = "confound body" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not numbness then curse = "healthleech" dust = "numbness" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not recklessness then curse = "healthleech" dust = "reckless" method = "swiftcurse" elseif not dizziness then curse = "healthleech" dust = "disorient" method = "swiftcurse" else curse = "healthleech" dust = "inhibit" method = "blight" end else wytch.damage(name) end
if str == "" then str = str..method.." target "..curse.." "..dust..sp end if flare ~= "" then str = str.."flare "..flare.." at target " if flare == "nairat" or flare == "loshre" then str = str.."plant" end str = str..sp end str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end end

Script.name: wytch.within
Script.script:
wytch.within = function(aff,step) local value = false local t = ecopy(wytch.hlist)
if step > #t then step = #t end
for i=1,step do local n = t[i] local give = t[i][2]
if aff == give then value = true break end end
return value end
wytch.in_time = function(aff,time) local now = os.time() local value = false local t = ecopy(wytch.hlist)
for i=1,#t do local saved_time = t[i][1] local saved_aff = t[i][2]
if saved_time ~= 0 then saved_time = 4 - (now - saved_time) if saved_time > time then value = true end end end return value end

Script.name: [d] wytch.blight
[d] wytch.hecate
[d] wytch.lock_blight
wytch.blight
Script.script:
wytch.blight = function(name) _hload(name)
local greater = has(name,"greater") local lesser = has(name,"lesser") local curseward = has(name,"curseward") local shield = has(name,"shield") local count = dbp.count(name)
local str,curse,dust,flare,method = "","","","","blight"
local alist = alist or ecopy(wytch.tier_oneBlight) local blist = blist or ecopy(wytch.tier_twoBlight) local clist = clist or ecopy(wytch.tier_threeBlight) local dlist = dlist or ecopy(wytch.tier_fourBlight)
if _G.paralysis then table.remove(alist,table.index_of(alist,"numbness")) table.remove(blist,table.index_of(blist,"numbness")) table.remove(clist,table.index_of(clist,"numbness")) table.remove(dlist,table.index_of(dlist,"numbness")) end
for i=1, #alist do if not _G[alist[i]] and not wytch.within(alist[i],2) then -- not table.contains(wytch.hlist,alist[i]) then curse = alist[i] break end if i == #alist then for i=1, #clist do if not _G[clist[i]] and not wytch.within(clist[i],5) then-- not table.contains(wytch.hlist,clist[i]) then curse = clist[i] break end end end end
if has(name,"curseward") and has(name,"lesser") ~= "Arctar" then curse = "breach" end
for i=1, #blist do if blist[i] ~= curse and not _G[blist[i]] and not wytch.within(blist[i],3) then--not table.contains(wytch.hlist,blist[i]) then dust = blist[i] break end if i == #blist then for i=1, #dlist do if not _G[dlist[i]] and not wytch.within(dlist[i],7) then--not table.contains(wytch.hlist,dlist[i]) then dust = dlist[i] break end end end end
-- Before lookup the syntax, check for reporting: local inc = {"impatience","anorexia","asthma"} if config and config.share_full then str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..curse..sp elseif config and config.share and table.contains(inc,curse) then str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..curse..sp end
curse = lookup(curse,wytch.curse_spellbook) dust = lookup(dust,wytch.curse_spellbook)
if count >= 7 then method = "curse" end
-- construct str = "queue eqbal "..method.." target "..curse.." "..dust..sp..str
if anorexia and slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and impatience and asthma and not hemotoxin then local axen = "axe" if not axe then axe = axen end str = "queue eqbal tanget nothing"..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp str = str.."quickdraw "..axe..sp str = str.."wipe "..axe..sp str = str.."envenom "..axe.." with hemotoxin "..sp str = str.."throw "..axe.." at target"..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp elseif (anorexia or table.contains(wytch.hlist,"anorexia")) and not slickness and count >= 3 and impatience and asthma then str = "queue eqbal dustthrow inhibit slick target"..sp str = "flare loshre at target plant"..sp elseif anorexia and slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and impatience and hemotoxin and not asthma then --str = "queue eqbal swiftcurse target asthma asthma"..sp elseif asthma and (numbness or paralysis) and not anorexia then --str = "queue eqbal curse target anorexia anorexia"..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) str = str:gsub("tanget","target") send(str) end

Script.name: wytch.hecate
Script.script:
wytch.hecate = function(name) _hload(name)
local greater = has(name,"greater") local lesser = has(name,"lesser") local curseward = has(name,"curseward") local shield = has(name,"shield") local count = dbp.count(name)
local str,curse,dust,flare,method = "","","","","swiftcurse"
local alist = alist or ecopy(wytch.tier_one) local blist = blist or ecopy(wytch.tier_two) local clist = clist or ecopy(wytch.tier_three) local dlist = dlist or ecopy(wytch.tier_four)
if _G.paralysis then table.remove(alist,table.index_of(alist,"numbness")) table.remove(blist,table.index_of(blist,"numbness")) table.remove(clist,table.index_of(clist,"numbness")) table.remove(dlist,table.index_of(dlist,"numbness")) end
if has(name,"peace_time") ~= 0 then table.remove(alist,table.index_of(alist,"peace")) table.remove(blist,table.index_of(blist,"peace")) table.remove(clist,table.index_of(clist,"peace")) table.remove(dlist,table.index_of(dlist,"peace")) end
for i=1, #alist do if not _G[alist[i]] then -- and not wytch.within(alist[i],1) then -- if not _G[alist[i]] and not table.contains(wytch.hlist,alist[i]) then -- and not wytch.in_time(alist[i],1) curse = alist[i] break end if i == #alist then for i=1, #clist do if not _G[clist[i]] and not wytch.within(clist[i],5) then -- if not _G[clist[i]] and not table.contains(wytch.hlist,clist[i]) then curse = clist[i] break end end end end
if has(name,"curseward") and has(name,"lesser") ~= "Arctar" then curse = "breach" end
for i=1, #blist do if blist[i] ~= curse and not _G[blist[i]] and not wytch.within(blist[i],2) then -- if blist[i] ~= curse and not _G[blist[i]] and not table.contains(wytch.hlist,blist[i]) then dust = blist[i] break end if i == #blist then for i=1, #dlist do if not _G[dlist[i]] and not wytch.within(dlist[i],5) then -- if not _G[dlist[i]] and not table.contains(wytch.hlist,dlist[i]) then dust = dlist[i] break end end end end
-- Before lookup the syntax, check for reporting: local inc = {"impatience","anorexia","asthma"} if config and config.share_full then str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..curse..sp elseif config and config.share and table.contains(inc,curse) then str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..curse..sp end
curse = lookup(curse,wytch.curse_spellbook) dust = lookup(dust,wytch.curse_spellbook)
if count >= 7 then method = "curse" end
-- compile the attack str = "queue eqbal "..method.." target "..curse.." "..dust..sp..str
if anorexia and slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and impatience and asthma and not hemotoxin then local axen = "axe" if not axe then axe = axen end str = "queue eqbal target nothing"..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp str = str.."quickdraw "..axe..sp str = str.."wipe "..axe..sp str = str.."envenom "..axe.." with hemotoxin "..sp str = str.."throw "..axe.." at target"..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp elseif has(name,"purge") and not hemotoxin then str = "queue eqbal dustthrow inhibit reckless target"..sp str = str.."flare loshre at target purge"..sp elseif has(name,"tree") and not numbness and not paralysis then str = "queue eqbal dustthrow inhibit reckless target"..sp str = str.."flare loshre at target tree"..sp elseif (anorexia or table.contains(wytch.hlist,"anorexia")) and not slickness and count >= 3 and numbness and asthma then str = "queue eqbal dustthrow inhibit slick target"..sp str = str.."flare loshre at target plant"..sp elseif anorexia and slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and impatience and hemotoxin and not asthma then -- str = "queue eqbal swiftcurse target asthma asthma"..sp elseif asthma and (numbness or paralysis) and not anorexia and count >= 5 then str = "queue eqbal curse target anorexia anorexia"..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: wytch.lock_blight
Script.script:
wytch.lock_blight = function(name) _hload(name)
local greater = has(name,"greater") local lesser = has(name,"lesser") local curseward = has(name,"curseward") local shield = has(name,"shield") local count = dbp.count(name)
local str,curse,dust,flare,method = "","","","","blight"
local alist = alist or ecopy(wytch.tier_oneBlightL) local blist = blist or ecopy(wytch.tier_twoBlightL) local clist = clist or ecopy(wytch.tier_threeBlightL) local dlist = dlist or ecopy(wytch.tier_fourBlightL)
if _G.paralysis then table.remove(alist,table.index_of(alist,"numbness")) table.remove(blist,table.index_of(blist,"numbness")) table.remove(clist,table.index_of(clist,"numbness")) table.remove(dlist,table.index_of(dlist,"numbness")) end
for i=1, #alist do if not _G[alist[i]] and not wytch.within(alist[i],2) then -- not table.contains(wytch.hlist,alist[i]) then curse = alist[i] break end if i == #alist then for i=1, #clist do if not _G[clist[i]] and not wytch.within(clist[i],5) then-- not table.contains(wytch.hlist,clist[i]) then curse = clist[i] break end end end end
if has(name,"curseward") and has(name,"lesser") ~= "Arctar" then curse = "breach" end
for i=1, #blist do if blist[i] ~= curse and not _G[blist[i]] and not wytch.within(blist[i],3) then--not table.contains(wytch.hlist,blist[i]) then dust = blist[i] break end if i == #blist then for i=1, #dlist do if not _G[dlist[i]] and not wytch.within(dlist[i],7) then--not table.contains(wytch.hlist,dlist[i]) then dust = dlist[i] break end end end end
-- Before lookup the syntax, check for reporting: local inc = {"impatience","anorexia","asthma"} if config and config.share_full then str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..curse..sp elseif config and config.share and table.contains(inc,curse) then str = str.."clan military tell afflicted "..name.." "..curse..sp end
curse = lookup(curse,wytch.curse_spellbook) dust = lookup(dust,wytch.curse_spellbook)
if count >= 7 then method = "curse" end
-- construct str = "queue eqbal "..method.." target "..curse.." "..dust..sp..str
if anorexia and slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and impatience and asthma and not hemotoxin then local axen = "axe" if not axe then axe = axen end str = "queue eqbal target nothing"..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp str = str.."quickdraw "..axe..sp str = str.."wipe "..axe..sp str = str.."envenom "..axe.." with hemotoxin "..sp str = str.."throw "..axe.." at target"..sp str = str.."beckon artifacts"..sp elseif (anorexia or table.contains(wytch.hlist,"anorexia")) and not slickness and count >= 3 and impatience and asthma then str = "queue eqbal dustthrow inhibit slick target"..sp str = str.."flare loshre at target plant"..sp elseif anorexia and slickness and (numbness or paralysis) and impatience and hemotoxin and not asthma then --str = "queue eqbal swiftcurse target asthma asthma"..sp elseif asthma and (numbness or paralysis) and not anorexia then --str = "queue eqbal curse target anorexia anorexia"..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: wytch.swiftly
Script.script:
wytch.swiftly = function(name) _hload(name)
local greater = has(name,"greater") local lesser = has(name,"lesser") local curseward = has(name,"curseward") local shield = has(name,"shield") local obstruct = has(name,"obstruct") local confound = has(name,"confound")
local sowulu = has(target,"sowulu") local pithakhan = has(target,"pithakhan") local hugalaz = has(target,"hugalaz") local nauthiz = has(target,"nauthiz")
local loshre = has(target,"loshre") local nairat = has(target,"nairat") local kena = has(target,"kena")
local mannaz = wytch.mannaz
local str,curse,dust,flare,method = "","","","","swiftcurse"
local clist = { "impatience", -- m "anorexia", -- m + slick please "masochism", -- m "asthma", "addiction", "sensitivity", "clumsiness", "recklessness", -- m "healthleech", "manaleech", "dementia", -- m "paranoia", -- m "numbness", "stupidity", -- m "epilepsy", -- m "peace", -- m "nausea", "vertigo", -- m "claustrophobia", -- m "agoraphobia", -- m "dizziness", -- m "cyanide", }
local dlist = { "slickness", "confusion", "lethargy", "numbness", "recklessness", "dizziness", "weariness", }
curse,dust = wytch.choose_toxin(name,clist,dlist)
if curse == "anorexia" and not slickness then dust = "slick" method = "curse" end
if str == "" then str = str..method.." target "..curse.." "..dust..sp if curse == "anorexia" and dust == "slick" and not nairat then str = str.."flare nairat at target pipe"..sp str = "queue eqbal "..str end end str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: timer
Script.script:
bard.timer = function() if class == "Bard" then
-- operate only on 'target' otherwise the overhead is too big local time = os.time()
if player(target) then
-- revelation
local rev = has(target,"revelation") local rev_time = has(target,"revelation_time")
if rev_time ~= 0 then rev_time = 181 - (time - rev_time) if rev_time < 0 then cecho("\n<red>Resetting Revelation for "..target..".") set(target,"revelation",false) set(target,"revelation_time",0) set(target,"revelation_tick",0) end end
-- bedazzlement
local bed = has(target,"bedazzlement") local bed_time = has(target,"bedazzlement_time")
if bed_time ~= 0 then bed_time = 181 - (time - bed_time) if bed_time < 0 then cecho("\n<red>Resetting Bedazzlement for "..target..".") set(target,"bedazzlement",false) set(target,"bedazzlement_time",0) set(target,"bedazzlement_tick",0) end end
-- dissonance
local dis = has(target,"dissonance") local dis_time = has(target,"dissonance_time")
if dis_time ~= 0 then dis_time = 226 - (time - dis_time) if dis_time < 0 then cecho("\n<red>Resetting Dissonance for "..target..".") set(target,"dissonance",false) set(target,"dissonance_time",0) set(target,"dissonance_tick",0) end end
-- thornroots local troot = has(target,"thornroot") local troot_time = has(target,"thornroot_time")
if troot_time ~= 0 then troot_time = time - troot_time
if troot_time > 26 then cecho("\n<red>Resetting Thornroot for "..target..".") set(target,"thornroot",false) set(target,"thornroot_time",0) end end
-- demonic seeds local dseed = has(target,"demonic_seed") local dseed_time = has(target,"demonic_seed_time")
if dseed_time ~= 0 then dseed_time = time - dseed_time
if dseed_time > 15 then cecho("\n<red>Resetting demonic seed for "..target..".") dseed = dseed - 1 if dseed < 0 then dseed = 0 end set(target,"demonic_seed",dseed) set(target,"demonic_seed_time",0) end end
local augur = defiler.augur_time
if not defiler.augur_balance and augur ~= 0 then augur = time - augur if augur > 8 then cecho("\n<red>Resetting Augury Balance.") defiler.augur_balance = true defiler.augur_time = 0 end end
-- splinters local splints = has(target,"splinters") local to_clear = {}
for name,moment in pairs(splints) do if moment ~= 0 then moment = time - moment if moment > 30 then table.insert(to_clear,name) end end end for i=1,#to_clear do local short = "splinters."..to_clear[i] set(target,short,0) end
end
bard.ui_refresh() end end

Script.name: ui_make
Script.script:
bard.ui_make = function(ui_side,fsize,offset) local offset = offset or 0 local h = 3
local width, height = getMainWindowSize()
local internal_size = 11 local fwidth,fheight = calcFontSize(internal_size)
local fsize = fsize or 11 local f_width,f_height = calcFontSize(fsize)
if ui_side == "bottom" then setBorderBottom(h*fheight+offset*f_height) else setBorderBottom(h*fheight) end
bard.ui = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="bard_ui", x= 0, y= 0, width= 0, height= 0, }) bard.ui:setFontSize(10) bard.ui:setColor(0,0,0,0)
local x = 0 if dbp and dbp.allow then x = ui.left*width end
if ui_side == "bottom" then bard.ui:move(x,height-(h*fheight + offset*f_height)) bard.ui:resize(width,h*fheight) else bard.ui:move(x,height-(h*fheight)) bard.ui:resize(width,h*fheight) end end

Script.name: ui_refresh
Script.script:
bard.ui_refresh = function() clearWindow("bard_ui") local str = "" local time = os.time() local neutral = "<grey>"
local color = "<goldenrod>"
if player(target) and has(target,"cruel_lament") then color = "<cyan>" end
str = str.."T: "..color..target..neutral.." "
-- first part ------------- if player(target) then local blind = has(target,"unblind") local deaf = has(target,"undeaf")
if blind then blind = "<dim_grey>" else blind = "<yellow_green>" end if deaf then deaf = "<dim_grey>" else deaf = "<gold>" end
local rev = has(target,"revelation") local rev_time = has(target,"revelation_time") local rev_time_c = "<dim_grey>"
if rev_time ~= 0 then rev_time = 181 - (time - rev_time) if rev_time < 10 then rev_time_c = "<red>" end rev_time = string.format("%.1f", rev_time) rev_time = string.lpad(rev_time,5," ") else rev_time = " 00.0" rev_time_c = "<firebrick>" end
local bed = has(target,"bedazzlement") local bed_time = has(target,"bedazzlement_time") local bed_time_c = "<dim_grey>"
if bed_time ~= 0 then bed_time = 181 - (time - bed_time) if bed_time < 10 then bed_time_c = "<red>" end bed_time = string.format("%.1f", bed_time) bed_time = string.lpad(bed_time,5," ") else bed_time = " 00.0" bed_time_c = "<firebrick>" end
local dis = has(target,"dissonance") local dis_time = has(target,"dissonance_time") local dis_time_c = "<dim_grey>"
if dis_time ~= 0 then dis_time = 226 - (time - dis_time) if dis_time < 10 then dis_time_c = "<red>" end dis_time = string.format("%.1f", dis_time) dis_time = string.lpad(dis_time,5," ") else dis_time = " 00.0" end
local lul = has(target,"lullaby") local lul_time = has(target,"lullaby_time") local lul_time_c = "<dim_grey>"
if lul_time ~= 0 then lul_time = 220 - (time - lul_time) if lul_time < 10 then lul_time_c = "<red>" end lul_time = string.format("%.1f", lul_time) lul_time = string.lpad(lul_time,5," ") else lul_time = " 00.0" end
str = str..blind.."b"..deaf.."d"..neutral.." " str = str.."[R: "..rev_time_c..rev_time..neutral.."]" str = str.."[B: "..bed_time_c..bed_time..neutral.."]" str = str.."[D: "..dis_time_c..dis_time..neutral.."]" end
str = str.."\n" -- second part ------------- if player(target) then local res = tonumber(has(target,"resonance")) local res_t = has(target,"resonance_time")
local symbol = "/" local count = 20 -- 24 if specialized local col = neutral
if player(target) and has(target,"cruel_lament") then col = "<cyan>" end
str = str..col.."[" for i=1,count do local c = "<dim_grey>" if i<=res then c = "<orange_red>" end str = str..c..symbol end str = str..col.."] "..neutral end
local limb_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.target ~= "nothing" then limb_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."T: "..limb_c..string.title(limb.target)
-- third part ------------- str = str.."\n"
local cor, emp, enl, res, thr, war = "<red>", "<red>", "<red>", "<red>", "<red>", "<red>" local awa, btl, fly, fort, req = "<red>", "<red>", "<red>", "<red>", "<red>" local bef, cont, elu, bird = "<red>","<red>", "<red>", "<red>"
if bard.defences.battlemarch ~= 0 then btl = "<green>" end if bard.defences.corescation ~= 0 then cor = "<green>" end if bard.defences.empower ~= 0 then emp = "<green>" end if bard.defences.enliven ~= 0 then enl = "<green>" end if bard.defences.fortification ~= 0 then fort = "<green>" end if bard.defences.restoration ~= 0 then res = "<green>" end if bard.defences.requiem ~= 0 then req = "<green>" end if bard.defences.therapeutics ~= 0 then thr = "<green>" end if bard.defences.ward ~= 0 then war = "<green>" end if bard.defences.awakening ~= 0 then awa = "<green>" end if bard.defences.flight ~= 0 then fly = "<green>" end if bard.defences.befuddle then bef = "<green>" end if bard.defences.contortionism then cont = "<green>" end if bard.defences.elusiveness then elu = "<green>" end if bard.defences.songbird then bird = "<green>" end
str = str.."["..btl.."BTL"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..cor.."COR"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..emp.."EMP"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..enl.."ENL"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..fort.."FORT"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..res.."RES"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..req.."REQ"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..thr.."THR"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..war.."WAR"..neutral.."] :: " str = str.."["..awa.."AWA"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..fly.."FLI"..neutral.."] :: " str = str.."["..bef.."BEF"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..bird.."BIRD"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..cont.."CONT"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..elu.."ELU"..neutral.."] "
local parry_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.parry ~= "nothing" then parry_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."P: "..parry_c..string.title(limb.parry)..neutral
cecho("bard_ui",str) end

Script.name: bard.damage
Script.script:
bard.damage = function() if player(target) then local str, first, second, first_t, second_t = "", "", "", "", ""
local rev = has(target,"revelation") local rev_time = has(target,"revelation_time") local rev_tick = has(target,"revelation_tick") local tick_time = tonumber(getTime(true,"ss.zz"))
if tick_time < rev_tick then tick_time = 60 + tick_time end if rev and rev_tick ~= 0 and tick_time - rev_tick >= 5.7 then tick_time = true else tick_time = false end
local blind = has(target,"unblind") local deaf = has(target,"undeaf")
if blind then blind = false else blind = true end if deaf then deaf = false else deaf = true end
if deaf and not tick_time then if tonumber(has(target,"resonance")) < 20 then first = first.."" second = second.."ta " end first = first.."yoth " second = second.."shaite " else if tonumber(has(target,"resonance")) < 20 then first = first.."ta " second = second.."ta " end first = first.."shaite " second = second.."rubait " end
if first_t == "" then first_t = target end if second_t == "" then second_t = target end str = str.."hum "..first..first_t.." "..second..second_t..sp
send(str) end end

Script.name: bard.overload
Script.script:
bard.overload = function() if player(target) then local str, first, second, first_t, second_t = "", "", "", "", ""
local blind = has(target,"unblind") local deaf = has(target,"undeaf") if blind then blind = false else blind = true end if deaf then deaf = false else deaf = true end
if deaf then first = "yoth" second = "shaite" else first = "shaite" second = "rubait" end
if first_t == "" then first_t = target end if second_t == "" then second_t = target end str = str.."hum "..first.." "..first_t.." "..second.." "..second_t..sp
send(str) end end

Script.name: [d]
[d] spellbook
prompt
Script.script:
mage.prompt = function() local str = ""
local count,spc,symbol = mage.charges,"","X" for i=1,count do spc = spc.."<dark_goldenrod>"..symbol end if count < 5 then count = 5 - count for i=1,count do spc = spc.."<dim_grey>"..symbol end end
str = str.."<dodger_blue>[" str = str..spc str = str.."<dodger_blue>]<dim_grey>"
if has(target,"firecircle") then str = str.." [<red>FC<dim_grey>]" else str = str.." <dim_grey>[FC]" end
local fire,afire = has(target,"a_fire"),"" local fire_c = "<red>" local fire_n = "<dim_grey>"
for i=1,fire do afire = afire..fire_c..symbol end if fire < 5 then fire = 5 - fire for i=1,fire do afire = afire..fire_n..symbol end end str = str.."[Fi: "..afire..fire_n.."] "
if class == "Mage" then cecho(str) end end

mage.ui = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="mage_ui", x= 0, y= 0, width= 0, height= 0, }) mage.ui:setFontSize(10) mage.ui:setColor(0,0,0,0)
local x = 0 if dbp and dbp.allow then x = ui.left*width end
if ui_side == "bottom" then mage.ui:move(x,height-(h*fheight + offset*f_height)) mage.ui:resize(width,h*fheight) else mage.ui:move(x,height-(h*fheight)) mage.ui:resize(width,h*fheight) end end

Script.name: ui_refresh
Script.script:
mage.ui_refresh = function() clearWindow("mage_ui") local str = "" local time = os.time() local neutral = "<grey>"
local color = "<goldenrod>" if player(target) and has(target,"gutwyrm") then color = "<medium_aquamarine>" end
str = str.."T: "..color..target..neutral.." "
-- first part ------------- if player(target) then local calcify = has(target,"calcify") local calcify_time = has(target,"calcify_time") local calcify_count = has(target,"calcify_count") local calcify_c = "<chartreuse>"
if calcify then str = str..calcify_c.." Calcified "..neutral if calcify_time ~= 0 then calcify_time = string.format("%.1f", (5*calcify_count) - (time - calcify_time)) calcify_time = string.lpad(calcify_time,4,"0") str = str..calcify_time end end
local scourge = has(target,"scourge") local scourge_time = has(target,"scourge_time") local scourge_count = has(target,"scourge_count") local scourge_c = "<orange_red>" local scourge_symbol = "|"
if scourge then str = str..scourge_c.." Scourge "..neutral if scourge_time ~= 0 then scourge_time = string.format("%.1f", (5*scourge_count) - (time - scourge_time)) scourge_time = string.lpad(scourge_time,4,"0") str = str..scourge_time end end end
-- second part ------------- str = str.."\n" local skin, veil = "<red>", "<red>"
if mage.defences.stoneskin then skin = "<green>" end if mage.defences.windveil then veil = "<green>" end
local count,spc,symbol = mage.charges,"","X" for i=1,count do spc = spc.."<cyan>"..symbol end if count < 5 then count = 5 - count for i=1,count do spc = spc.."<red>"..symbol end end
str = str.."Ch: "..spc..neutral.." "
str = str.."["..skin.."SSK"..neutral.."] " str = str.."["..veil.."WVE"..neutral.."] "
local parry_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.parry ~= "nothing" then parry_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."P: "..parry_c..string.title(limb.parry)..neutral
str = str.."\n" -- third part ------------- if player(target) then
local fire,afire,symbol = has(target,"a_fire"),"","X" local fire_c = "<red>" local fire_n = "<dim_grey>" for i=1,fire do afire = afire..fire_c..symbol end if fire < 5 then fire = 5 - fire for i=1,fire do afire = afire..fire_n..symbol end end
str = str.."[Fi: "..afire..neutral.."] "
local water,awater,symbol = has(target,"a_water"),"","X" local water_c = "<cyan>" local water_n = "<dim_grey>" for i=1,water do awater = awater..water_c..symbol end if water < 5 then water = 5 - water for i=1,water do awater = awater..water_n..symbol end end
str = str.."[Wa: "..awater..neutral.."] "
local earth,aearth,symbol = has(target,"a_earth"),"","X" local earth_c = "<dark_orange>" local earth_n = "<dim_grey>" for i=1,earth do aearth = aearth..earth_c..symbol end if earth < 5 then earth = 5 - earth for i=1,earth do aearth = aearth..earth_n..symbol end end
str = str.."[Ea: "..aearth..neutral.."] "
local air,aair,symbol = has(target,"a_air"),"","X" local air_c = "<gold>" local air_n = "<dim_grey>" for i=1,air do aair = aair..air_c..symbol end if air < 5 then air = 5 - air for i=1,air do aair = aair..air_n..symbol end end
str = str.."[Ai: "..aair..neutral.."] " end
local limb_c = "<dim_grey>" if limb.target ~= "nothing" then limb_c = "<medium_aquamarine>" end str = str.."T: "..limb_c..string.title(limb.target)
cecho("mage_ui",str) end

Script.name: timer
Script.script:
mage.timer = function() if class == "Mage" then local time = os.time()
if player(target) then
local calcify = has(target,"calcify") local calcify_time = has(target,"calcify_time") local calcify_count = has(target,"calcify_count") local calcify_c = "<chartreuse>"
if calcify and calcify_time ~= 0 then calcify_count = (5*calcify_count) - (time - calcify_time) if calcify_count <= 0 then set(target,"calcify",false) set(target,"calcify_time",0) set(target,"calcify_count",0) cecho("\n"..calcify_c.."Resetting Calcify.") end end
local scourge = has(target,"scourge") local scourge_time = has(target,"scourge_time") local scourge_count = has(target,"scourge_count") local scourge_c = "<chartreuse>"
if scourge and scourge_time ~= 0 then scourge_count = (5*scourge_count) - (time - scourge_time) if scourge_count <= 0 then set(target,"scourge",false) set(target,"scourge_time",0) set(target,"scourge_count",0) cecho("\n"..scourge_c.."Resetting Scourge.") end end end
mage.ui_refresh() end end

Script.name: choose_spell
Script.script:
mage.choose_spell = function(name,list,tlist,clist) if not player(name) and type(name) == "table" then if tlist then clist = tlist end if list then tlist = list end list = name name = me end
_hload(name)
local primary,secondary,crystal = "","","" local list = list or mage.spellq_primary local tlist = tlist or mage.spellq_secondary
for i=1, #list do if not _G[list[i]] then primary = list[i] break end end for i=1, #tlist do if not _G[tlist[i]] then secondary = tlist[i] break end end
primary = lookup(primary,mage.spellbook_primary) secondary = lookup(secondary,mage.spellbook_secondary)
local charges = mage.charges local count = dbax.count(name)
if charges >= 1 then if charges >=1 and hp < 200 then crystal = "infuse" elseif mp < 240 then crystal = "mirroring" elseif hp < 200 then crystal = "etherpunch" elseif not has(name,"numbness") then crystal = "shock" elseif has(name,"a_water") < 3 then crystal = "waterwreathe" elseif not has(name,"masochism") then crystal = "masochism" elseif count > 4 and not has(name,"anorexia") then crystal = "anorexia" elseif not has(name,"hallucinations") then crystal = "hallucinations" elseif not has(name,"anorexia") then crystal = "anorexia" elseif not has(name,"loneliness") then crystal = "loneliness" elseif not has(name,"paranoia") then crystal = "paranoia" elseif charges >= 2 and has(name,"a_earth") < 4 then crystal = "earthwreathe" elseif charges >=2 and has(name,"sunallergy") and has(name,"a_fire") < 3 then crystal = "firewreathe" elseif charges >= 2 and count < 3 then crystal = "quickcast" else crystal = "quickcast" end end
if count > 7 and has(name,"paralysis") then secondary = " toxicsplash " end
if not has(name,"asthma") and count > 4 and has(name,"anorexia") then if not has(name,"ablaze") then primary = " ignite " end secondary = " ignite " end
return primary,secondary,crystal end

Script.name: mage.fry
Script.script:
mage.fry = function(name) local str = ""
local primary,secondary,crystal = mage.choose_spell(name) primary = " "..primary secondary = " "..secondary crystal = " "..crystal
str = str.."cast"..crystal..primary..secondary.." at "..name..sp send(str) end

Script.name: mage.fireball
Script.script:
mage.fireball = function(name) local str, primary, secondary, crystal = "","","","" local charges = mage.charges local fire = has(name,"a_fire") local fc = has(name,"firecircle")
if not fc and fire <= 3 then crystal = " firewreathe " secondary = " heat " if not has(name,"butisol") then primary = " dehydrate " else primary = " bloodboil " end elseif not fc and fire >= 4 then primary = " firecircle " if fire >= 5 and charges >= 1 then crystal = " penetration " else crystal = " firewreathe " end if fire < 5 and charges < 1 then secondary = " heat " elseif fire == 3 then secondary = " heat " else secondary = " batter " end else if fc and fire >= 5 then cecho("<red>*** C O N S I D E R L A V A B L A S T (syntax: lb) ***") end crystal = " penetration " primary = " bloodboil " secondary = " batter " display(fire) if fire < 4 then secondary = " heat " end if fire < 5 then crystal = " firewreathe " end
-- end
str = str.."cast "..crystal..primary..secondary.." at "..name..sp send(str) end

Script.name: mage.bury
Script.script:
mage.bury = function(name) local str = ""
local primary,secondary,crystal = "","","" local earth = has(name,"a_earth")
if not has(name,"stupidity") then primary = " knockout " elseif not has(name,"clumsiness") then primary = " sidesmash " end if earth < 3 then crystal = " earthwreathe " else crystal = " penetration " end if earth < 5 then secondary = " tremors " elseif primary ~= " knockout " then secondary = " knockout " else secondary = " batter " end
str = str.."cast "..crystal..primary..secondary.." at "..name..sp send(str) end

Script.name: mage.control
Script.script:
mage.control = function(name)
end

Script.name: mage.ice
Script.script:
mage.ice = function(name) local list = {} local tlist = {} local clist = {}
local primary,secondary,crystal = mage.choose_spell(name) primary = " "..primary secondary = " "..secondary crystal = " "..crystal
local str = ""
local ice = has(name,"icicles") local water = has(name,"a_water") local charges = mage.charges local count = dbp.count(name)
if not ice then if count > 3 then if water >= 5 then str = str.."cast icicles at target dizziness"..sp elseif water >= 4 and charges >= 1 then str = str.."cast icewreathe "..primary..secondary.." at target"..sp elseif water >= 4 then str = str.."cast "..crystal..primary.." spray at target"..sp else str = str.."cast icewreathe "..primary.." spray at target"..sp end else if water <= 3 and charges >= 1 and count < 2 then str = str.."cast quickcast dehydrate spray at target"..sp elseif water <= 3 and charges >= 1 then str = str.."cast icewreathe dehydrate spray at target"..sp else str = str.."cast"..crystal..primary..secondary.." at target"..sp end end else str = str.."cast"..crystal..primary..secondary.." at target"..sp end
str = str:gsub("target",name) send(str) end

Script.name: [d]
Script.script: renegade.defences = renegade.defences or {}

Script.name: prompt
Script.script:
renegade.prompt = function(len) local str,neutral = "","<dim_grey>" local a,m = "<grey>","<grey>" local n = 50 n = n - len
str = string.lpad(str,n," ")
if player(target) then local count = dbp.count(target)
str = str..neutral.."[A: "..a..count..neutral.."]"
end
if class == "Renegade" then cecho(str) end end

Script.name: [d]
Script.script: runeguard.defences = runeguard.defences or {}

Script.name: prompt
Script.script:
runeguard.prompt = function(len) local str,neutral = "","<dim_grey>" local a,m = "<grey>","<grey>" local n = 50 n = n - len
str = string.lpad(str,n," ")
if player(target) then local count = dbp.count(target)
str = str..neutral.."[A: "..a..count..neutral.."]"
end
if class == "Runeguard" then cecho(str) end end

Script.name: screendump
Script.script:
function logScreen(logdir, logfile) if logfile == nil then cecho("\nError: You must specify a logname!") return false end if string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/" then _sep = "/" else _sep = "\\" end local logdir = logdir .. _sep .. logfile .. ".html" local file_output = io.open(logdir, "w") local fo = {} local line_count = getLineCount() local cur_buffer = getLines(1, line_count-1) local curcolor = "" local index = 0 local r,g,b = 0,0,0 local cr,cg,cb -- last colors local tc = 1 -- table count local perf = createStopWatch() startStopWatch(perf) local conversions = { [""] = "¦", [""] = "×", [""] = "«", [""] = "»" } fo[tc] = [[ ]] tc = tc + 1 for line_num,cur_line in ipairs(cur_buffer) do index = 0 fo[tc] = string.format([[%s]], getTimestamp(line_num)) tc = tc +1 while index < #cur_line do index = index + 1 moveCursor("main", index, line_num) selectString(cur_line:sub(index), 1) r,g,b = getFgColor() if cr ~= r or cg ~= g or cb ~= b then cr,cg,cb = r,g,b fo[tc] = string.format("%s", r,g,b, cur_line:sub(index, index)) tc = tc +1 else fo[tc] = cur_line:sub(index, index) tc = tc +1 end cur_line:sub(index, index) end fo[tc] = "
" tc = tc +1 end fo[#fo+1] = "" local s = table.concat(fo) for from, to in pairs(conversions) do s = string.gsub(s, from, to) end file_output:write(s) file_output:close() -- this can use quite a bit of memory on a large buffer, so free it up right away collectgarbage("collect") cecho("\nCurrent buffer saved to: " .. logdir .. ", took " .. stopStopWatch(perf) .. "ms.") end

Script.name: mecho
Script.script:
mecho = function(str) local prefix = sysfix or ""
str = prefix..str cecho(str) end

Script.name: idle
Script.script:
idle = idle or {} idle.on = idle.on or false idle.timer = idle.timer or 0 idle.fire = idle.fire or 0
idle.g = function() local path = getMudletHomeDir().."/idle.txt" if io.exists(path) then cecho(sysfix..path.." loaded.")
local tablen = {} local file = assert(io.open(path, "r")) local line = file:read("*all") local tabler = {} local divider, divider2 = "<>", ">>"
tablen = string.split(line,divider)
for k, v in pairs(tablen) do if v == "" then table.remove( tablen, k ) end end
for i=1, #tablen do tablen[i] = string.split( tablen[i], divider2 ) end
for i=1, #tablen do local key = string.trim( tablen[i][1] ) local tablet = tablen[i] table.remove( tablet, 1 ) for k, v in pairs( tablet ) do k = string.trim( v ) end tabler[key] = tablet end
-- recycle tablen tablen = {}
local valid_keys = {}
-- insert rules and keys here table.insert( valid_keys, "General" ) -- table.insert( valid_keys, "Cassandra" ) -- table.insert( valid_keys, eden.game_month ) if gmcp.Room.Info.area == "the Khandava Council" then table.insert( valid_keys, "Khandava" ) end if gmcp.Room.Info.area == "the City of Stavenn" then table.insert( valid_keys, "Stavenn" ) end --if gmcp.Room.Info.environment == "Urban" then table.insert( valid_keys, "Urban" ) end
local month = os.date("*t") local calendar = { "January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December" } month = calendar[month["month"]] table.insert( valid_keys, month )
-- generate the appropriate table for k, v in pairs( valid_keys ) do if tabler[v] ~= nil then for i, j in pairs( tabler[v] ) do table.insert( tablen, j ) end end end
file:close()
return tablen end end
idle.r = function(tablen) if idle.on then local num = math.random( 1, #tablen ) local arg = tablen[num] local n = math.random( 280, 740 )
if idle.timer then killTimer(idle.timer) end idle.timer = tempTimer( n, function() idle.r(idle.g()) end ) send("emote "..arg) end end
idle.n = function() if not idle.on then cecho(sysfix.."<medium_aquamarine>Idle is ON<grey>.") idle.on = true idle.fire = os.time() idle.r( idle.g() ) else cecho(sysfix.."<red>Idle is OFF<grey>") idle.on = false idle.fire = 0 killTimer(idle.timer) end end

Script.name: obelisks
Script.script:
obelisks = obelisks or {} obelisks.A = "Septus" obelisks.M = "Eldreth" obelisks.D = "Ahkan" obelisks.list = { {"Obelisk","Nature",obelisks.D,12121,"Lithi"}, {"Obelisk","True Sight",obelisks.A,17764,"Argain",17328,"6:20 GMT"}, {"Obelisk","Efficiency",obelisks.D,11292,"Auonab"}, {"Obelisk","Aryana",obelisks.M,12205,"Koakoa"}, {"Obelisk","Moradeim",obelisks.M,19820,"Kilathu"}, {"Obelisk","Sukhder",obelisks.M,19310,"Bodah"},
{"Outpost","Fury of Aetos",obelisks.A,17238,"Lysha"}, {"Outpost","Ultrisaurix",obelisks.A,20791,"Takum"}, {"Outpost","Dominultrix",obelisks.A,20797,"Takum"}, {"Outpost","GreatOwl",obelisks.M,19884,"Kaulathu"}, {"Outpost","Ultrelestine",obelisks.A,19879,"Kaulathu"}, {"Outpost","Claymore Claimed",obelisks.A,19843,"Kilathu"}, {"Outpost","Sukhder 1",obelisks.A,19294,"Bodah"}, }
obelisks.time = obelisks.time or "" -- obelisks.time = os.date()
obelisks.report = function() local str = ""
str = str.."rt [O.B.E.L.I.S.K.S] Last valid: "..obelisks.time..sp str = str.."rt ================================================="..sp
for i=1, #obelisks.list do local t = obelisks.list[i]
if t[1] == "Obelisk" then
str = str.."rt "..string.lpad(t[2],11,"-").." : "..t[5].." ("..t[4]..") : "..t[3] if t[6] then for i=6,#t,2 do if t[i] then str = str.." : Defended by #"..t[i].." at "..t[i+1] end end end str = str..sp
elseif t[1] == "Outpost" then
str = str.."rt Outposts: "..string.lpad(t[3],11,"-").." : "..t[5].." ("..t[4]..")"..sp
end end
send(str) end

Script.name: toxit

ScriptGroup.name: bash [d]
ScriptGroup.script:
bash = bash or {}
bash.sp = "|" bash.allow_shard = true bash.allow_shield = true bash.allow_health = 0.40
bash.on = bash.on or false bash.moving = bash.moving or false bash.diag = bash.diag or false bash.shard = bash.shard or false bash.shard_t = bash.shard_t or 0 bash.shield_up = bash.shield_up or false bash.shield_have = bash.shield_have or true
bash.lockm = bash.lockm or false bash.lockm_timer = bash.lockm_timer or 0 bash.locka = bash.locka or false bash.locka_timer = bash.locka_timer or 0
bash.area = bash.area or "" bash.targets = bash.targets or {} bash.room = bash.room or 0 bash.t = bash.t or {} bash.room_contents = bash.room_contents or {} -- bash.target = bash.target or ""
bash.areas = { {"tresleins",false}, {"erorag",false}, {"nagiri",false}, {"menanon",false}, -- {"scourge",false},
-- {"aldrym",false}, {"riksha",false}, {"hollow",false}, {"mavitt",false}, {"mercenary",false}, {"eorgahl",false}, {"dregs",false}, {"festeringbog",false}, {"demonstone",false}, -- {"khous",false}, }
bash.here_r = bash.here_r or 0 bash.here = bash.here or false

Script.name: bash functions
Script.script:
bash.turn_on = function() bash.on = true -- manage your lockouts bash.lockm = false bash.lockm_timer = 0 bash.locka = false bash.locka_timer = 0 -- get next area bash.area, bash.targets = bash.next_area() bash.room = bash.next_room() cecho("\n<green>Bashing ON") end
bash.turn_off = function() bash.on = false -- manage your lockouts bash.lockm = false bash.lockm_timer = 0 bash.locka = false bash.locka_timer = 0 -- get next area bash.area = "" bash.targets = {} bash.room = 0 cecho("\n<red>Bashing OFF") end
bash.reset = function() -- clear the bashing memory bash.t = {} for i=1, #bash.areas do bash.areas[i][2] = false end -- manage your lockouts bash.lockm = false bash.lockm_timer = 0 bash.locka = false bash.locka_timer = 0 cecho("\n<hot_pink>Bashing Areas RESET") end
bash.next_area = function() local area = ""
for i=1, #bash.areas do local t = bash.areas[i] local area, value = t[1], t[2]
if not t[2] then
return area, bash[area.."_targets"] end if i == #bash.areas then -- cease operations, or cycle to the top bash.reset() return bash.areas[1][1],bash[bash.areas[1][1].."_targets"] end end end
bash.next_room = function() local room = ""
for i=1, #bash[bash.area] do local r = bash[bash.area][i]
if not table.contains( bash.t, r ) then return r end end end
bash.skip = function() bash.t = {} bash.area, bash.targets = bash.next_area() bash.room = bash.next_room() end

Script.name: timer
Script.script:
bash.timer = function()
if bash.on then if not bash.room then bash.t = {} bash.area, bash.targets = bash.next_area() bash.room = bash.next_room() end local str = "" if bash.moving then -- do nothing elseif bash.eq == 1 and bash.bal == 1 then -- check for a target first, local target, shard = "", false if #bash.room_contents > 0 then for i=1,#bash.room_contents do if bash.room_contents[i].name == "a partially buried blue shard" then shard = true elseif bash.room_contents[i].name == "a partially buried red shard" then shard = true end end for k,v in pairs(bash.targets) do for i=1,#bash.room_contents do if bash.room_contents[i].name == k then target = v break end end end end -- save yourself if bash.hp/bash.mhp < bash.allow_health and bash.allow_shield and not bash.locka and bash.shield_have then str = str.."touch shield"..bash.sp bash.locka = true bash.locka_timer = os.time() -- diagnose hidden affs elseif bash.diag and not bash.locka then str = str.."queue eqbal diag"..bash.sp bash.diag = false bash.locka = true bash.locka_timer = os.time() -- don't hit if someone else is in the room elseif not bash.here then if gold then str = str.."put gold in "..gold..sp end -- if sect ~= "(None)" then str = str.."perform ritual sacrifice"..sp end str = str.."path find "..bash.room..bash.sp str = str.."path go"..bash.sp bash.lockm = true bash.lockm_timer = os.time() -- kill targets elseif target ~= "" and not bash.locka then str = bash.p(target) bash.locka = true bash.locka_timer = os.time() -- harvest a shard if there is one elseif shard and bash.allow_shard and not bash.locka then if bash.shard then -- do nothing else str = str.."harvest shard "..bash.sp bash.shard = true bash.shard_t = os.time() bash.locka = true bash.locka_timer = os.time() end -- move elseif not bash.lockm and not bash.locka then if gold then str = str.."put gold in "..gold..bash.sp end if sect ~= "(None)" and (gmcp.Room.Info.area ~= "the Riksha Hills" or gmcp.Room.Info.area ~= "the Mavitt Woods" or gmcp.Room.Info.area ~= "the Blighted Hollow") then -- str = str.."perform ritual sacrifice"..bash.sp end str = str.."path find "..bash.room..bash.sp str = str.."path go"..bash.sp bash.lockm = true bash.lockm_timer = os.time() end end if bash.lockm_timer ~= 0 and os.time() - bash.lockm_timer > 0.5 then -- cecho("<red>\nResetting movement lockout") bash.lockm = false bash.lockm_timer = 0 end if bash.locka_timer ~= 0 and os.time() - bash.locka_timer > 1.2 then -- cecho("<red>\nResetting Action lockout") bash.locka = false bash.locka_timer = 0 end if #bash.t >= #bash[bash.area] then bash.t = {} bash.area, bash.targets = bash.next_area() bash.room = bash.next_room() end if bash.shard and os.time() - bash.shard_t > 30 then bash.shard = false bash.shard_t = 0 end if gmcp.Room.Info.name == "In the chill grip of death" then elseif gmcp.Room.Info.name == "Wooden landing upon an expansive river" then else send(str) end end end

Script.name: bash.p
Script.script:
bash.p = function(name) if class then local str,target = "",bash.target if name then target = name end if class == "Amazon" then str = "spear stab "..target elseif class == "Monk" then str = "" elseif class == "Outrider" then str = "spear stab "..target elseif class == "Predator" then if predator then str = predator.bash(name) end elseif class == "Priest" then str = "smite "..target elseif class == "Ranger" then str = "qjab "..target elseif class == "Templar" then str = "dsl "..target
elseif class == "Assassin" then str = "garrote "..target -- str = "wield dirk"..bash.sp.."puncture "..target.." with trioxin" elseif class == "Deathknight" then str = "dsl "..target elseif class == "Defiler" then str = "wield flail"..bash.sp.."ravage "..target elseif class == "Diabolist" then str = "deadeyes "..target.." bleed bleed" elseif class == "Summoner" then str = "invoke combustion "..target elseif class == "Wytch" then str = "swiftcurse "..target.." bleed"
elseif class == "Bard" then str = "hum shaite "..target.." rubait "..target elseif class == "Druid" then str = "quarterstaff batter "..target elseif class == "Hunter" then str = "wyvern claw "..target elseif class == "Mage" then str = "cast bloodboil batter at "..target elseif class == "Renegade" then str = "wield dirk"..bash.sp.."puncture "..target.." with trioxin" elseif class == "Runeguard" then str = "dsl "..target end return str end end

Script.name: bash.vitals
Script.script: bash.vitals = function() if bash.on then bash.hp = math.floor(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp/11) bash.mhp = math.floor(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp/11) bash.mp = math.floor(gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp/11) bash.mxmp = math.floor(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxmp/11) bash.eq = tonumber( gmcp.Char.Vitals.eq ) bash.bal = tonumber( gmcp.Char.Vitals.bal ) end end

Script.name: bash.arrive
Script.script:
bash.arrive = function() if bash.on then
local area = gmcp.Room.Info.area local aname = bash[bash.area.."_name"]
if area == aname then for i=1,#bash.areas do local t = bash.areas[i] local ar, value = t[1], t[2]
if ar == bash.area and not t[2] then bash.areas[i][2] = true cecho("\n<green>Setting area to true") return end end
if not bash.moving and not table.contains( bash.t, gmcp.Room.Info.num ) then table.insert( bash.t, gmcp.Room.Info.num ) bash.room = bash.next_room() else if #bash.t >= #bash[bash.area] then bash.t = {} bash.area, bash.targets = bash.next_area() bash.room = bash.next_room() end end end end end

Script.name: bash.inroom
Script.script: bash.inroom = function() if bash.on then bash.room_contents = gmcp.Char.Items.List.items end end

Script.name: bash.addroom
Script.script: bash.addroom = function() if bash.on then table.insert( bash.room_contents, gmcp.Char.Items.Add.item ) end end

Script.name: mercenary
Script.script: bash.mercenary_name = "a Mercenary Encampment" bash.mercenary = { 9420, -- A thick cluster of Redwoods. 9421, -- A narrow dirt pathway lined with trees. 9422, -- Nearing a small clearing. 9423, -- Outside a large tent. 9424, -- The center of a small camp. 9425, -- Within a dark and cluttered tent. 9426, -- A small sleeping area. 9427, -- Along a small dirt path. 9428, -- Surrounded by small green tents. 9429, -- A flourishing forest near a clearing. 9430, -- The forests edge. 9432, -- Within a dark tent. 9433, -- Inside a well-kept tent. 9434, -- A leaf-covered path. 9435, -- A large storage room. 9436, -- A cluttered chamber. 9437, -- Surrounded by tall Redwoods. 9438, -- Below a thick green canopy. 9439, -- Amongst the copse. 9440, -- In the shelter of the woods. 9441, -- An enclosed weapons armoury. 9442, -- Within a personal chamber. 9443, -- Before a small stream in the forest. 9444, -- Along a rock-strewn stream. 9446, -- Within the chilly waters. 9447, -- A still pool of water. 9448, -- A dense and dark section of the forest. 9449, -- Within the wildwood. 9450, -- A flourishing grove. 9451, -- Surrounded by dark chaparel. 9456, -- In the
